text: Bantu ba Isaka bakimba dina mu tshibanda, bakasanganamu mushimi wa mai
Moshe kuambila Arone bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Lubena ku luseke lua ku sude
Bweena ditunga dia Kongu budi mwa pashisha kudi muntu nkaya
Yeye udi bu kapia kadi kabutula bintu bionsu

Nomba Bena Kanâna Badi Baluangana ne Bena Isalele Atada, mukelenge wa Bena Kanâna, wakadi ushikama ku luseke lua ku Sude, wakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele badi baya mu nshila wa ku Atalima, yeye wakaluangana ne Bena Isalele, wakaya ne bakuabo mu lukanu
Batshidimu too ne ku lelu
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane anu dikumi, tshiakubutula tshimenga to
Mose wakamba ne, Muntu yonso wakudifila kudi Yehowa lelu ku mushinga wa muan andi mulume ne muan abo mulume, Yehowa anuvudishile disanka lelu
Dutelonone Mabue a Mikenji Mifundibue Tshiakabidi Ek
Pashishe tshiluilu tshivua ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Rubene kubanga luendu, bena mvita bambula dibendela diabu
Bakaji banyi, umvuayi tshindi nnuambila: Eyowa ndi nshipa muntu padiye untapa mputa
Umuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, wakuntuma kudi ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye bua kuntendelela mu tshihela, ku diambedi to ne mpindiu wewe kuena muanze kunvua
Nanku neujadike ne: buloba buonsu mbua Maweja Nangila
Nebamumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Isaka wakumukaku, wakashimika ntenta yandi mu tshibanda tshia Gelâ, wakashikamamu

Mutuangaji ele mafuta mu tshianza tshiende tshia bakaji, pashishe atue munu wende watshianza tshia balume, udi mulonde tshiala mu mafuta adi mu tshianza tshia bakaji, amiamine mafuta awu ne munu wende misangu muanda mutekete kumpala kua Maweja Nangila

Lota wakabanduluka, wakamona mpata ne bibanda bia musulu wa Yadene, ne tusulu tuakadi kuonso diambedi Yehowa kayi muanze kushiha Sodoma ne Amola, mpata au wakadi bu tshibundu tshia Yehowa, wakadi bu buloba bua Ejipitu, hawaya mu nshila wa ku Soa

Kadi yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila tubalu tua bungi, anyi bua kuhingisha bantu mu Ejipitu bua kuheteye tubalu tua bungi; bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kunuambila ne, Kanuhinganyi mu nshila au kabidi
Lubena, wewe udi muan a bute wanyi, ntshibangidilu tshia bukole buanyi, udi wa kumudilu wa kanemu, ne wa kumudilu wa bukokeshi
Nuvuluke ne: ndi munupeshe dituku dia muanda mutekete bua dikale dia dikisha
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Indilayi, Maweja Nangila angambile tshinudi mua kuenza

Kanukengeshi muntu wakabuela mu mudimu wa difutu, udi muhele ne udi kayi ne bintu, nansha umue wa bana benu nansha muenyi udi ushikama mu buloba buenu ne mu misoko yenu; nubafute difutu diabo buatshia buatshia diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela; bualu bua bobo badi bahele ne badi bakuma mitshima yabo ku difutu; bobo kabadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buenu, ne bualu ebu kabuikadi bubi kunudi
Tshintu tshi difume anyi tshidi tshihandulula kudi nyama yeye kena mua kutshidia, yeye neadinyange n atshi meme ndi Yehowa
Bualu patudi katuyi tuenza nanku, udi mua kututumina disama dia tshiambu tshikole, nansha kutushipa ku muele wa mvita
Sara uvua musombe mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta, panyima pa bayende
Tshiena musue bua Mueyelu wa muoyi undi mumupesha ushale kashidi munda muende

Yehowa Nzambi wakamenesha mitshi yonso idi buimpe ku mesu ne idi mimpe bua kudia mu buloba, mutshi wa muoyo kabidi wakadi munkatshi mua budimi, ne mutshi wa lungenyi lua kujingulula malu mimpe ne malu mabi

Kadi wewe ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi nenudie tshiadi tshia kunyukulabo ne tshibelu tshia kukuhabo ebi mbintu biebe ne bia bana bebe balume munkatshi mua milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ya Bena Isalele
Hashishe Bena Amaleka bakahueka ne Bena Kanâna bakadi bashikama mu mikuna, bakabahita bukole, bakabihata tô ne ku Homa
Tshikondu atshi, mvua munuambile bionsu binudi ne bua kuenza
Miriyame kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Imbilayi Maweja Nangila musambu: mmuleje bukole budiye nabu, mmubutule tubalu ne bavua babandapu
Nyunyi wa nkudimba mumane kuya, kena mupeta muaba wa kuikila, bualu mayi atshivua pa buloba
Nanku, nendeje butumbi buanyi, nembabutule, yeye mukalenga ne biluilu biende bionsu
Neafile tshituha tshia mulambu ne mulambu bu mulambu udibo bakuha ku mesu kua Yehowa, netshikale kudi muakuidi udi umiamine mashi a mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala

Nenuikale mu bitandatanda matuku muanda mutekete; bantu bonso hakalelabo mu Isalele nebashikame mu bitandatanda bua kumanyisha bantu ba mu bikondo bienu bionso ne, Bena Isalele bakashikama mu bitandatanda hanakahatuka n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Butshiama bua luhangu lua ku esete nebuikale coudées makumi atanu
Amu pelabu mpungi, bamue bantu nebasemene ku mukuna
Mfumuanyi Abrahame kungandamuna ne: Maweja Nangila undi mvuluka matuku onsu, neakuendeshe diakalenga
Ke muvua Yoshuwa mushipe bena Amaleke bonsu, mubabutule nanku
Nunku buhianyi bua Bena Isalele kabuena bumuka ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba, muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele neashale ne buhianyi bua tshisamba tshia batatu abo
ditambakana munda mwa polovensa;
Nanku pinganayi ku midimu yenu
Isalele wakambila Yosefe ne, Nfuafua, kadi Nzambi neikale n enu neanuhingashe mu buloba bua batatu etu

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa wakamana kuhikula Besalele, muana mulume wa Uli, muana mulume wa Hû wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakamûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi lule lua kuenza n alu midimu yonso, ne lua kulongolola n alu mudimu muimpe wa bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mudimu wa kusonga mabue ne wa kusonga mabaya ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Abalahama wakabaka mukashi mukuabo dina diandi Ketula

Wakatumma tatu wandi bintu nunku, nyama ya mpunda dikumi yakadi ne bujitu bua bintu bimpe bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu ha nyima hai ne nyama ya mpunda mikashi dikumi yakadi ne bujitu bua bintu bia kudia ne bintu bia kukuatshisha n abi tatu andi mu nshila
Nenubatshimune lukasa, mubabutule bonsu, mbanyenge bintu biabu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mulaye
Bakambila Mose ne, Wakula biebe n etu, netunvue, kadi biakula Nzambi n etu, netufue
Ndelanganyi ya Merari Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubadike kabidi bena Levi ba bena Merari ku meku ne ku bisamba biabu
Tuetu nkayetu tudi basue kuenza nunku kabidi
Nanku padi mutuangaji ulambula bintu abi kudi Maweja Nangila, buvyele bua mukaji buajiki
Muaba wakadi mukese bua bobo kushikama hohamue, bualu bua bintu biabo biakadi bia bungi, kabakamanya mua kushikama hohamue
Nebateke kabidi pa mutu pa bionsu tshiseba tshia nyama wa nkonga
Esawu kumulomba ne: Mpeshaku nsupu wa nkunde mukunze uudi mulamba, ndia, bualu mukana mmungume

Genese Nzambi Udi Uvudishila Yakoba Disanka ku Betele Nzambi wakambila Yakoba ne, Bika biebe uye ku Betele, ushikameku, wenzeleku Nzambi, wakamueneka kûdi bawakadi unyema ku mesu kua Esau, mukulu ebe, tshioshelu

Kadi tatu wandi wakabenga ne, Ndi mumanye bualu ebu, muan anyi, yeye nealue bantu ba bungi, nealue muntu munene kabidi, kadî muakuny andi neamutambe bunene, ne tunkanunuina tuandi netuikale tshisamba tshinene
Nansha nanku, dîba diônso didibo bakenzulula, badi babwita mêsu bwa kusobola dîna dimwe ku bitupa biônso
Nunku wewe neweleshe mpungi bikole dituku dia dikumi mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete, mu dituku dia kubuikila bubi bua bantu wewe neweleshe mpungi kuonso mu buloba buenu
Ndi munupatule mu Ejipitu bua ngikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Biamueneka ditoba ditoke tô mu dikoba diandi, ne bikaladi kadiyi dibuela mu munyinyi wandi mene, ne bikala miosa kayiyi mianze kuandamuka mitoke tô, nunku muakuidi neabueshe muntu udi ne disama ha nkayandi mu nsubu tô matuku muanda mutekete

Bena Isalele bakabambila ne, Biakadi bimpe bua tuetu kufua mu Ejipitu ku tshianza tshia Yehowa hatuakashikama hadi bivuadi bia munyinyi ne hatuakukutshika mafu ne bidia, kadi nuenu nuakuluila n etu mu tshihela etshi bualu bua kushiha tshisumbu etshi tshionso ne nzala
Muan a mukala wakalela muana mulume kabidi, wakamuidika dina ne, Beneami, yeye wakadi nkambua wa Bena Amona tô ne lelu
Muntu nansha umue kakubavuluka kabidi to
Nebanuambile munudi mua kukosa tshilumbu atshi

Bangabanga ne kunuisha mukaji mayi a bululu awu, bua amutue munda, mutuangaji neangate mulambu wa bualu budibu babanda nabu mukaji, udi mukaji awu nawu mu bianza biende, neawele mulu, aunyukule kumpala kua Maweja Nangila

Mu matuku adi ku mpala, buimpe buanyi nebumbingishe hawalua bua kunkonka bua difutu dianyi didi kûdi, biwasangana mbushi udi kayi ne matoba, anyi mukoko udi kauyi mufike munkatshi mua bintu bianyi, nebikale bu tshintu tshiakuibabo

Bakenza tshilulu tshia ku mbelu kua luhangu ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin muimpe kudi bantu bakadi ne lungenyi lule bule buatshi buakadi coudées ma kunu abidi ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, muomumue ne bilulu bia luhangu
Mubikilayi bua tudie nende

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia makookeshi makwabo adi Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu akapeesha, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi kadi katangila, mu tshitupa tshia kumpala ne mu tshitupa tshia ndekeelu, malomba a ditangilula bilumbu bwaalu mbadiâta mêyi ne mikandu ku makasa, malomba mikala atontolola ngenzelu, nkoselu wa bilumbu ne mapangadika a bamfumu ba mbulamatadi munene
Ulue ne Alona ne bana bandi balume ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, uboweshe mai
Kame, tatuende wa Kenaane, kumona butaka bua tatuende Nowa, kupatuka bua kuambila bana babu babidi bavua pa mbelu
Muntu udi wambula nyama awu mufue, nansha yeye musukule bilamba biende, utshidi ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Batuangaji nebaleje muntu yonsu tshintu tshidiye mua kuambula
Mvidi Mukulu udi usungula Moshe bua kupikula bena Izrayele Kupita matuku a bungi, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kufua

Hashishe hakambikila Nzambi, wakangumusha ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi, meme nakamuambila ne, Elu nduse lundi musue wewe kundesha, ku miaba yonso itudi tuya n ebe ubambile bua bualu buanyi ne, Yeye udi mukulu wanyi wa balume
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Shela, hakamuleleleye wakadi mu musoko wa Keziba
Pelega mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu, kulelaye Reyu
Genese Yakoba ne Esau Badi Balengeshangana Yakoba wakabanduluka, wakamona Esau ulua ne bantu nkama mai
Kanuendi mu bilele bia tshisamba tshindi ngihata ku mesu kuenu, bualu bua bobo bakenza malu au onso, nunku nakabalengulula
Nzambi wakafuka mulu, wakatahulula mai a ha buloba ne mai a mulu Bualu buakenjibua Nzambi wa kuhita mulu ne, Diulu, dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku dibidi

Misoko ya Kunyemena Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuasabuka Yadene mu buloba bua Kanâna, nenusungule misoko ya kunyemena, ne hashiha muntu muntu mukuabo ku mpukahuka, yeye neanyemenemu
Kadi padi muntu ne mputa wa kapia pambidi, tshibangu tshia mputa awu tshikale tshitokoloke, nansha tshikunzubile, mutuangaji neakenkete muaba udi disama
Hakunvua Mose mei au, bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kuandi
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusangana ne Abalahama yeye wakaya biandi ne Abalahama wakahingana kuandi
Bulalu buonso budiye ulalahu hahatuka tufina budi ne bukoya, ne bintu bionso bidiye ushikamahu bidi ne bukoya
Ke munudi ne bua kumusha bubi munkatshi muenu

Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kwangata muntu mu Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu: a padiye kayi mweena Kongu; b padiye kayi uleeja ne udi ne dimanya dipiluke dia bidimu dikumi ne bitanu mu mianda ya bukoshi bwa nsambu anyi ya tshidiidi

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi budi ne tshia kwenza mwaabu mônso bwa kujimija kashidi mishindu yônso ya kansungansunga pa bidi bitangilla mukaji ne kabidi bwa kukuba ne kukolesha makookeshi ende
Nenja dike tshihungidi tshianyi hankatshi hetu n ebe, nenkukumbashe ba bu ngi
Dilama anyi difunda dia tshipwita badi mwa kwanji kudiimanyika padi Tshibambalu tshidiye wenzela mudimu tshilomba

Kanungu ka Dipangadika dia kulondeshisha ne dia kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila kavulambedi badi badieelela tukanda kudi tshitupa tshinene tshia bia bisatu bibidi bia beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi benza Tshisangilu tshinene bilondeshila dikasa dia kulonda dilongolola kudi dîyi diludiki dia mianda ya munda mwaatshi
Kadi paudi ubenga bua kumulekela, ndi nshipa muanebe wa balume muanabute
Uvua kabidi ne bena diku diende ne bena mudimu bende
Nudi basue kuhangisha mitshima ya Bena Isalele bua kuya mu buloba buakabahabo kudi Yehowa munyi
Kadi bana balume ba Kola kabakafua

kadi kamungutuka padi Dîyi dikulu edi dipeta Kanungu ka Bulongolodi bwa kalongo ka kumpala ka kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu edi nebupeta bwenzeji mu ngondu makumi asatu ne isambombo yalonda diteeka dia bishimikidi bia tshidiidi mu nkwaasa bidibo balongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Nyunyi yonsu idi kayiyi ne mikiya, nudi mua kuyidia

Mose wakasungula balume ba lungenyi lule ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, wakabateka bakokeshi ha mutu ha bantu, bakokeshi ba bantu tshinunu ne ba bantu lukama ne ba bantu makumi atanu ne ba bantu dikumi

Bikala bakuabo bamuangalake tô ne ku ditengu dia diulu, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabasangisheku, neabahingisheku kabidi; ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealue n enu mu buloba bua batatu benu, ne nuenu nenubuhiane; yeye neanuenzele bimpe, neanuvudishe ha mutu ha hatatu benu
Tshidi tshilondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya mbulamatadi pamwe ne nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi
Kabavua mua kunua mayi avua muaba awu, bualu avua ne bululu
Kakuena muntu udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke buowa ne dishina kudi bena buloba buonso bunudi nudiata ku makasa, bu muakanuambileye
Biajidileye budimi buandi ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mushinga wabu newikale bu muakatuanganabo
Palô wakakolesha mutshima wandi musangu eu kabidi, yeye bakalekela bantu bua kuyabo

Mose ne Alona ne bana bandi balume nebashikame ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena ku luseke lua ku esete kudi diba dihatuka, bua kulama nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bia Bena Isalele; bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
Wewe ujidike nshila ya ku mukuna, wambile bantu ne, Nudimuke, kanuyi ku mukuna, kanûlengi tshianza, muntu udi ulenga mukuna tshianza nebamushihe
Tatu wetu wakatuambila ne, Yai bienu kabidi, nutusumbile tuntu tua kudia tukese
Bakabikila Lebeka, bakamuebesha ne, Udi musue kuya ne muntu eu, anyi
Tshisamba tshia Ngade:
Kadi ndi munupeshebu bua benze midimu idi itangila ntenta wa kusambakena
Yeye wakenzela Abalama bimpe bua bualu buandi, wakamuha mikoko ne ngombe, ne balume ba nyama ya mpunda, ne bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, ne mashina a nyama ya mpunda ne tumelo
Yeye ke unudi nujana
Bualu ditunga edi dia Are, ndi mumane kudipesha ndelanganyi ya Lote

Hakashika matuku a madilu, Yosefe wakambila ba mu nsubu wa Palo ne, Bingikala ne luse ku mesu kuenu, ndi nnusengelela ne, Nuambile Palô ku matshu andi ne, Tatu wanyi wakuntshihisha ne, Hanafua unjike mu muaba unakasumba mu buloba bua Kanâna
Diampa adi badikose mu bitupa, bela kabidi mafuta pa bitupa abi, bualu mmulambu wa bintu bia mu budimi
Wakenza kabidi mabaya makumi abidi a kuteka ku luseke lua ku nôde, ne masoso a tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai, masoso abidi mu dibaya dimue masoso abidi mu dibaya dikuabo
Tuakuenza lelu bu muakamba Yehowa bua kunubuikidila bubi
Bakaya nunku, bakatentekela buloba ku tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Lehoba udi mu nshila wa ku Hamata
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele mei au onso, ne mitshima yabo yakanyingalala bikole

Bakenzela Alona ne bana bandi balume bikowelu bia lin, ne bifulu bia lin, ne bilulu bikuabo bia ha mutu, ne mihanu ya lin, ne mukaba wa lin ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû, mudimu wa bantu ba lungenyi lule, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Au mmatuku a kudia bidia bia Yehowa, matuku a tshijila andi musue wewe ubamanyishe ku bikondo biau
Arone kumiamina mashi awu ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Abalahama ne Sala bakadi ne bidimu bia bungi, bakadi bakoke, miloû ya bakashi yakashika kudi Sala
Nebatekepu malongu masalama, makopu, malongu mondoke ne tukopu tua kulambuila maluvu
Nedishale bupianyi buebe ne bua ndelanganyi yebe
Nenudie bidia nunku ku mesu kua Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso, nenuenze bualu ebu mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanutengule mu mitshima yenu ne ya bana benu, bua nuenu kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bua nuenu kuikala ne muoyo
Tshianana ndi mua kubashipa
Bu mu dî dia Alona ne bana bandi balume Bena Gêshona nebenze mudimu wabo, nebatuale majitu abo; nuenu nenubaleshe majitu abo
Kadi tshisamba tshienu netshikale tshia batuangaji, bantu bajidila, badi bangenzela mudimu
Kutupatulaye mu Ejipitu bua kutufikisha mu ditunga edi, divuaye musue kutupa, bu nuwuaye mulaye bankambua betu
Mukashi wakamba ne, Nyoka wakundinga, nakudia
Nuntendelele, nuditshipe anu mu dina diende

Nenumuhe Eleazâ muakuidi, yeye nealue n andi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, nebamushihe ku mesu kuandi, ne Eleazâ muakuidi neangate mashi andi ku munu wandi, neamiamine mashi ku luseke lua tshibuelelu tshia ntenta wa kusambakena misangu muanda mutekete
Mashi avua mu ditunga dionsu dia Ejipitu
Muntu nansha umwe keena mwa kubumbusha mu njila wabo bwa kumwenzelabo mudimu yêye nkayende anyi bwa kwenzabu midimu idi imusankisha yêye
Padibu balambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa bobumue, bua mapiku nansha bua budisuile, munyinyi awu baudie dituku adi
Nenkuhe wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe buloba buonso bua Kanana bûdi wendakanamu, bu buhianyi buenu bua tshiendelele, nengikale Nzambi wabo

Masanka a mu Buloba bua Mulayi Nunku nutumikile mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne bukole, ne bua nuenu nubuelemu, ne bua nuenu nuhiane buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana; ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu bua kubahabu ne tunkanunuma tuabo, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Alambule kabidi kilo isatu ya bukula busambakaja ne mafuta, kabidi ne mafuta tshitupa tshia litre
Sara kusanka wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu mmunsekeshe
Ndi nya kusomba mutantshi mule nebe

Alona wakangata dilonga diandi bu muakamba Mose, wakaya lubilu munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia bantu, ne monai, disama dikole diakamana kubanga munkatshi mua bantu, yeye wakatekahu musenga wa manananshi bua kubuikidila bantu bubi buabo
Bena tshisamba etshi tshia Kekate, bavua base mitanda yabu, luseke lua kuinshi kua nzubu wa tshijila
Yakoba wakamukuatshila mudimu to bidimu muanda mutekete bualu bua Lakele, ne bidimu ebi biakadi bu anu matuku makese bualu bua dinanga diakamunangeye n adi
Nanku nansha wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe, nansha bobu bena Levi, kanuakufua to
Ei idi nyama mudi mua kudia: ngombe ne mukoko ne mbushi, mbashi ne kabuluku ne ntole ne mbushi wa ha mpata, ne lusumbi, ne ngulungu ne mukoko wa mu mikuna
Wakabuesha lungenyi lua kuyisheye n alu bantu mu mutshima wandi, ne yeye ne Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kwenza bisangilu kabiyi ndululu ne bia lufu budi bwanyishibwe kadi anu mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bia mulowo
Kadi bilumbu binene bavua baye nabi kudi Moshe
Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia mbingu ei muanda mutekete ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne diha didi mitshima yenu misue kufila mu bianza bienu, bu muakanuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, disanka
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bikala tatu wandi mumutuile lute ku mesu, yeye wakadi kushala ne bundu matuku muanda mutekete, nansha
Yehowa katangidi tshintu tshibi munkatshi muenu, kasesuki kunudi
Wakela Alona manyi ha mutu handi, wakamujidila
Lewitiki Bukoya bua Mubidi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele ne, Hahatuka tufina mu mubidi wa muntu, tufina atu tudi tubi
Nsuki yende ayi, neayele mu kapia, muaba udibu bosha mulambu wa bobumue
Maweja Nangila kubabutula, bualu bavua bapepeje ditunga adi
Kumuasaye tshifulu ku mutu

Ku luseke lua ku nôde kabidi, enza bilulu bidi bituangane to ne ku coudées lukama, ne makunshi makumi abidi ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi; bitubuidi bia ku makunshi nebikale bia argent
Sara kumvuaye buowa, kuyila wamba ne: Tshiena museke to
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Lemeke, Metushela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Mose wakasaya tshimpanga, wakosha mutu ne bituha bia munyinyi ne dianyi
Agare kusomba ku mpenga, udila muadi
Abrame kudiela mutu panshi
Kadi padi mutuangaji utshikenketa, umona ne: dikeji adi kadiena ditampakane tshintu tshijima, udi utuma diyi bua basukule tshintu atshi
Nanku mpata ayi too ne ku Soware ivua bu lupangu lua Paradizu, mifuanangane ne tshibanda tshia Nile
Bakenza mabue a onyx, bakabuesha mu masoso a or, bakafundahu mena a bisamba bia bana ba balume ba Isalele
Biamukuatabo mu munya, nebamusombuele, yeye neahingashe bintu, ne bikaleye kayi ne bintu, nebamuhane bua buibi buandi

Bintu bionso biakadi ha buloba biakafua, ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne nyama ne bintu bionso budi bidikoka hanshi ne muntu yonso, bintu bionso biakadi ne muhuya wa muoyo munda muabi bia ha buloba bume biakafua
Binuenda mu nshila mdi muhidie, kanuyi nunvua mei anyi, meme nendiundishe makenga enu mahite mibi yenu misangu muanda mutekete
Mutuangaji neakenkete muaba udi disama

Nomba Kutomboka kua Kola Kola, muana mulume wa Yiseha, muana mulume wa Kohata, muana mulume wa Lewi, ne Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, ne Ono, muana mulume wa Pelete, bana balume ba Lubena, bakabika ne Bena Isalele bakuabo ne bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu bu nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, bantu bakadi ne lumu lunene, bakadisangisha bua kufuilangana ne Mose ne Alona, bakabambila ne, Nudi nutamba kudienzela malu, bualu bua bantu bonso mbantu ba tshijila ne Yehowa udi munkatshi muabo nuenu nudi nudibandisha ku mutu kua bantu ba Yehowa munyi
Kadi hakatshiabu Bena Isalele bonso bakatontolola Mose ne Alona ne, Nuenu nuakushiha bantu ba Yehowa

Budi bwangata mu bitupa biônso, bu mudi mu tshitupa tshia maalu a bweena mwaabo, a tshidiidi, a bubanji, a nsombelu ne a bunkambwa, mapangadika ônso adi akumbana bwa kujadika divunguluka dijima dia mukaji ne ditwisha diende dia maboko ku ditantshisha dia ditunga
Genese Hakatangila Lakele ne, Tshiena ndelela Yakoba bana, hashishe Lakele wakadi ne mukulu andi mukau, wakambila Yakoba ne, Umpe bana, anyi meme nenfue
Udi wimanyika midimu yeenda padiye umutwadila mukanda wa didilekeela dia mudimu wa beena bukalenga bunene

Lumingu Ludi bu Tshimanyinu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele kabidi ne, Nuenu nuvuluke matuku anyi a Lumingu dituku edi didi bu tshivulukidi hankatshi hetu ku bikondo bienu bionso bualu bua kunumanyisha ne, Meme ndi Yehowa wakunujidila
Nakambila Yoshua ku tshikondo atshi ne, Mesu ebe akatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bakelenge aba babidi: Yehowa nênzele makelenge onso nunku a kunudi nuya
Balaka wakaya ne Belâma ku mutu kua mukuna wa Peô, kuakatangileye ku tshihela
Noa wakatabala ku muoyo wandi, wakamanya bu muakenza muan andi wa mukala
Yeye wakamba ne, Udi tshihe kundi yeye wakaditshiha Isalele wakashindamina mutu ku mutu wa bulalu
Mikalu ya mapa aa idi anu eyi idi mielela bisumbu bia tshidiidi biônso ne midimu yaabi kudi Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu
bintu biabo bilondeshila Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kujadika ne kwenza mushindu wa se bisamba biônso bia ditunga bikala bisomba pamwe mu ditalala ne mu bulongame
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kulonga kalasa
Hakakumbana ngondo yandi, mona, bana ba mahasa bakadi munda muandi
Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi ne dikanyika dia kusungila ditunga ne bujima bwa malaba mu dîba dia njiwu anyi dîba didibo badiêla mvita kudi beenyi
dikuba dia bisumbu bia bantu badi kabayi ne makanda
Nomba Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Ungashile bioshelu muanda mutekete, undongoluele balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete
Palô Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Yai bienu, nushihele Nzambi wenu nyama mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nuenu kusemena kuinshi kua mukuna
Bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba nebipetele diakalenga ku ndelanganyi yebe, bualu witabi mikenji yanyi

Kanuikadi ne luevene mu nsubu yenu to matuku muanda mutekete, ne muntu yonso udi udia bintu bia luevene, nebamumushe munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele; nansha bikaleye muenyi anyi muntu muledibue mu buloba
Aye nende muaba wa tshijila, ateke tshianza pa mutu pa ngombe awu, amukosele muminu mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Bangate muana mulume wa ngombe ne mulambu wandi wa bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, wewe newangate muana mulume wa ngombe mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Nuitabe bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila wenu munuambile, bua nuikale bena diakalenga, nushale ne muoyi matuku a bungi mu ditunga didiye unupesha
Maweja Nangila kumuleja tshitupa tshia mutshi
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuela di difume mu diulu ne, Abalahama, Abalahama, yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Nanku biakudia bionsu, too ne mayi a kunua, nuikale anu misumba
Kadi bikalaku muen andi, yeye kena ne bualu bua kumufuta
Meme Maweja Nangila ndi njadika bualu ebu
Tshipwita wa ditunga yônso badi bamusungula ne bantu babidi badi mwa kumupingana
Enza mabaya asambombo a kutoka ku wesete ku luseke lua ku nyima
Mana akadi bu ntete ya kolianda, akadi afuanangana ne bedola
Bana balume ba Lewi bakenza bu mu di dia Mose, bantu bakafua dituku adi bu binunu bisatu
Hashishe muan a bute udi mukashi eu ulela nebamuidike dina dia muan abo wakafua; bua dina diandi kadijiminyi mu Isalele
Muntu eu Mose wakadi ne kalolo be, wakatamba bantu bonso ba ha buloba ne kalolo
Neumushe dianyi dionso, neadioshe ha tshioshelu
Dîyi dilongolodi didi disunguluja ngikadilu wa bakoshi ba nsambu
Dutelonone Muaba Umuehele wa Kutendelela Yehowa Â mmalu ne mei anudi ne bualu bua kutumikila mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, munuhe bua kubuhiana matuku onso a muoyo wenu ha buloba
Ekesode Mulau wa Mikumbi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, bualu bua nakakolesha mutshima wandi ne mitshima ya bantu bandi bua kulesha bimanyinu bianyi munkatshi muabo
Kadi bikala ditoba ditoke tô dishale mu muaba wadi, kadiyi ditampakane, etshi ntshibangu tshia tshima, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane
disonsola dia midimu ya dikolesha lungenyi ne ya manaya mu polovensa;
Binualua ne mulambu wa kusakidila n au Yehowa, nufile bua nuikale bitabushibue
Awu kuimita difu, kulela muana, dina diende Enoke
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka bimunyi binene bibidi: diba bua kutokesha mu munya, ngondu bua kukenkesha butuku
Ke muvua bena Izrayele ne bua kuambula bukula bua mampa buvuabu bamane kusopa, buanga kabuyi buanji kubandisha ditapi
Mose wakabika, wakaya kudi Datana ne Abilama, ne bakulu ba mu Isalele bakamulonda ku nyima
Kadi Maweja Nangila mmununange
Kena muitabe diyi dia Moshe ne Arone bu muvua Maweja Nangila mudianjile kuamba
Bialueye nkayandi, neaye biandi nkayandi, bikaleye mubake, nunku mukashi wandi neaye n andi
Nuenu nenutendelele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye neayudishe disanka ku bidia bienu ne ku mai enu, nennumushile disama munkatshi muenu
Kabidi mikuabu kayena mua kumueneka kabidi bungi abu to
Bakamuela mu lukanu, bualu bua kabakamanya dî dia Yehowa diakasueye kungenzela
Wakasankisha ikale biandi ne disanka, ne wakuela mulau ikale biandi ne mulau
Bana ba balume ba Lea bakadi Lubena, muan a bute wa Yakoba, ne Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisaka ne Zebuluna
Wakamukudimuna ne, Aba mbana bakuha Nzambi muntu webe mu luse
Hakaya mushete ku mpala, Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa, bika biebe, bantu badi n ebe lukuna batangadishibue, bantu badi n ebe tshiji banyeme ku mesu kuebe

Hashishe bakadisangisha tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kuelangana ne Mose ne Alona, baka tangila ku ntenta wa kusambakena, ne monai, difutu diakamubuikila ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka, Mose ne Alona bakatua ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Bakumukaku, bakaya ku Gudugoda; ku Gudugoda bakaya ku Yotebata, muakadi buloba bua tusulu tua mai

Mutuangaji alamune mafuta onsu a ngombe awu: bu mudi mafuta adi malamate ku bia munda, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu adi malamateku, mafuta adi malamate ku mulemba, ne lutandatanda ludi ku mutshima, ludibu balamuna pamue ne tuonyi
Nebenze mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena pa muaba wa bena Izrayele bonsu, bua kukobolola bena Izrayele
Kanulami kabidi mampa mela buanga, nansha buanga bua mampa mene, mu ditunga dienu dijima
Lubena wakambila tatu wandi ne, Udi mua kushiha bana banyi balume babidi, binahanga kumuhingasha kudi umufile mu tshianza tshianyi, ne meme nemmuhingashe kûdi kabidi

Numanye bienu lelu ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu udi bu kahia kadi kabutula bionso; yeye nembashihe, neabahoneshe ku mpala kuenu: nunku nenubihate, nembajimishe lubilu, bu muakanuambila Yehowa
Ndi ntendekena mukelenge wanyi adianjile ku mpala kuanyi, nenkulonde bitekete bitekete, bu mudi luendu lua bimuna ne lua bana bindi n abi, to ne hanafika kudi mukelenge wanyi ku Seî
Idi dishiya dia Yadene mu nshila wa kudi diba dibuela, mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna bakadi bashikama mu Alabâ, hehi ne Gilegala, hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mole
Bena Izrayele kumuka muaba awu, kuyabu ku Ngudengoda
Nuangate mabeji a mutshi wa isope
Wakashiha mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi ne yeye wakâmiamina ku tshioshelu
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mua kukobolola muena nsudi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Bua nuenu kukobolola muntu uvua ne nsudi, nuye nende kudi mutuangaji
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Enza biebe nyoka ne mubidi bu kahia, umuteke kulu kua mutshi, nunku hamutangila mundi musumibue, neikale ne muoyo
Biwasangana nansha ngombe nansha mpunda bia muntu udi n ebe lukuna biya ha bule, uhingashe nyama wandi kudiye kabidi
Nudi mua kulua ne bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, kadi bintu ebi kabiena bu bintu bidi bitua dihembu ha tshioshelu
Arone kubambuluila bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Kuladi ne mulume bu mudibo balala ne mukashi, bualu ebu budi bubi
Nanku nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, miaba yonsu inudi nusomba, kashidi ne kashidi kanudi mashi nansha mafuta to
Kadi ndi nditshipa ne: bu mundi ne muoyi, kabidi bu mudi buloba bujima buwule ne butumbi buanyi, muntu nansha umue wa ku ndelanganyi eyi kakubuela mu Kenaane to
Wewe newambile Bena Isalele ne, Manyi au neikale ku mesu kuanyi bu manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu ku bikondo bienu bionso
Bafika ku Dane, Abrame kuabanya bantu bende mu bisumbu
Utshiteke hehi ne tshilulu tshidi ku mushete wa Nzambi, ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshidi ha mutu ha mushete, kundi nsangakena n ebe
Bena Isalele bonso nebunvue lumu elu, nebatshine, kabena benza bualu ebu bubi kabidi munkatshi muenu
Hashishe Palô wakabikila Mose ne Alona lubilu, wakamba ne, Nakuenzela Yehowa Nzambi wenu bualu bubi ne nuenu kabidi
Neubapeshe mudimu wa kulama nzubu wa tshijila, muaba udibu bateke mukanda wa ndondu, bintu bionsu bia kuasa nabi nzubu awu, nansha bintu bia kukuata nabi mudimu mu nzubu awu
Ba ha mutu habo nebambile bantu ne, Nganyi wakuasa nsubu muhia muhia, ne kena muanze kunjidila
Muntu awu afile nyunyi ayi kudi mutuangaji bua ayele mulu, ayinyukule, ayilambule Maweja Nangila
Dituku dikuabu, Esawu ufuma ku dipata nyama mu tshisuku, mupungile ne nzala, kusanganaye Yakobe mulamba nsupu wa nkunde
Bu munuvua kanuyi baya ne mashi a nyama ewu munda mua ntenta wa kusambakena, nuvua mua kudila munyinyi ewu muaba wa tshijila, bu mumvua munuambile
Bungi bua misoko mudi nuha Bena Lewi neyikale makumi anai ne muanda mukulu, nenubahe misoko ei ne buloba budi buyinyunguluka
Katataka ya kuebe, nakadi ngelangana meji bua kukuha butumbi bunene, kadi mona, wewe wakubavudishila butumbi ebu
Kusukulaye kabidi bia munda ne bikonu, kubitenteka pa milambu mikuabu ya kuosha ivua pa tshilambuilu

Nakamumanya bua yeye ayishe bana bandi ne ba mu nsubu wandi bimpe, bua bobo baye mu nshila wa Yehowa bua kuenza malu makane ne malulame, nunku Yehowa neamanye mua kuenzela Abalahama malu onso akamuambileye
Yeye wakamuitaba ne Ndi Yakoba

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi, wakalekesha tshiji tshianyi kudi Bena Isalele, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne mukau bu mukau wanyi munkatshi muabo, nunku tshiakashiha Bena Isalele bonso ne mukau wanyi
Nenuanyike milambu ha kahia, nenuyidie mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nenualukile dinda, nuhingane mu ntenta yenu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yosefe ne wa mu tshisamba tshia Manashe, Gadi, muana mulume wa Susi
Bakasesuka, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana, ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakaya ne bantu bandi bonso bua kusangana n abo nvita ku Edelei
Nowa mayi ku makasa, nulale
Nebabidie amu kudi bena diku diebe, balume ne bakaji, badi kabayi ne mikiya
Nengendakane munkatshi mua bimuna biebe lelu, nengumushe bionso bidi ne matoba, ne mikoko yonso idi mifike, ne mbushi yonso idi ne matoba, bintu ebi nebikale difutu dianyi
Bikunyibua bikuabu bivua pa madimi kunyanguka bualu bikavua bimane kupatula miepu, biela ne bilongu
Igale, muana wa Yozefe, wa mu tshisamba tshia Isakare
Dikenga dia tshitema: midima Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola tshianza mulu, midima yenzeke mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, midima mikole mipite idi bantu bafuane kukuata mu bianza
Bakumuka mu Moselota, bakashikama mu Bene yâkana
Pashishe bantu bakuabu nebabambuluishe bua kumushipa
Kadi mu meku enu amu bantu balume, bana nansha bakulumpe, badi mua kuyidia, bualu idi ya tshijila
Yehowa atemeshe mpala wandi kunudi, anufuile luse
Nuenu bonsu badi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, bavua banubadike, banufunde mena enu
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Bena Lewi bakabuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kuenza mudimu ku mpala kua Alona ne kua bana bandi balume, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Lewi, bakabenzela nunku
Kadi badi bamubenga, udi ubanyoka lukasa, ubabutula
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mukoko wa mulambu wandi, neanshihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Bana balume ba Nafatale ku meku abo Yasele ne meku a Bena Yasele; Guni ne meku a Bena Guni; Yesê ne meku a Bena Yesê, Shilema ne meku a Bena Shilema
Wele manananshi ku mulongo ne ku mulongo, manananshi neikale bu tshivulukidi ha mampa bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia

Mose ne Eleazâ bakabambila mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne mai a Yadene batangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Nubale bungi bua bantu ba mu bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Bena Isalele bakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Meme kushala ku mukuna matuku makumi anayi a munya ne butuku, bu musangu mukuabu
Bena mudimu ba mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kutuuta bena Izrayele bavua benzeja bantu mudimu, babambila ne: Bua tshinyi kanuena benze madiotu bungi bua tshibidilu bu munuvua nuenza matuku onsu
Neoshe dianyi dia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ha tshioshelu
Nuenu nuakahingana, nuakadila ku mpala kua Yehowa; kadi Yehowa kakunvua dî dienu, kakateleja matshu andi kunudi
Ke tshimvua meme Maweja Nangila ne bua kunuambila
Kadi wewe Moshe ushale pabuipi nanyi, bua nkuambile meyi ne mikenji bionsu bia kumanyisha bena Izrayele, bua babikumbaje mu ditunga dindi mbapesha
Tuetu kushisha kunyenga bimenga biende bionsu, kubibutuilamu, kushipa balume, bakaji ne bana
Panuvua mu tshipela, Maweja Nangila ke uvua munulame bua kunufikisha muaba ewu
Tshitupa atshi tshidi tshia tshijila, bu mudi tshitupa tshia ku mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu, nansha wa dinua tshibalu
Mukalenga mupiamupia, uvua kayi mumanye Yozefe, kudia bukalenga mu Ejipitu
Dituku ditanu Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Mu mayi muikale minyinyi mishilangane, kabidi nyunyi ibuke mulu mu tshibuashibuashi
Kuabanyinaye bakulu ba bena Izrayele abu, tshitupa tshia bukole bua Mueyelu wende, buvuaye mupeshe Moshe
Nebanutengule, ne bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanyinu tshia tshihungidi tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe
Umukoleshe ku muoyi, ashindike muoyi wa munda
Dina dia muakuny andi diakadi Yubala, yeye wakadi nkambua wa badi bimba bisanji ne nshiba
Meme nensangakeneku ne Bena Isalele, ne tshitendelelu netshikale tshiedibue ku butumbi buanyi
Genese Badi Basombuela Kuoneka kua Dina Dina, muana mukashi wa Lea wakaleleleye Yakoba, wakaya bua kumoneye bana ba bakashi ba mu buloba abu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Igala, muana mulume wa Yosefe
Kumuinyikilaye lukasa mulondu mu diboku
Dîyi didi difila bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya balumbulwishi
Ulekele bantu banyi bena Izrayele baye kuntendelela
Kadi Lote kubasengelela bikole
Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
kwepuka matandu ;
Pavuabu badia, Abrahame uvua muimane kulu pabuipi nabu, muinshi mua mutshi
Hakatshidi munyinyi mukana, diambedi bobo kabayi banze kûdia ku menu, tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bua bantu, ne Yehowa wakasamisha bantu bikole
Sipola wakangata dibue ditue, wakatengula muan andi mulume, wakateka dikoba ku makasa a Mose, wakambila Mose ne, Bulelela, wewe udi bayanyi wa mashi
Mmumfikishe ne mu diku dia mfumuanyi
Nunku ndi nkutendekena ne, Witabushe bua muntu webe ashale kunoko bu muhika webe mu muaba wa nsongalume, ne nsongalume ahingane ne bana babo
Nanku nenuikale bena diakalenga
Moshe kubuikila mpala, bualu uvua utshina bua kutangila Mvidi Mukulu
to ne ku
Kabadi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi udibo balue n au ne mashi mu ntenta wa kusangakena bua kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu mu muaba wa tshijila, nebawoshe ne kahia
Bakaya ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Bena Efelayima, ne Elishama, muana mulume wa Amihuda, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Nanku, Moshe kuinyika Osheya, muana wa Nune, dina dia Yoshuwa
Bena Ejipitu kusungula bamfumu ba mudimu bavua ne bua kuenzeja bena Izrayele mudimu mukole bua kubatekesha
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua manvua bua mukuenu, nudi mua kutula manvua mu tshianza, kadi kanutahi manvua a mukuenu ne muele
Nakumuebesha ne, Wewe udi muana wa nganyi
Mbimpe tupingane mu Ejipitu

Mose wakambila Kola ne, Unvuai, bana balume ba Lewi: nudi nuelangana meji ne bualu ebu budi bukese bua Nzambi wa Isalele wakamujidila munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua nuenu nulue ha buihi n andi kumukuatshia mudimu mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bua kukuatshila tshisumbu tshonso mudimu kabidi, yeye wakanuhatula ne bana benu bonso ba Lewi ha buihi n andi, nuenu nudi nudikebela mudimu wa buakuidi kabidi, anyi

Kadi mu bualu ebu buonso kanuakatumikila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakaya ku mpala kuenu mu nshila bua kunukebela muaba wa kushimika ntenta yenu, mu difutu dikenka kahia butuku, ne mu dî tulu dia diledi munya, bua kunulombola mu nshila unuakadi ne bualu bua kuenda
Kanungu ka Beena mu Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa badi ne mwânzu wa batshipwita bakulumpa ba mabala
Midimu eyi, ke itshidibu benza too ne mpindiewu
Edi ndî diakamba Yehowa bualu bua bana bakashi ba Selofehada ne, Bobo babakibue kudi balume hadibo basue, kadi babakibue kudi balume ba mu meku a tshisamba tshia batatu abo
Eu udi mudimu wa meku a bana balume ba Bena Gêshona mu ntenta wa kusambakena ne bintu bidibo n abi bualu nebikale mu tshianza tshia Itamâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi
Bua Ashe yeye wakamba ne, Ashe asanke biandi ne bana, ikale ne diakalengele kudi bana babo: atue dikasa diandi mu manyi
Kabena mua kuboza mufuba wa mukoku to
Kadi Oge, mukalenga wa Bashane, ne tshiluilu tshiende tshionsu, kutubunda pabuipi ne tshimenga tshia Edreyi
Kadi badie mulambu awu kabayi bela buanga bua mampa

Muntu mukuabo kikadi mu ntenta wa kusangakena hayeye kufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi mu muaba wa tshijila ne bubi bua ba mu nsubu muandi ne bubi bua Bena Isalele, tô ne hahatukeye mu nsubu
Bavua balama kabidi makunji a lupangu ne bitaku biawu, milonda ne mionji

Muntu yonso udi ulenga muntu mufue bianza, mubidi wa muntu mumane kufua, ne kena udilengesha, yeye udi wona nsubu wa Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bualu bua kabakamumiamina mai a kumulengesha n au, yeye kena wikala muakane, ne bubi buandi butshidi ham bidi handi
Arame kulela bana ba balume aba: Use, Ule, Ngetere ne Masha
Pashishe kulelaye kabidi Ebele muakunyi wa Kayine
Mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu udi mwa kuteekibwa pa tshitupa anyi pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia Ditunga bwa matuku makumi asatu

Bana balume ba Melali bakabalabo ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku bidimu makumi atanu, buonso buabo bakadi benza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo ku meku abo bakadi binunu bisatu ne nkama ibidi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Nabi, muana mulume wa Wofesi
Pashishe kubikilaye bakulu ba bena Izrayele makumi muanda mutekete, kubimanyika ku ntenta wa kusambakena
Nunku bantu bakadi bamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bua kukeba bisonsa
Mai akatamba kuvulangana ha buloba, ne mikuna mile yonso idi muinshi mua diulu yakabuikidibua
Bobu bumvue lumu luenu, nebazakale, banutshina
Bikala nyama muhandibue bihese, yeye nealue ne munyinyi wandi bu tshimanymu tshia bualu, ne yeye kena ufuta bua nyama muhandibue
Bakangata butue bua mu tshikutu, bakimana ku mpala kua Palô, Mose wakabumiamina mulu, buakenzesha bantu ne nyama mputa ya mbalanga ham bidi
Biakabuela mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, bu muakamuambila Nzambi, ne Yehowa wakamuinshidila tshibi
Nebenze mudimu mu nzubu awu
Alona wakabambila ne, Nukuohole nkanu ya or idi ku matshu a bakashi benu ne a bana benu ba balume ne a bana benu ba bakashi, nulue n ai kundi

Muntu udi ne tshitshu, udi uhidia kunvua dî dia muakuidi udi muimane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumukuatshia mudimu, anyi dî dia mulumbuluishi, nebashihe muntu eu: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Bakidika muaba au ne, Tabela, bualu bua kahia ka Yehowa kakatema munkatshi muabo
Bakenza bilulu ebi bionso ne buanda bua lin muimpe
Kanudi bintu bidi kabiyi biakane

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi ihingishilula bintu mukana, anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke kamelo, bualu bua kadi kahingishilula bintu mukana, kabidia, kadi kakena ne mikono mihanduluke, kakena kakane kunudi

Bikala mulume eu wa ku nyima mumukine, mumufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka kabidi, mumuheu mu bianza biandi, mumûmushe mu nsubu wanyi, anyi biafua mulume eu wa ku nyima wakamuangata bu mukashi wandi, mulume wa diambedi, wakamûmusha mu nsubu wandi, kena mua kumuangata bu mukashi wandi kabidi, bualu bua mukashi wakumana kunyangisha; bualu ebu budi bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa

Mose wakabanda ha mukuna kudi Nzambi, ne Yehowa wakamubikila mu mukuna, wakamba ne, Wewe newambile ba mu nsubu wa Yakoba nunku, neumanyishe Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu nuakutangila malu anakenzela Bena Ejipitu, ne bu munakanutuala ha mahuahua a nyunyu wa mukanku, bu munakalua n enu kundi meme

Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso tshikondo atshi, tuakahaula musoko ne musoko muakadi bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese: katuakashiya nansha muntu; kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna, ne bintu biakadi mu misoko ituakanyenga
Ekesode Tshioshelu tshia Musenga wa Manananshi Ek
Pikala muntu mupele munkatshi mua bana benu, mu tshimenga tshia ditunga dianupesha Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, unusomba tshintu, kanumuiminyi to
Tshipwita wa ditunga udi uleeja mpala wa ditunga
Nealambule muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue bua mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu
Kabidi Sara wanjadikidi ne: Abrahame ntutu
Tangilai, Yehowa udi muena diulu dikuabo didi ku nyima kua diulu, ne muena buloba ne bintu bionso bidimu
Kubambilaye ne: Umbushayi bitalu bia bana benu muaba wa tshijila, numuke nabi mu mitanda bua kubijika
Tshiabu tshidibu natshi, mbua kuenzela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mudimu, bu muvuaye mumane kubambila
Pashishe kufuaye
Maweja Nangila ukavua mumane kuambila Moshe bua kumanyisha Arone ne: Pikala muntu mukuabu muoshile Maweja Nangila musenga wa kamonya, neapete dinyoka bu dia Kora ne bonsu bavuaye nabu

Eu udi mukenji wa nyama ne wa nyunyu ne wa bintu bidi bienda mu mai ne bintu bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, bua kutahulula bintu bibi ne bintu bimpe, ne bintu bidi ne muoyo binudi mua kudia ne bintu bidi ne muoyo binudi kanuyi mua kudia
Eyi ke mikenji idi itangila milambu ya kuosha, milambu ya bintu bia mu madimi, milambu ya kukobolola nayi bantu, milambu ya dinua tshibalu, milambu ya dibanjija ne milambu ya bobumue
bûngi bwa bantu, bintu ne dibadika;

Biumusha muntu tshibuikidi tshia ha mutu ha dina, anyi biumbuleye dina kayi uteka tshibuikidi ha mutu, ne biahonamu ngombe anyi kabalu, muena dina neashikishe bualu bimpe, neahe muen abi biuma, ne nyama mufue neikale wandi
Nanku nenudie nukute
Ke kuoshaye mafuta awu pa tshilambuilu
Hakunvua Abalama lumu ne, Bakaya ne muan etu, yeye wakaya ne bahika bandi bakadiye mueyemene bakadi baledibue mu nsubu muandi, nkama isatu ne dikumi ne muanda mukulu, wakabihata to ne ku Dana
Nuenu nkayenu nudi bajadike muvua Maweja Nangila munuambule, bu mudi muntu wambula muanende mu njila, too ne munudi bafike muaba ewu
Bakabatekela tuhita, bakabakengesha ne mudimu

Mose wakamanyisha Bena Isalele, bakelenge babo bakamuha milangala dikumi ne ibidi, mukelenge mulangala wandi mukelenge mulangala wandi, bu mu nsubu ya batatu abo, ne mulangala wa Alona wakadi munkatshi mua milangala yabo
Tama wakaya, wakashikama mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Meme nenguwuje buloba ne mayi a tshipupu, bua kubutula bionsu bidi ne muoyi pa buloba

Wakaluhuka mu ntenta wa Lea, wakabuela mu ntenta wa Lakele Kadi Lakele wakamana kumusha mpingu, wakayiteka muinshi mua biseba bia tumelo, wakashikama ha mutu hai Labana wakakeba ne bianza, kakayisangana
Moshe kubambila ne: Mpindiewu ndi ne bua kuenza tshivua Maweja Nangila muambe
Muntu kai munkatshi mua bantu bonso wakunvua dî dia Nzambi wa muoyo, diakafuma munkatshi mua kahia, bu tuetu tuakulua, ne wakashala ne muoyo
Pelabu mpungi ayi ibidi musangu umue, bantu bonsu basemene pabuipi nebe mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena

Nuenu bena Izrayele, nuvua bafikishe kabidi Maweja Nangila munda ku Tabera, ku Masa ne ku Kibrote Taawa, Kabidi ku Kadeshe Barneya pavua Maweja Nangila munutume bua kukuata ditunga divuaye munulaye, kanuvua batekemene kudiye to
Kadi katukebi njiwu ya lufu
Munudi nuditemba, nuditeka kumpala kua bantu bakuabu ba Maweja Nangila mbishi
Bialua mukuenu muntu muhele, biahaneye tshituha tshia buloba buandi, ne bialua bana babo bua kubuhikula, badi mua kuhikula buloba buakahanabo kudi muan abo
Mose wakafunda mikenji ei, wakayifila mu bianza bia bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne kudi bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele

Badi babupeesha bilumbulwidi ebi : kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu,Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, Kabadi ka kulu ka basalayi, tubadi ne tubinadi twa basevila ne basalayi pamwe ne palake idi milamata ku bilumbulwidi abi
Bansongakaji kupingana pambelu
Moshe kuya kuakidila tatuende muenu, kutua binu panshi kumupukila
Bualu yeye mudidile Maweja Nangila, nenuikale bena tshibawu
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue buakadi coudées makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées mai, bilulu bionso biakadi ne budi lumue
Meku a Bena Gêshona nebashikame ku nyima kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku wesete
Mitshi ya bimuma idi itolokamu anyi
Yehowa wakunvua

Kanungu ka Bûngi bwabi mu tshipidi tshiônso, midimu ya kutuma dîyi dîba diônso ne miaba yônso idi ne tshia kulondeshila bipangidikilu bilelela bitangila popamwe dikumbana dia mubidi, dia kalasa kalonga, bibidilu bîmpe pamwe ne dileeja dia mpala dia momumwe dia polovensa ne polovensa
Ku luseke lua ku esete wakenza bilulu tô ne ku coudées makumi atanu
Muntu yonsu udi usemena ku nzubu wa Maweja Nangila, udi ufua
Bukalenge bwenji bwa mêyi kabweena mwa kukosa bilumbu bidi bitangila bilumbulwidi anyi kukudimuna dipangadika dia bilumbulwilu anyi kubenga ne kabadikumbaji to
Pashishe mashi onsu adi ashala, mutuangaji ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha tshidi ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta
Nuenu nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene ku mesu kua Yehowa
Pashishe ntuadile kamanda nkutshi ne nkudimba
Akiyezere, muana wa Amishadayi, ke uvua ulombola bena Dane
Kanuena mua kumpitshishila diba to
Moshe kubaleja bishima
Butshia dinda, lume kutalaja miaba yonsu ivua pabuipi ne mitanda yabu
Netusangishe minyinyi yonso ya mu mai manene bua kubadisha, anyi
Bikondo bikuabo ditutu diakimana ku mutu kua nsubu matuku makese, hashishe bakashala mu tshitudilu bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa, ne bakaya ku luendu bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Moshe kuolola tshianza pa mayi
Bena Ejipitu kabakunua kabidi mayi awu to
Bavua benda batangile mu tshimenga muvua Nahore musombe mu tshitupa tshia ku mutu kua misulu mu ditunga dia Mezopotamiya
Wenze bionsu bidi bikengela bua wewe kudikobolola, kukobolola ne bena Izrayele bonsu
Nanku ndi nkutumina diyi ne: umulekele, aye kuntendelela
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu

Nanku, mutuangaji udi osha tshilamba atshi, nansha tshiotshi tshilamba tshia mushindu kaayi, nansha tshiotshi tshia pambidi, nansha tshiotshi tshienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha tshienza ne ndanda, nansha tshiotshi tshia biseba
Wakahingana kudiye, ne mona, yeye wakadi muimane ha buihi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia, yeye ne miloho ya Moaba yonso
Kanuena mua kusumbisha muntu buloba bua yeye kuikala n abu tshiendelele, buloba buonso mbuanyi, ne nuenu nudi bu benyi ne bena luendu ku mesu kuanyi
Arone umutangila, kujadikaye ne: Miriyame udi ne disama dia nsudi
Hashishe, kahita ka bena maluvu wakambila Palo ne, Ndi muvuluke dihanga dianyi lelu
Kuimanyinabu pa bule kuinshi kua mukuna
Mukuabu ikale mulambu wa kuosha
Wewe newangate tshimpanga tshia tshijila, ulambe munyinyi watshi ne mai a kahia mu muaba wa tshijila
Bwa bidi bitangila bweena ditunga, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi anu mwimanyina pa lungenyi luludiki lwa kabumwe ne lwa mukawu wa bweena ditunga dia Kongu
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Mona, nakubanga kufila Sihona ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshienu, bua nuenu nuhiane buloba buandi

Nomba Mikenji ya Milambu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanualua mu buloba buenu, bundi munuhe, ne hanuafila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bua kushikisha kuditshiha, anyi mulambu udi mitshima yenu misue kufila, anyi mu matuku anudi nudia bidia bia disanka, bualu bua kumusha dihembu kudi Yehowa, nansha mulambu wa ngombe nansha wa mikoko, muntu udi ufila mulambu neafile mulambu wa bukula bubotesha bu tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshimue, busangisha ne tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho dia manyi
Biahuoleye dinu dia muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi, yeye neamumushe ku buhika buandi bualu bua dinu diandi
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa: Alona wakela mulangala wandi hanshi ku mesu kua Palô ne bantu bandi, ne mulangala wakakudimuka nyoka
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe kabidi ne: Ambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, alekele bena Izrayele bumuke mu ditunga diende
Nanku, meyi ne mikenji bindi nnuambila lelu, nubilame bimpe, nubikumbaje
Kanukunyi mutshi wa Ashela hehi ne tshishihelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshinudi badiashile
Abimeleke wakabika ne dinda dionso, Wakabikila bantu bandi bonso, wakabambila malu au onso ku matshu abo; ne bantu bandi bakatamba kutshina
Kadi mukalenga Sihone ewu kubenga bua tuetu kupitshila mu ditunga diende
Genese Dibutuka dia Sodoma ne Âmola Banjelo aba babidi bakafikaku Sodoma dilolo Lota wakadi ushikama ku tshibi tshia ku Sodoma
Ke muvua bena Izrayele bapawule bintu bionsu bivua bena Ejipitu nabi
Muntu yonso wa mu budimi udi ulenga mundi wakafua ku muele wa nvita bianza, anyi mubidi wa mundi mufue, anyi mufuba wa mundi, anyi lukita, neikale bu mundi udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete
Tshiakudia tshiebe neutshipete anu pawenza mudimu mukole matuku onsu audi ne muoyi pa buloba
Nzambi wakambila Isalele mu bikena kumona mu butuku ne, Yakoba, Yakoba Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku

Mose ne Alona ne bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele bakabala bana balume ba Bena Kohata ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku makumi atanu, muntu yonso wakadi ubuela mu mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena bakabalabo ku meku abo bakadi binunu bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi atanu
Ashe neikale ne bintu bia kudia bia bungi, neavudishe bintu bia kudia bidi bitambe bilengele
Bena Isalele bakashala mu Ejipitu bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu
Yehowa wakela dî kudi Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ne mulangala webe ha mutu ha misulu ne ha mutu ha tusulu ne mashiba bualu bua kutuma biula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Ada kulela Yabale
Padiye umona mpusu mitampakane mubidi mujima, neambe ne: muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya, bualu mubidi wende mujima mmuandamuke mutoke
Biwasombesha mukuabo muhele wa munkatshi mua bantu banyi argent, kumubadi bu muena dibanza, kumulombi tshia kasombelu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanuambuluishe bua nutekeshe bisamba ebi
Yeye kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu
Nanku nulambe biakudia munudi basue
Meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo dituku adi bulelela, bua malu mabi akenzabo, hakakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo
Mutuangaji neambule mulambu wa kukobolola nawu muntu awu

Alona neafile muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi, neadibuikidile bubi ne bua bantu ba mu nsubu muandi, neashihe muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi
Numunemeke, nutumikile mikenji yende, numulamate, numuenzele mudimu
Mikenji eyi, ke ivua Maweja Nangila muakule ne diyi dikole, wambila bena Izrayele ku mukuna wa Sinayi
Pashishe ulambule milambu ya bena Izrayele
Obabe kubenga, wamba ne: Tshiena mua kuya nenu to
Hagâ wakalelela Abalama muana mulume Abalama wakidika dina dia muana wakamulelela Hagâ ne, Yishemaele
Mose wakamba ne, Nenye kutangila bualu ebu bua kukema ne, Munyi katshi kakena kahia
Uvua mumfikile munda bikole bualu buenu, unkandika ne: Kuajiki
Pikala muntu mufue lufu lua tshikosu pabuipi nende, matuku ende a tshijila mmanyanguke, bualu udi ne mikiya bua tshitalu atshi
Bakambilangana ne, Monai, muena bilota njowa ulua
mianda ya nzubu ya mu tshimenga ne ya mu musoko, ya bulongolodi ne bulami bwa njila ne bintu bia tshibûngi bia polovensa ne misoko;
Kuhungi n abo tshihungidi anyi ne nzambi yabo
Wikale wenda kumpala kua bantu
Bobo nebatumikile dî dianyi, bua biahidiabo, nebadituadile bubi buabo, nebafue meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Ndimba yonsu ivua mu nzubu, mu mbanza ne mu madimi kufuayi
Abrahame kuandamuna ne: Ndi nkupa bana ba mikoku aba muanda mutekete bua bakuvuluije ne: uvua mumbule tshiina tshia mayi etshi ngAbrahame

Bikala muan enu mulume, muana mulume wa mamu webe mene, anyi muan ebe mulume anyi muan ebe mukashi, anyi mukashi webe ûdi unanga, anyi mulunda webe wa ha mutshima webe, mukusesuishe mu musokoko ne, Tuye bietu, tuenzele nzambi mikuabo mudimu, inudi kanuyi bamanye, nansha wewe nansha batatu benu; nzambi ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu, anyi badi ha bule ku luseke lumue lua buloba tô ne ku luseke lukuabo; kuitabushi, kunvu dî diandi, kumuleshi luse, kumusungidi, kumusokoki; kadi umushihe bulelela; wewe umukuate tshianza bua kumushiha diambedi, ne ku nyima bantu bakuabo bonso nebamukuate

Kadi biahidiabo ditalala, ne bialuanganabo n enu, hashishe nenubatshintshimike; ne hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu aba mu bianza bienu, nenushihe balume bonso ne miele ya nvita; kadi bakashi ne bana bakese ne bimuna ne bintu bionso bia mu musoko, nenudiangatshile ebi; nuenu nenudie bintu bionso bia badi n enu lukuna, bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe
Nufile milambu ya ku budisuile, bilondeshile bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila munuenzele

Bualu bua nudi bamanye bu mutuakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne mutuakahita munkatshi mua bisamba biakadi mu nshila; ne nuenu nuakatangila malu mabi abo ne mpingu yabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue ne ya tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or yakadi munkatshi muabo; bua muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu, nansha mulume nansha mukashi nansha diku dia bantu nansha tshisamba, udi akudimuna mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kukuatshila nzambi ya bisamba abi mudimu; ne bua muji udi ukuama mamuma a mulungu ne a bululu kawikadi munkatshi muenu
Bualu kapia aka ka tshinyangu kadi mua kutubutula
Dutelonone Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Hahita bidimu muanda mutekete nenulekelelangane bintu
Nenukuate bimenga biabu bidi ne bimana bitumbuke mulu
Kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi ke bunene ne polovensa
Ngadi, muana wa Sushi, wa mu tshisamba tshia Menashe, muana wa Yozefe
Padi nsuki ya pa lubombu ituka, upeta dibala muaba awu, kena mupie mikiya to
Kukonkaye muena mudimu wa Abrahame ne: Muntu udi mutuvuile mu mpata bua kutuakidila nnganyi
Tshiena mua kumonangana nebe kabidi to
Udi uleeja mpala wa ditunga ne udi tshimanyinu tshia bobumwe bwa ditunga
Nyama idi ne mikiya idi nunku: nyama idi kayiyi ne mikonu mipanduluke, kayiyi ipingaja bintu mukana, ibidia kabidi
kashintu, dienza dia kashintu ne bukola bwaaku bwa kujikija mabanza;
Nanku munkatshi muenu kamuakuikala bapele to, panuikala bitabe meyi ende, bakumbaje mikenji yende yonsu indi nnuambila lelu eyi
Nanku nyama ya mu bikumbi inudi mua kulambula mu tshibilu etshi nyoyi eyi: ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji
Ndi mubangate pa muaba wa bamuanabute ba bena Izrayele
Hanuafika mu buloba bulualua Yehowa kunuha, bu muakalayeye, nuenze tshilele etshi
Muntu yonso udi kayi ujadika mei a mikenji ei bua kuyenza udi ne mulau
Bakabika ku mukuna wa Yehowa, bakaya mu luendu matuku asatu, ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa wakaya ku mpala kuabo matuku asatu bualu bua kubakebela muaba wa kuikisha
Yehowa wakaha bantu dikasa dimpe ku mesu kua Bena Ejipitu, bakabaka bintu biakabalombabo Bakahaula Bena Ejipitu
Yeye wakalala n andi butuku abu
Hashishe nuenu nuakangambila ne, Tuakuenzela Yehowa bibi, netuye, netuluangane, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu

Hakatangila Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi, bualu ebu, yeye wakabika munkatshi mua tshisumbu, wakangata difuma mu tshianza tshiandi, yeye wakalonda ku nyima kua Muena Isalele mu nsubu wakababambakasha bubidi buabo, Muena Isalele ne mukashi Nunku disama diakalekedibua munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Tuvua bamane kukuambila ne: Utulekele, tuikale bapika ba bena Ejipitu
Mukashi wakamuebesha ne, Wewe neungeyeke tshieya to ne hawamutuma, anyi
Nuenu bena Izrayele mwuluke ne: nuvua ku bupika mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Neutshiteke hankatshi ha tshitendelelu ne tshioshe lu, newelemu mai
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Kababikidi dina diebe ne Yakoba kabidi bakubikile dina ne Isalele bualu bua wewe wakuluangana ne Nzambi ne bantu, wakahatula bukole
Bafika mu budimi, Kayine kukuata muanabu Ebele kumushipa
Kabidi bua wewe kujadika ne: ndi mulame bantu banyi nansha mu ditunga diebe mene, tshiakutuma njiji mu Ngoshene to, bualu mmuaba udibu basombe
Ekesode Yetelo Udi Usomba ne Mose Yetelo, mubuki wa Midiyana, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakunvua malu onso akenzela Nzambi Mose ne Bena Isalele, bantu bandi, ne muakalua Yehowa ne Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu
Wakadi tshilembi tshikole ku mesu kua Yehowa, bantu bakadi bamba bu lusumuinu ne, Bu Nimeloda, tshilembi tshikole ku mesu kua Yehowa

Wambile bantu aba ne, Nenuhite mu buloba bua bana benu, bana ba Esau, badi bashikama mu Sei; bobo nebanutshine, nudimuke bienu; kanutandanganyi n abo, bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba buabo, nansha kaba ka bunene bua dikasa dia muntu; bualu bua nakamana kuha Esau mukuna wa Sei bu buhianyi buandi
Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, nebatengule muana wa balume
Muntu asaye ngombe awu, akosolole munyinyi
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Mpindiewu ndi muimane ku mpokolu wa mayi
Baluishi kumona bukole buebe

Aba mbana ba Bileha, wakaha Labana Lakele muan andi mukashi yeye wakalelela Yakoba bana aba buonso buabo bakadi muanda mutekete Bantu aba bonso bakalua ne Yakoba mu Ejipitu bonso bakahatuka munda mua Yakoba, kababadi bakashi ba bana bandi bakadi makumi asambombo ne basambombo, ne bana ba balume ba Yosefe bakamulelelabo mu Ejipitu bakadi babidi, bantu bonso ba mu nsubu bakalueye n abo mu Ejipitu bakadi makumi muanda mutekete
Tuetu tuakadi tuiba argent anyi or mu nsubu wa mukelenge webe munyi

Bakatshitekahu milongo ya masoso a mabue mai mu mulongo wa kumudilu bakateka mabue a sardoine ne topaze ne émeraude, mu mulongo muibidi mabue a rubis ne saphir ne calcédoine, mu mulongo muisatu mabue a opale ne agate ne améthyste, mu mulongo muinai mabue a chrysohthe ne onyx ne jaspe
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakenza malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Bana ba balume ba Yefete badi: Ngomere, Magoge, Madayi, Yavane, Tubale, Mesheke ne Tirase
Abimeleke ne Ahuzata, muanda wandi, ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakumuka ku Gelâ, bakaya kudiye
Badi babadika bûngi bwa mêyi adi anyisha mukanda wa dimanyika anyi wa dieela mpata udibo mwa kwanyisha anu padiku tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beena mu Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Kadi bantu bakolola bianza biabo, bakakoka Lota mu nsubu kudibo, ba kinshila tshibi
Wewe newenzele Alona ne bana bandi balume bu mudi mei onso anakukuambila, ubajidile matuku muanda mutekete

Nzambi wakamuambila mu tshiota ne, Bulelela, ndi mumanye ne wewe wakuenza bualu ebu mu buakane bua mu mutshima webe, nakakuhidisha kabidi bua kuenza bualu bubi ku mesu kuanyi, nunku tshiakuitabusha bua wewe kumulenga tshianza
Wewe neuyikile handi, neuteke mei mukana muandi, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe ne mukana muandi, nenkuyishe malu anudi mua kuenza
Bualu mmulambu udibu boshila Maweja Nangila onsu kashidi, ushile
Ku butshiama bua luhangu ku luseke lua ku wesete, enza bilulu bidi bituangane tô ne ku coudées makumi atanu, ne makunshi dikumi ne nkanu dikumi
Mvidi Mukulu kumuambila ne: Ndondu undi ntua nebe udi nunku: Newikale nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi
Beena ku Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi babateeka, babumbusha anyi babiipata ku mudimu kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga, panyima pa dianyisha dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga

Haditshiha mukashi kudi Yehowa, anyi halayeye mulayi wandi, hatshidiye mu nsubu wa tatu andi, ku bunsongakashi buandi, biunvua tatu wandi kuditshiha kuandi, biahuwa tatu wandi kudiye, nunku kuditshiha kuandi kuonso ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Nennuhe ditalala mu buloba, nenulale tulu, ne bantu kabena banutshinyisha, nengihate nyama mibi mu buloba buenu, ne kabena balue ne muele wa nvita mu buloba buenu

Bilulu biakadiye n abi, nansha tshilulu tshiakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko nansha tshilulu tshia lin, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama ya miosa ya mikoko anyi ya lin, nansha mu tshiseba anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, bikala bintu bifike anyi bikunze mu tshilulu anyi mu tshiseba anyi mu milongo ya buludi anyi mu milongo ya butshiama anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, edi ndisama dia nsudi, nebaleshe disama edi kudi muakuidi
Argent wa Buhikudi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hawabala bungi bua Bena Isalele, muntu ne muntu afile bintu bia kuhikula n abi muoyo wandi kudi Yehowa; bua makenga makole kâbakuatshi hawababala
Kanudisangishidi manananshi adi atua dihembu nunku ne bintu ebi, manananshi au neikale a tshijila kudi Yehowa
Kanubafuidi luse to
Nenubutukemu
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka kalongu ka , Dîyi dikulu dia Bukalenga bwa Tshisabu dia mu dia a lwabanya ndifwa
Pashishe nuyifunde ku mishiku ya mbelu ya nzubu yenu, ne ku biibi bia bimenga bienu
Bantu badi n enu lukuna nebanukokele, nuenu nenudiate mikuna yabo mu makasa enu
Bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu bavua pabuipi nabu, bumvue mbila ya miadi yabu, kunyemabu ne bowa, bamba ne: Buloba budi mua kutujibikila petu

Hashishe hakajimina bena nvita bonso, hakafuabo munkatshi mua bantu, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Lelu nenuhite ku Ala, butshika bua Moaba: hanualua ba buihi ne Bena Amona, kanubatatshishi, kanuluanganyi n abo; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba bua Bena Amona bu buhianyi buenu, bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba abu bu buhianyi buabo
Mutuangaji atue munu mu mashi awu, aalabe ku matumba matalame adi ku tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha
Bela wakafua, ne Yobaba, muana wa Zela, muana wa Bosela, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Wewe kupikula bantu bebe
Bualu bukuabo, wewe kuena muanze kulua n etu mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, kuena mutuhe buhianyi bua madimi ne madimi a tumuma, udi musue kuvuisha bantu aba bafofo, anyi
Pikala bantu aba bafue lufu lua patupu mudi bantu bonsu bafue, nanku nenujadike ne: Maweja Nangila kena muntume to
Bavua basa nzubu ne tushole, bibake pamue ne kabudimbu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu kunupatula
Palo wakamba ne, Yehowa nganyi
Bialala mulume ne nyama, nebanshihe yeye ne nyama kabidi
Bakalenga ba bisamba bishilangane nebapatukile ku ndelanganyi yende
Dituku dia muanda mutekete ndia Dikisha, dia kunnemeka anu meme Maweja Nangila
Nomba Alona Udi Utemesha Minda Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Hawatemesha minda minda muanda mutekete neyikale ku mpala kua tshitekelu tshia muinda
Kudinabu too ne panshi pa mayi, bu tshiamu tshia bujitu
Munyi mudi Bena Ejipitu mua kuamba ne, Yeye wakabaluhula bua kubenzela bibi, ne bua kubashiha ku mikuna, ne bua kubajimisha ha buloba
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne, Ndi nnutendekena ne, Semenai ha buihi n anyi
Nenushihele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mulambu wa kuhita kua Yehowa, wa mikoko ne wa ngombe, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Wewe wakambila bantu bebe ne, Luai n andi kundi, bua meme kumonangana n andi ku mesu
Kuambilaye Kora ne bonsu bavuaye nabu ne: Malaba dinda, Maweja Nangila nkayende neatumanyishe muntu udi wa tshijila, udi mua kusemena pabuipi nende
Yosefe wakabambila ne, Adi ndi dinakunuambila ne, Nudi batentekedi, nennutete ku bualu ebu, ndi nditshiha ku muoyo wa Palô ne, Kanuena numuka kunoko anu hanualua ne muan enu, muan a mukala kunoko
Bana balume ba Isalele bakenza nunku, Yosefe wakabahesha makalu bu muakamba Palô, wakabaha bintu bia kudiabo mu nshila
Hakatantamaneye, muana umue wakahatula tshianza, ne muleleshi wakasuika muonshi mukunze ku tshianza tshiandi, wakamba ne, Yeye wakaluhuka diambedi
dikebulula dia mamanya ne bidi mwa kwenza nabi midimu;
Nuenze mitshi yenu ya tumuma tukese nunku ne mitshi ya olive kabidi

didi dikosoloja makookeshi pankatshi pa bukalenga Mianda idi anyi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene anyi ku bukookeshi bupalakaja bwa bukalenga bunene ne polovensa, anyi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa
Lemeke kuambila bakaji bende ne: Ada ne Sila, telejayi diyi dianyi
Bualu bua hakayabo mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatangila buloba, bakahangisha mitshima ya Bena Isalele, bua bobo kabayi mu buloba buakabahabo kudi Yehowa
Dîyi dilongolodi didi dileeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya masungulangana mu ditunga
Miriyame kupeta disama dia nsudi, mitoke too bu mudi busu bua ndanda

Abalahama wakangata Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, ne bana bonso bakaledibua mu nsubu wandi, ne bantu bonso bakasumbibua ku argent yandi, bantu balume bonso ba mu nsubu wa Abalahama bakatengudibua dituku adi mene bu muakamuambila Nzambi
Hanuaditshiha ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuhangi kushikisha mitshihu yenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealombe bua nuyishikishe; ne bualu ebu nebuikale bubi kunudi binuahanga kuyisbikisha
Nunku Mose wakahueka kudi bantu, wakabamanyisha
Kukungujabu ndimba ayi mishiki ne mishiki
Alona neafile mbushi wakakuatabo kudi nshobo wa Yehowa bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi

Bena Isalele bakamuambila ne, Netuye anu mu musesu munene, bituanua mai ebe nansha tuetu nansha bimuna bietu, netukufute, anji kuitabusha bua tuetu tuhite anu ha makasa etu, katuena bienza bualu bukuabo
Bialala mukashi ne nyama, nebashihe mukashi ne nyama kabidi, mashi abi neikale ham bidi habi
Nenushale ne muoyi matuku a bungi panu
Bualu nudi bana ba Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nuenu nuikale bantu ba tshijila, bu mundi meme wa tshijila

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale bungi bua bana balume ba Gêshona kabidi ku nsubu ya batatu abo ne ku meku abo; ba bidimu makumi asatu tô ne ku bidimu makumi atanu wewe neubabale, buonso buabo badi bakuata mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Nenuhikule ban a bute benu ba mpunda ku muan a mukoko; binuikala kanuyi nubahikula, nutshibule nshingu yabo
Kuenji tshimfuanyi tshia tshintu nansha tshimue, nansha tshidi mulu mu mavuba, nansha tshidi panshi pa buloba, nansha tshidi mu mayi adi muinshi mua buloba
Bualu udi ne disama dia nsudi, dimuenekela mu tshibangu tshia tshiwuja

Bintu abi, bidibu bumusha ku milambu idibu balambula Maweja Nangila, nebikale bia Arone ne bana bende, biangatshile dituku didibu babajidile ku mudimu wa butuangaji bua kukuatshila Maweja Nangila mudimu
Nzambi wakabaha tula mu Ejipitu, yeye udi ne bukole bu nyama wa mbowa
Yeye kena tatu wenu wakanuafuka, wakanuenza, wakanujadika, anyi
Dia Arone divua munkatshi mua makombu dikumi ne abidi aa
Bavua balama kabidi mionji yonsu ya kuasa nayi ntenta
Matuku onsu avuaye mumane kudijidila awu, kabena baabale kabidi to, bualu mmamane kunyanguka
Ke mena a bimenga ebi: Beshere mu mpata ya mu tshipela bua bena Rubene; Ramote mu ditunga dia Ngilaade bua bena Ngade; Ngolane mu ditunga dia Bashane bua bena Menashe
Kadi bikala mputa mutampakane hakashikisheye kudilengesha, muakuidi neamutangile, ne bikala mputa mutampakane mu dikoba, muakuidi kena ne bua kukeba nsuki mitoke tô, muntu eu kena muakane
Arone kuya, usangana Moshe ku mukuna wa Mvidi Mukulu
Bana balume ba Yuda ku meku abo
Matempu ne ngombe ebi, nebakuate nabi mudimu bua ntenta wa kusambakena
Tshibangidilu Izake udi usela Rebeka Abrahame kukola kukulakaja
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku, ne bobo bakaluhuka ne muena bihendu ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bakamukuma ne mabue Bena Isalele bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kadi bu wewe mua kupeta bantu bakane anu makumi anayi ne batanu, batanu bakuabu kabayiku, neubutule tshimenga tshijima bua batanu abu anyi

Bana ba Dana ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Dana binunu makumi asambombo ne bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete
Padi mulume mubuelele mukaji mu nzubu, bonsu babidi nebowe mayi mubidi mujima
Nutangile mudi bena ditunga: badi ba bungi anyi mbakese
Bualu mudi dituku difundile tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila anyi
Mulombodi yonsu kuangata dikombu diende
Bukula bua ku mulambu budi bushale, babuangate anu kudi Arone ne bana bende ba balume
Udi ulombola Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bilwilu

Tangilai, nakuteka muoyo ne malu mimpe, ne lufu ne malu mabi ku mpala kuenu lelu; mukenji unakunuelela lelu bua kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne mikandu yandi: nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenukumbane ba bungi, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba bunuyaya kubuhiana

Muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu udi utambisha muan andi mulume anyi muan andi mukashi mu kahia, nansha mutempi wa mbuku, nansha muena dijimbu nansha muena bilengulengu, nansha muena buloshi, nansha musesuishi wa bantu ne miloû yandi, nansha mutendeledi wa bakishi, nansha muena muhongo, nansha muena lubuku lua muzangu
Dituku adi bana ba bakaji abu kupueka bua kusuna mayi a kuela mu luvu bua kunuisha bimuna bia tatuabu
Muntu yonsu udi mudipile nkayende mikiya, padiye udia munyinyi wa mulambu wa bobumue, udibu balambula Maweja Nangila, nebamuipate munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Mose wakababala bu mu dî dia Yehowa
Tela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Abalama ne Nahô ne Halana
Bialueye ne muana wa mukoko bu mulambu wa kubindila n au bubi, nealue biandi ne mukashi wa mukoko udi kauyi ne tshilema
Buatu buikale ne musonga, kadi pankatshi pa musonga ne bimana pikale ntanta wa santimetre makumi atanu
Dilama dia muntu mu tshimana kadieena mwa kupita mêba makumi anayi ne mwanda mukulu to
Ke pamvua muimanshe mabue abidi amvua nawu ku bianza, muatshibule, nuenu batangile
Pashishe neangate mitshi ya sedre, bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama bilaba kakula, mabeji a mutshi wa isope pamue ne nyunyi uvua mushale ne muoyi

Kadi biahangeye kumuhikula diambedi tshidimu tshimue katshiyi tshianze kuhita, nunku nsubu wa mu musoko udi munyungulula ne lumbu neikale kudi wakamusumba tô tshiendelele, muena nsubu kena uhingana mu nsubu halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Mose wakalua, wakamanyisha bantu mei onso akamba Yehowa, ne mikenji yandi yonso, ne bantu bonso bakitaba dî dimue ne, Mei onso akutuambila Yehowa netuênze
Mabaya abidi neikale ne mpoko ibidi bua kutuângasha, enza mabaya onso a tshitendelelu nunku
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu Wakabikila baleleshi, wakabambila ne, Bualu kai nuakuenza nunku, nuakusungila bana ba balume
Bakangata bintu bionso bia bantu ne bia bimuna kabidi
Kadi Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, yeye kena mungunvuile; Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kuakushika, kungambidi bualu ebu kabidi
Kababaki mukashi wa masandi ne munya nguke anyi mukashi wakahidiabo kudi mulume wandi yeye udi wa tshijila kudi Nzambi wandi
Nenusangane kabidi nzubu miuwule tente ne bintu bia bubanji binuvua kanuyi bunguije, biina bia mayi binuvua kanuyi bumbule, mitshi ya mvinyo ne ya olive inuvua kanuyi bakune
Muntu yonso udi uhidia kujinga mu mutshima wandi dituku adi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Pashishe bangabanga ne kulambula Maweja Nangila mukata awu, wikale mukosolola bitupa, bualu mmulambu wa dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Kuendi masandi
Maweja Nangila kuitaba bivua Moshe umulomba
Moshe kubambila ne: Bintu ebi mmampa adi Maweja Nangila munutumine bua nuenu kudia
Kadi kupetabu pabu Mueyelu wa Mvidi Mukulu
Yeye wakamba ne, Katataka Yehowa wakutuenzela muaba, netukumbane mu buloba
Nzambi wakabiteka mulu mua diulu bua kutokeshayi buloba, ne bua kukokeshayi mu munya ne butuku, ne bua kutahululayi munya kudi midima, Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe
Hashishe Mose ne Alona bakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele

Nzambi Udi Umueneka kudi Yakoba ku Betele Yakoba wakabika ku Be sheba wakaya mu nshila wa ku Halana Hakafikeye ku muaba mukuabo yeye wakalalaku butuku abu, bualu bua diba diakamana kubuela, yeye wakangata dibue diakadi ku muaba au, wakasamahu mutu wandi, waka lala tulu
Bituadije dituku dimvua mubutule bamuanabute ba bena Ejipitu, ndi muangate bamuanabute ba bena Izrayele bua bikale banyi ba tshijila
Bualu bidi mulambu wa dinua tshibalu, udibu boshila Maweja Nangila, ushile
Lote kuya kuambila baku bende, bavua babangile bana bende ba bakaji, ne: Jukayi lukasa, numuke mu tshimenga etshi, bualu Maweja Nangila mmusue kutshibutula
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Mvidi Mukulu mumane kujikija mudimu uvuaye muenze, kuikishaye dituku dia muanda muteketa
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nakuitabusha bualu ebu kabidi, tshiena nshiha musoko eu uwakulombela
Hakatshiabu muan a bute wakambila muan a mukala ne, Butuku bua lelu nakulala ne tatu wanyi, tumunuishe nvinyo butuku ebu kabidi, wewe ubuele, ulale bandi, bua tuetu tulelele tatu wetu bana
Bobo nebadie, muntu tshituha tshiandi muntu tshituha tshiandi ku mutu kua buhianyi bua batatu abo buakahanabo
Nebikale n anyi ne mpata musangu bule munyi bua malu a kukema onso anakenza munkatshi muabo
Kusululabu bilamba biabu, kumushabu mikiya
Anu nuenu nenusabuke musulu ewu, bua kukuata ditunga dimpe, didi dishiya dia musulu ewu
Yeye mumane kudisanga ne Mvidi Mukulu nanku, Mvidi Mukulu kumuambula, kuya nende, Enoke kayi umueneka kabidi pa buloba to
Ku luseke lua ku wesete wakenza bilulu to ne ku coudées makumi atanu, ne makunshi dikumi, ne nkanu dikumi ne bitubuidi bia argent dikumi
Ndi munumushe ku midimu mikole inuvua nuenzela bena Ejipitu
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Bisamba ebi bidi bituhita bunene, nembihate munyi
Wakenza efoda ne or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin muimpe
Padi mulume ubanda mukajende, nansha yeye mudinyange bushuwa, nansha kayi muende, neafikishe mukajende kudi mutuangaji
Nanku tunuishe tatu wetu maluvu
Lakele wakamba ne, Nzambi wakundumbuluila, wakunvua dî dianyi kabidi, wakumpa muana wa balume; nunku yeye wakamuidika dina ne, Dana
Wakabuesha mitshi ei mu nkanu ya ku nseke ya tshioshelu, bua kutshituala n ai, wakashiya munda muatshi mutuhu

Tshimuangi MVIDI MUKULU UDI UPATULA BENA IZRAYELE MU EJIPITU Bena Izrayele badi mu bupika mu Ejipitu Bana ba balume ba Izrayele bavuaye mufike nabu mu Ejipitu, muana yonsu ne bena diku diende, badi nunku: Rubene, Shimeyone, Levi, Yuda, Isakare, Zebulone, Binyamine, Dane, Naftali, Ngade ne Ashere
Hakadibo baya mu nshila wa ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, Yehowa wakasangakena n andi, wakamba kumushiha

Tshipwita munwamwanka yônso wa ditunga anyi tshipwita mukulumpa yônso udi udiumbukila ku diswa diende mu tshisumbu tshiende tshia tshidiidi mu tshikondo tshia bukalenga mudiye amu badi bamutangila bu udi mubeenga butshipwita budiye mupetela mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi atshi
Maweja Nangila mmunupeshe nyama ewu bua nukobolole bena Izrayele ku malu mabi adibu benza
Teka luhanza luanyi lua argent mu tshibombi tshia muana muakunyi ne argent yandi kabidi Yeye Wakenza bu dî dia Yosefe
Dina dia muana mukashi wa Ashê diakadi Sela
Dikombu dia Arone Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ela mukenji bua mulombodi wa tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele akupe dikombu

Eku nkulondolola kua malu a Yakoba Hakadi Yosefe ne bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete, yeye wakadi udisha bimuna ne bana babo Yeye wakadi nsongalume wakadi ne bana ba balume ba Bileha ne Zilepa, bakashi ba tatu andi, Yosefe wakalua ne lumu luabo lubi kudi tatu abo

Muntu wakadi muhanduke mu bianza biabo wakaya, wakamanyisha Abalama, Muena Ebelu, wakadi ushikama hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mamale, muena Amole, muan abo ne Eshekola, muan abo ne Ane, bobo bakalamatangana ne Abalama
Kabeena mwa kupiisha muntu bwa bwaalu anyi bwa tshipwa mooyi tshidi tshikala tshibawu dîba divwatshio tshienzeka ne dîba dia dipiishibwa
Udi wangata mapangadika mu mukanda wa alete
Mbimpe kutshinyangakaja, bualu ntshipie mikiya
Tshipepela atshi kupandulula mayi manene, buloba buma kumueneka
Nufunde mena a bantu balume bonsu, badi ne bidimu bituadije ku makumi asatu too ne ku makumi atanu
Bantu bakakonka Lota ne, Bantu bakuabo badi n ebe anyi
Kujiminabu munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Kutumaye kabidi nyunyi wa nkudimba bua kujadika dipueka dia mayi pa buloba
Bu wewe muenze bimpe, uvua ne bua kuikala ne disanka
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ nebashikame hehi n andi
Anu yeye ke Musungidi wanyi
Bakumuka mu Libina, bakashikama mu Lisa
Mpindiewu ndi mujadike bua kukutumina makenga a mishindu yonsu, wewe ne balombodi ba bukalenga kabidi ne bantu bebe bonsu, bua ujadike ne: pa buloba bujima kakuena mukuabu, amu meme
Bintu bia kudia kabiakadi mu buloba, bualu bua tshiole tshiakatamba bukole, nunku bantu bonso ba mu Ejipitu ne ba mu buloba bua Kanana bakamba kufua ne nzala
Kuendi masandi
Yeye waka tuma nyunyu wa nkutshi bua kumanyeye ne mai akahueka ha buloba

Lufu lua Ban a Bute Hakalua mundankulu Yehowa wakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu, muan a bute wa Palô wakadi ushikama ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tô ne ku muan a bute wa muntu wa mu nsubu wa lukanu, ne bana bonso ba bute ba bimuna
Yehowa Nzambi wakangata mulume, wakamuteka mu budimi bua Edene bua kubuihileye ne bua kubulama
Bidimu abi nkama inayi ne makumi asatu bikumbana, dituku dia tshivulukilu, bisamba bionsu bia bena Izrayele kupatuka mu Ejipitu balondangane bimpe mu milongu
Lewitiki Milambu ya Kuikisha n ai Ditalala Bikala mulambu wa mundi wa kumuvuisha n au ditalala, yeye neafile muana wa ngombe, nansha mulume nansha mukashi, udi kayi ne tshitema, ku mesu kua Yehowa
Bakafika nunku dituku dia dikumi ne ditanu dia ngondo muibidi hakumukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Muntu ne muntu wakangata bintu biandi bia nvita; nuakamba kuya ku mikuna

Kanungu ka Padi tshingenyingenyi anyi tshialwa kwikala dîyi batshiamba kudi Bukalenga bunene ne tshidi tshia kutangila pa lukasa, badi batshilondeshilula kumpala kwa biônso mu tshibambalu ne tshibambalu kudi Kasumbu kadi kakumbanyina maalu awu bilondeshila bulongolodi buleeja mu mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu
Wakungambila ne, Yeye udi muan etu wa bakashi, bua meme kumuangata bu mukashi wanyi bualu kai
Kumupeshabu kabidi ne biakudia
Kabidi bena Levi, badi basa mu bimenga bienu, kabayi ne wabu muaba wa kuasa munkatshi muenu, nebasanke pabu
