Bungi bua ban a bute balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mutekete ne basatu
Bena Kenaane kupanga tshia kuenza

Mvidie ya dishima Dituku dikuabu, pikala muambi nansha muntu udi Mvidi Mukulu uleja malu munumuenekela, nnumanyisha tshishima, tshishima atshi tshienzeka bu muvuaye munuambile, muntu awu unuambila bua kutendelela mvidie inudi kanuyi bamanye, kuyenzela mudimu, kanumuitabi to
Hakumukabo ku Lefidima ne hakafikabo ku tshihela tshia Sinai, bakashikama mu tshihela, Bena Isalele bakashimika ntenta ku mpala kua mukuna
Kamuangatshi to
Badi babukumbaja kudi midimu ya mbulamatadi, ne biâpu ne midimu idi mifwanangana nayi
Nemeka tatuebe ne mamuebe, nanku neulale bidimu bia bungi pa buloba bundi meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe mukupeshe
Bakashiha bakelenge ba mu Midiyana kabidi: Evi ne Lekeme ne Sû ne Hû ne Leba bakelenge batanu ba Midiyana bakashiha Belama, muana mulume wa Beô, ne muele wa nvita kabidi
Mose ne Alona bakabuela mu ntenta wa kusangakena, bakaluhuka, bakavudishila bantu disanka, butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudi bantu bonso
Nzambi wakavuluka Lakele, Nzambi wakamunvuala, wakajilula munda muandi
Nuanji kulala bienu kunoko butuku ebu kabidi, bua meme kumanya dî didi Yehowa ungambila kabidi
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu

Nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi, tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai, bualu bua mibi yenu muakenza, hanuakenza bualu ebu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha tshiji
Abrame kumukonka ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, neumfute tshinyi
Mabue akadi bungi bua mena a bisamba bia Bena Isalele, dikumi ne bibidi, bakafundahu mena a bisamba bia Bena Isalele dikumi ne bibidi ku mulongo wa tshisamba ne tshisamba
Metushela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne muanda mutekete, wakale la Lemeke

Buonso buenu nudi nuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, lelu; ne ba ku mutu kuenu, bisamba bienu, bakulu benu, tuhita tuenu, ne balume bonso ba mu Isalele, ne bana benu bakese ne bakashi benu, ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ne batatu ba nkunyi ne basunyi ba mai; bua nuenu nubuele mu tshihungidi tshidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muhunge n enu ne mu kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muditshihe n enu lelu, bua yeye anuitabushe lelu bu bantu bandi, ne bua yeye kuikala Nzambi wenu, bu muakanuambileye, ne bu muakalayeye bankambua benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba
Yehowa wakatamba kusankisha mukelenge wanyi, yeye wakulua muntu munene, wakumuka bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe, ne argent ne or, ne bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, ne tumelo ne nyama ya mpunda
Mukalenga awu, kikadi ne tubalu tua bungi
Wewe neushimike tshitendelelu bu mudi tshileshilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna
Heshebona wakadi tshimenga tshia Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi uluangana ne mukelenge mukuabo wa Moaba, wakanyenga buloba buandi buonso mu tshianza tshiandi to ne ku mai a Ânona
Dilongu dionsu disalame, divua ne bujitu bua grame
Bakenza bintu bia kuteka ha maha bua kutuishangana bituha bia efoda bibidi
Kadi bialeleye muana wa bakashi, yeye neikale mundi udi kayi muakane tô mbingu ibidi, bu matuku a tshijila tshiandi, neikale ne mashi a kudilengesha kuandi tô matuku makumi asambombo ne asambombo
Bobo bakamuku dimuna ne, Tuetu, bantu bebe, tudi bana dikumi ne babidi ba muntu umue wa mu buloba bua Kanana, ne mona, muana wa mukala udi mushale ne tatu wetu katataka, ne mukuabo kenaku
Sheme, mukulu wa Yefete, kulela bana

Kànkamana wa taatù, cikondu cilwàlwa tutambe kusànka byètù, Mwibile eee Kànkamana mwena kwanyì eee Kànkamana mwena kwanyì, cikondu cilwàlwa tutambe kusànka byètù, Pa buloba eee Kànkamana mwena kwanyì eee Mulùme wakanda undi musele, ucidi kwàbù, Kulonga kalasa wa kujikija mukanda, Udi anu ukèba mudimu wa kwètù, Tudi pembe basombe kuzubu kwà baledi
lupetu lwa mbulamatadi mu polovensa;

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi bumvwangana ne bisumbu bidi biambulwisha ditanta dia bantu mu bitupa bia nsombelu mu ditunga, bubanji, lungenyi, nsombelu wa mulowo ne nyuma, ne kabidi ne bisumbu bidi bilongesha beena mwabo balume ne bakaji maalu
Kunkandiki to
Bintu bidi bipetesha mikiya Nyama mikuabu idi ipetesha muntu mikiya too ne ku dilolu, padiye uyilenga, yoyi mimane kufua

Bikala muenyi mushikame munkatshi muenu, anyi muntu yonso muikale munkatshi muenu tô ne ku bikondo bienu bionso udi musue kufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa, yeye nênze bu munudi nuenza
Genese Isaka Wakabikila Yakoba wakamuvudishila disanka wakamudimusha ne, Kubaki mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana
Muntu yonsu udi ubuela mu nzubu awu matuku avuabu bamuinjile, bamukange, neapie mikiya too ne ku dilolu

Kanungu ka Mudimu wa tshipwita munwamfwanka wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa udi ujika ne : a ndekeelu wa bukalenga; b lufu ; c didilekeela dia mudimu; d tshipumbishi tshia kashidi; e dipangila dinanuka; f dipumbisha kadiyi dimanyishibwa ne dianyishibwa ku mudimu mu tshia binaayi tshimwe tshia matuku a mudimu; g diumusha didibo balongolola kudi dîyi dia masungulangana; h ditabuuja dia mwânzu udi kawuyi umvwangana ne mudimu wa bu tshipwita munwamfwanka anyi wa bu tshipwita mukulumpa ; i dipiila kadiyi dia kutontolola dia dinyooka dinene dia lukanu bwa tshilema tshienza tshielela meeji

Bana ba Yisakâ ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba tshisamba tshia Yisakâ binunu makumi atanu ne binai ne nkama mai
Nunku Abalama wakaya bu muakamba Yehowa, ne Lota wakaya n andi Abalama wakadi ne bidimu makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu hakumukeye mu Halana
Bakabenzesha mudimu mukole
Nowa ke tshidime wa kumpala uvua mukuna mitshi ya maluvu
Bua tshinyi udi wamba ne: Bukole bunkadi ebu tshiena mua kulela kabidi to
Tuvua babenge kabidi kupitshila mu njila wa kuinshi wa mu tshibanda, ne mu misoku ya Elate, ne Eshiyone Ngebere
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu
Udi ulonda ndongamu wa Bukalenga bunene mu tshibambalu tshienda, ku buludiki ne butwangaji bwa Minisistila wa kumpala
Kanuadi bana bebe bua kubahitshisha mu kahia ka Moleke, kutedi dina dia Nzambi wenu tshitelatela meme ndi Yehowa
Bintu ebi bionso ubienze ne tshituha tshimue tshia or, tshintu tshijima tshienza ne tshituha tshimue tshia or muedibue mutambe buimpe
Bantu badibu babadike bua benze mudimu mu bisumbu bia tshiluilu, nebabalombole kudi mfumu wa tshisamba tshiabu: Mfumu wa bena Yuda: ke Nashone, muana wa Aminadabe, ne bantu bende

Bualu ebu kabuikadi kudi bua wewe kuenza nunku bua kushiha bantu bakane ne bantu babi hohamue, biwenza nunku bantu bakane nebikale muomumue ne bantu babi, bualu ebu kabuikadi kûdi, Mulumbuluishi wa buloba buonso katu wenza bimpe, anyi
Hakalela Ebê Pelege, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe, umukuate ku mukila, yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamukuata ne nyoka wakakudimuka mulangala kabidi
Moshe kufikisha bivua bantu bandamune kudi Maweja Nangila

Bwa kubotakaja nsombelu mu nkatshi mwa polovensa yôyi nkayayi pa luseka, ne pankatshi payi ne Bukalenga bwa ku mutu, mbâsa Tshisangilu tshia banguvelenêla tshilombola kudi Mfumu wa Ditunga tshidi tshikala ne mudimu wa kukwatshisha mu mibelu bitupa bibidi bia Mbulamatadi ebi
Panuikala nukumbaja mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, indi nnumanyisha lelu, nenuikale bena diakalenga
Mu ngendu yabo yonso, hakabandishibua difutu ha mutu ha nsubu, Bena Isalele bakadi babanga luendu
Bialueye ne nyama udibo bafila bu mulambu kudi Yehowa, bintu bionso bidibo baha Yehowa nebikale bintu bia tshijila
: Bidi bitangila mapa a bweena mwaabo ne a tshidiidi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama isatu, witaba Mvidi Mukulu, udisanga nende mu malu onsu
Kanudi mampa adibu bela buanga to
Yuda wakamuambila ne, Mulume au wakabambila bikole ne, Kanuena nu ntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakuny enu kundi
Kunyangaye nkata ya matempu abu a mvita
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatukila mu masungulangana menza kudi bônso musangu umwe bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itanu idibu mwa kwambulula musangu umwe
Utshiteke ku mpala kua bantu banyi ne kua bantu bebe, bobo balumbulule tshilumbu tshietu
Bakumuka mu Bene yâkana, bakashikama mu Ho hadidegada Bakumuka mu Ho hadidegada, bakashikama mu Yotebata
Biahidia tatu wa mukashi kumufila kudiye, yeye neafute biuma bu bia dibaka dia bakashi batshidi kamama
Bantu bonsu bavua bafue mu tshipupu etshi bavua

Bulalu buonso budiye ulala hatshidiye ne disama, nebuikale bu bulalu bua mu tshikondo tshiandi tshia katshetshi, tshintu tshionso tshi diye ushikama netshikale ne bukoya bu muditshi mu tshikondo tshiandi
Muprofete udi udiambila mei mu dina dianyi ne dikamakama andi tshiyi mumuambile anyi udi wamba mei mu dina dia nzambi mukuabo, muprofete au neafue biandi
Buonso buetu tudi bana ba muntu umue, tudi bambe mei a bushuwa, katuena batentekedi
Kadi mutuangaji umushe mafuta onsu a ngombe awu, awoshe pa tshilambuilu
Muntu nansha umue kakunutuila nkanana
Wakututuma kudibu bua tshinyi
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Sheta Adama wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Abimeleke wakamba ne, Tshiena mumanye bantu bakuenza bualu ebu, wewe kuakungambila diambedi, tshiakunvua lumu lua bualu ebu, anu lelu

Lewitiki Bubi bua Nadaba ne Abihu Nadaba ne Abihu, bana balume ba Alona, bakangata malonga a kahia, muntu dilonga diandi muntu dilonga diandi, bakatekamu kahia, bakelahu musenga wa manananshi, bakalua ne kahia kakadi kakayi tshijila ku mpala kua Yehowa, hakadiye kayi mubambile
Mulambu awu kabena mua kuulamba, kuela buanga bua mampa to
Nuenu nenuikale bu bantu bajidila kundi kanudi munyinyi wakahandabo kudi nyama ya mu mpata, nuwele kudi mbua
Aye nabi kudi batuangaji, bana ba Arone
Muntu awu, neatuadije kabidi kudijidila
Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, wakadi ne lungenyi munda muandi tente bualu bua Mose wakamutentekasha bianza biandi; ne Bena Isalele bakunvua di diandi, bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Wewe newangate mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe, ulabe mashi ha nsengu ya ha tshioshelu ne munu webe, hongolola mashi onso ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu
Bobo nebayishe bana ba Yakoba mei ebe, ne Bena Isalele mikenji yebe; nebateke musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kuebe, ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshiebe
Neavule bilulu ebi, nealuate bilulu bikuabo, neatuale butue ku butshika bua tshitudilu ku muaba mutoke
Yeye udi umona tshimfuanyi tshianyi
Musapa muisatu ke Tigre; wowu udi upita ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua tshimenga tshia Ashure
Tshisamba tshia Nafatale Ahila muana mulume wa Enana neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Nafatale

Nulue ne mampa au ne bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne bilema ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi, bintu ebi nebikale bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, udibo bafila ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Anyi bikala ngombe muikale ne tshilele tshia kukuma ne nsengu diambedi, ne bikala mukelenge wandi kayi mumulame, yeye neafute ngombe ku ngombe, ne ngombe mufue neikale wandi
Bantu bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele bakamona ne, Tudi ne tshilumbu tshikole Hakambabo ne, Katuena tuhuekesha bungi bua tushola butudi tulomba buatshia buatshia

Bana bandi balume, Isaka ne Yishemaele, bakamujika mu lubuebue lua Makepela mu budimi bua Efelona, muana wa Soha, Muena Hiti, ku mpala kua Mamale, budimi buakasumba Abalahama kudi bana ba Hete, bakajikamu Abalahama ne Sala, mukashi wandi
Wenzeshe mabue â kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule lua kufunda mateta bimpe, yeye neafundehu mena a Bena Isalele, babueshe mabue mu masoso a mu bintu bia or
Bubanji buonsu bua mfumuanyi Abrahame budi anu mu dina dia muanende awu
Abrahame kuambila umue wa kudibu ne: Mukalenga wanyi, pangikala mukutokele ku muoyi, kupitshi kumbelu kuanyi to
Kutuadija lelu, nenkuatshishe bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba bowa
Bantu bakuabo ne bunvue, nebatshine, kabena benza malu au mabi munkatshi muenu kabidi
Bana balume bonso ba bakuidi nebaudie, etshi ntshintu tshitambe tshijila
Bakumuka ku mikuna ya Abalima, bakashikama mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko
Bantu bonso bakamba hohamue ne, Netuenze mei onso akutuambila Yehowa Mose wakambila Yehowa mei akamba bantu
Muntu uvuaye wambila bua kutendelela mvidie, ke udi udianjila kumuasa dibue
Kanuakadia mampa, kanua kanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Muan abo mulume ne mamu wa Lebeka bakamba ne, Nsongakashi anji kushala matuku makese, nansha dikumi, hashishe yeye neaye
Ulombeshe bilamba biabu bia tshijila, ne mafuta a kubalaba
Nuenu kungandamuna ne: Tuvua batombokele Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Buloba mbunene, tuabulukangane
Bantu badi ne bimanyinu bia dibendele dia tshisamba tshia Yuda ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu nebashikame ku luseke lua ku esete kudi diba dihatuka
Cilunga mulwesu, cikombola cikwanga Baswa kulwata, tulwata anu momumwa, Cyètù canza colola anu wa kulonda yo yo yo
Mvua mutue nabu ndondu, mubalaye mua kubapesha ditunga dia Kenaane divuabu basombe bu bantu benyi
Mutuangaji Elazare kuangata mbabula ya tshiamu tshikunze ya bantu bavua Maweja Nangila muoshe ne muoyi
Bana benu ba balume kabasedi bana babu ba bakaji
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubandamuna ne: Maweja Nangila nnganyi

Halua dituku dia muanda mute kete, muakuidi neatangile mu mputa, ne bikala mputa kayi mutampakane mu dikoba, ne kayi ubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale muakane
Wakenza bitubuidi bia makunshi ne bintu bia kulengesha n abi makunshi ne nshekele ya argent tshinunu tshimue, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu
Pa buloba pavua tshianana kapayi tshintu, anu midima miaba yonsu
Kadi bena Amore badi baubikila ne: Senire
Dikenga dibidi: ndimba Ke Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua kumuambila ne: Maweja Nangila udi wamba ne: Anyishe bena Izrayele baye kutendelela
Wangate kabidi mukoku wa tshimpanga udi kauyi ne bulema, uulambule Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kuosha
Maweja Nangila kupesha mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu muoyi wa tshitunu
Kadi ndi muma nye ne wewe ne bantu bebe kanuena banze kuikala ne ditshina dia Yehowa Nzambi
Kuluanganabu ne baluishi babu butuku, kubapita bukole
Biakudia abi, nebiambuluishe bena Levi, badi kabayi ne muaba wa bumpianyi munkatshi muenu
Ivua idia bintu bionsu bivua mabue a mvula kaayi manyange too ne bimuma bionsu bivua ku mitshi

Wewe newangate argent ya dihikula dia Bena Isalele, uyiteke bua kukuatshisha mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusangakena, neyikale bu tshiyulukidi tshia Bena Isalele ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kuhikula kua mioyo yenu
Mulambu ewu mbua kukobolola muntu awu
Kadi nuadile pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, bualu adi biakudia bia tshijila menemene
Yakoba wakatuangana ne Lakele mishiku wakabandisha di diandi, wakadia
Nenkuvuishe tshisamba tshinene, nenkusankishe, nenvuishe dina diebe dinene, ne wewe neuvudishile bakuabo disanka
Yehowa wakamba ne, Tangilai, bantu bonso badi bantu bamue, bonso badi ne muaku umue, au mmalu akabangabo kuenza, ne katataka kakuena bualu budibo basue kuenza budi mua kubakolela
Kadi nudi mua kulambula milambu eyi, anu mu tshimenga tshikala Maweja Nangila musungule bua nuenu kumonangana nende
Mpindiewu bangayi luendu tshiakabidi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna
Nenudie mulambu dituku dinudi nûfila ne makelela kabidi, biashala tshintu tô ne dituku disatu nebatshioshe mu kahia
Biakusumbishabo Muena Ebelu mulume anyi Muena Ebelu mukashi, yeye neakukuatshile mudimu bidimu bisambombo; kadi hafika tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete wewe neumulekele
Pashishe bena Levi nebafile ngombe mulume pamue ne mulambu wa bukula, busambakaja ne mafuta
Udi ufuka bena kamama ne bena mahaha ne bantu badi mua kumona ne bantu badi bafofo nganyi
Mose wakangata mashi, wakâmiamma ham bidi ha bantu, wakamba ne, Tangilai mashi a dihungila, diakuhunga n enu Yehowa bua mei au onso
Kubuelakanyi ne bantu babi bualu bua kuikala bu mumanyi wa malu adi kayi malelela
Au mmeku a Bena Shimeona, bantu binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Ke Maweja Nangila kukema, wamba ne: Bu mudi bantu aba bikale tshisamba tshimue, bakula muakulu umuepele, ke padibu batuadije kudienzela malu
disomba dia lupetu pambelu bwa majinga a Ditunga anyi a polovensa;
Padi mayi avua mu luesu alu masampukila ku tshintu tshidibu mua kudia nansha kunua, tshintu atshi tshidi ne mikiya, nansha tshiotshi mu luesu lua mushindu kayi
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kulongolola ditempu diende dia mvita lukasa, kubalondakaja ne tshiluilu tshiende

Bikaleye muhele kayi ne bungi bua bintu biwakamubadila, nunku nebamushikike ku mpala kua muakuidi, ne muakuidi neatuangane n andi mushinga, muakuidi neatuangane ne muena kuditshiha mushinga ku bungi bua bintu bidiye n abi
Kayine kuandamuna ne: Tshiena mumanye
Wewe neulue ne muana wa ngombe ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusambakena, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe
Alambule Maweja Nangila mulambu awu, anu mushindu uvuaye ulambula ngombe mulume bua kudikobolola
Masumpakana manene adi alombola bulongolodi bwa bishimikidi ebi ngôwu aa:
Wakahingana ne biuma biabo bionso ne muan abo Lota, ne bintu biandi ne bakashi ne bantu

Udi usuika nyama wandi wa mpunda ku muonshi wa tumuma tukese, udi usuika lukungulu lua nyama wa mpunda ku muonshi udi utamba buimpe, wakuvuwa bilulu biandi mu nvinyo, wakuvuwa kazaku kandi mu mashi a tumuma tukese
Udi Mvidi Mukulu wanyi
Pashishe, usungule bantu ba nsongu badi batshina Mvidi Mukulu munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Badi ne tshia kumukuba kabidi kudi dîku diende, bantu ba mu bamfumu ba mbulamatadi
Newenzele muhika mukashi muomumue
Nukumbaje mikenji yonsu indi nnuambila lelu eyi
Bantu baudi musungule, mubenze bebe, kupita talalaa, kamuyi bualu
Angata mashi makese a ngombe awu, abuele nawu mu ntenta
Muntu udi wiba muntu mukuabo, udi umuhana anyi bamusangana mu bianza biandi, nebamushihe bulelela
Kadi tshikondu atshi, kanuvua batekemene kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu to
Nenushale bioshelu biabo, nutshibule mabue abo bituha, nuoshe Bashela babo ne kahia; nenutahe mpingu yakasongabo ne tshifuanyikishi tshia nzambi yabo; nenjimishe mena abo mu muaba au
Enza dihu ne tshituha tshimue tshia or hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi ku mahu asambombo a ha tshitekelu tshia minda
Mukaji wa Lote kutangila panyima
Pashishe bena Izrayele bonsu nebashipe nyama wabu awu dilolu

Bakatuala nsubu wa tshitendelelu, Ntenta mene, kudi Mose, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo, ne nkanu ne mabaya, ne mitshi ne makunshi ne masoso a tshiamu, ne tshintu tshia biseba bia bimpanga tshima mu mai makunze kunzû tshia kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu, ne tshintu tshia biseba bia nkonge tshia kuteka ha mutu hatshi, ne tshilulu tshia hankatshi ha nsubu, ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne mitshi ya mushete, ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete, ne mesa, ne malonga onso a mesa, ne bidia bilesha, ne bitekelu bia minda, ne minda ne malonga au onso, ne manyi a minda, ne tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia or, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne musenga wa manananshi, ne tshilulu tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua nsubu, ne tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne biamu bitshiamakane, ne mitshi yatshi, ne malonga atshi onso, ne tshiowelu ne mesa atshi, ne bilulu bia luhangu lua muaba wa kutendelela, ne makunshi a luhangu ne nkanu, ne tshilulu tshia tshibi tshia luhangu, ne mionshi yonso ne milonda ne bintu bionso bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, mbia ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bilulu bitedibue bimpe bia kuenza n abi mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshijila, ne bilulu bia tshijila bia Alona muakuidi, ne bilulu bia bana bandi balume bia kuenza n abi mudimu wa buakuidi
Padi dia dia lumungulu anyi dia tshimungu mukaji dikale kadiyi dia mudimu anyi dikale dia lumingu, midimu idi itwadija mu dituku dia mudimu didi dilonda

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kumwangalaja ne kulongesha Dîyi dikulu, Dijadika dia buloba bujima dia mapa a muntu yônso, Bulongolodi bwa beena Aflika butangila mapa a muntu yônso ne a bisamba, pamwe ne ndondo yônso ya munkatshi mwa ditunga ne ya pankatshi pa matunga mikala itangila mapa a muntu yônso ne bukubi bwa muntu yônso pankatshi pa bisamba, ndondo mianyisha mu njila mululame
Muntu yonsu udi unuambila bua kutendelela mvidie, bamushipe
Mose wakaha Maki, muana mulume wa Manashe musoko wa Gilada ne yeye wakasekamamu
Uvua munukengeshe, kadi amu bua kunuteta, kabidi bua kunulongoluela diakalenga matuku adi kumpala
Kadi yeye wakowa kahita ka bena bidia bu muakamba Yosefe
Bialala mulume ne mukashi wa manseb andi, udi bu muntu wakavula manseb andi bilulu, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo, kabena balela bana tshiendelele
Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa dikumi, nsongu ya mikuna kumueneka
Bena Izrayele bonsu bavua bamuindile bangabanga ne kutuadija luendu
Kadi, Maweja Nangila, wewe kutuma lupepele
Enza biebe nkanu ya or mai, witeka kû mikolo ya mushete, ibidi ku luseke lumue, ibidi ku luseke lukuabo

Yeye wakela lusumuinu luandi ne, Belâma, muana mulume wa Beô, muntu wakadi ne disu diandi dibuikila, udi unvua mei a Nzambi, udi utangila bilota bia Nzambi wa Bukole, hahoneye hanshi, mesu andi adi matabale, udi wamba ne, Yakoba, ntenta yebe idi mimpe
Isalele wakamba ne Bualu budi bulelela Yosefe muan anyi utshidi ne muoyo nenye kumumona diambedi tshiyi muanze kufua
Kehate wakashala ne muoyi bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu ne bisatu
Wakenza tshiowelu tshia mai ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mesa atshi ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakatshienza ne ndimuenu ya ba kashi bakadi benza mudimu ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bena Izrayele bumuke ku Sukote, kuasabu mitanda yabu mu Etame ku muelelu wa tshipela
Kanuena mua kunua kabidi maluvu makole, panudi nulongesha bena Izrayele mikenji eyi idi Maweja Nangila mubatumine kudi Moshe
Nzambi Wakenza munda minene ibidi, muinda mutambe bunene bua kukokesha mu munya ne muinda mukese bua kukokesha butuku, yeye Wakenza mitoto kabidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakulua tshihi, anyi
Kadi nusungule muana wa mukoku nansha muana wa mbuji udi mukumbane bua muntu yonsu kupetaye munyinyi wonsu udiye mua kudia
Bena Isalele bakavula bintu bia kudilengesha n abi ku mukuna wa Holeba tô ne ku mpala kuakadibo baya
Amuteke pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete
Wewe neusaye tshimpanga, uvuwa mala atshi ne mikolo, uteke bituha biatshi hamue ne mutu watshi
Nanku udi ne bua kumuka mu mitanda, kuya kusomba pa nkayende

Balume bonso bakadi ne lungenyi lule munkatshi mua bena mudimu bakenza nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bilulu dikumi bia lin muimpe ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû, bakenza bakeluba kudi bena mudimu bakadi ne lungenyi lule
Mukelenge Alada, Muena Kanâna, wakadi ushikama ku luseke lua ku Sude lua buloba bua Kanâna, wakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele balualua
Miaba yonsu ayi kushalamu bintu bikese bikuatakane bu mudi mabue a mvula
Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kukuba bâna badi mu ntatu mikole, ne badi kabidi ne tshia kufunda ku Tubadi aba badi bakisa bâna ne aba badi bambulwisha beena tshikisu aba
Elisheba kulela bana ba balume banayi: Nadabe, Abiku, Elazare ne Itamare
Kumupeshabu kabidi mutu wa nyama awu, ne munyinyi mumane kukosolola mabulu, bua kubioshila Maweja Nangila pa tshilambuilu
Lewitiki Bintu Bidi Bimpe mua Kudia ne Bidi Kabiyi Bimpe Dut
Kanungu ka Anu mêyi a ditunga ke adi mwa kukosa bitadi
Kumiaminaye kabidi mafuta awu misangu muanda mutekete ku tshilambuilu, ne ku bintu bivuaku, ku dilongu dinene dia koweshila bantu mayi, ne ku tshitaku tshiadi
Ayi ke milongo minene idi isunguluja Dîyi dikulu
Butshia dinda, lupepele alu kupaluisha mpasu
Kadi kanudi mashi, bualu bua mashi adi muoyo; kanudi muoyo ne munyinyi hohamue
Teka tshifulu ha mutu handi ne tshitotolo tshia tshijila ha tshifulu
Bana balume ba Pelese Heselona ne meku a Bena Heselona, Hamula ne meku a Bena Hamula
Batumibue babidi abu kuambila Lote ne: Pawikala ne bena diku diebe bakuabu muaba ewu, nansha ne baku bebe, bana bebe ba balume ne ba bakaji, umuke nabu mu tshimenga etshi
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga bulalu buvua mukaji awu mulale, nansha tshintu tshionsu tshivua mukaji awu musombe, asukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Kuinyikaye tshibuashibuashi ne: Ndiulu

Muntu yonso udi udia tshintu tshidifuile anyi tshidi tshihandulule kudi nyama, bikaleye muledibue mu nsubu yenu anyi muenyi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne dilolo, hashishe yeye neikale muakane

Mua kukobolola mupela udi ne disama dia nsudi Padi disama dia nsudi dikuata mupela, mupange bintu bionsu ebi, alambule anu muana wa mukoku umue bu mulambu wa dinua tshibalu, udibu balambula Maweja Nangila bua kudikobolola
Nenku mutuangaji alekele nyunyi uvua mushale ne muoyi, aye mu tshisuku
Yeye neamushihe ku luseke lua tshioshelu lua ku nôde, ku mesu kua Yehowa; ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu
Angatayi nansha nsongakaji yanyi ibidi eyi
Maweja Nangila kumuambila ne: Ela dikombu adi panshi
Nuenu bena Levi ke badi bakolesha malu
Nufile ban a bute ba balume kundi
Ndi mumvue mudibu banjane
Kudingidi mukuenu
Ekesode Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Katataka wewe mutangile bu mundi ngenzela Palô, bualu bua yeye neabalekele ku tshianza tshikole, neabihate mu buloba buandi ne tshianza tshikole

Anyi Nzambi wakamba kuya bua kudisunguila tshisamba munkatshi mua tshisamba tshikuabo, kudi mateta ne kudi bimanyinu ne kudi malu a kukema ne kudi nvita ne ku tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne kudi malu manene adi atshinyisha bantu bu muakanuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, anyi
Kuenzabu mitanda mu tshipela amu, pabuipi ne mukuna awu
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, mukelenge wetu, bantu bebe bakuluila anu bua kusumbabo bia kudia

Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakahueka ha mukuna wa Sinai, wakabika munkatshi muabo ku Sei, wakatemena ku mukuna wa Palana, wakamueneka munkatshi mua binunu makumi bia bantu bandi ba tshijila, wakalua kudibo ne mikenji mitema kahia mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole
Mpindiewu panuikala bitabe bua kukumbaja dijinga dia mfumuanyi, nansha panuikala babenge, nungambile patoke bua mmone tshindi mua kuenza
Mulume udi ulala ne mukashi wa tatu andi udi bu muntu wakavula bilulu bia tatu andi nebabashihe bubidi buabo, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Bobu kabidi bavua mua kutumona nanku

Kanungu ka Ngenzelu miteela ku kanungu kadi kadianjila aka pamwe ne mateta ayi, nansha mikale imweneka mishindu kayi, pikalayi ifumina kudi muntu mwimikila bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi badi bayinyoka bu tshibawu tshia dipangila dia ditunga
Arone ne bakulu bonsu ba bena Izrayele, pamue ne Yetro, kudia biakudia bia tshijila abi
Nsongakaji kuandamuna ne: Mukalenga wanyi, nuaku

Padi mutuangaji ukenketa tshiakabidi muntu awu dituku dia muanda mutekete, usangana disama kadiyi ditampakane muntu mubidi mujima, kayi ne boya butokoloke, nansha mputa mondoke, muntu awu neakungule mu mutu, ashiye miaba idi mputa ya bilundu
Bena Izrayele bavua benzeja bantu mudimu kuyabu kudidila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bamba ne: Mukalenga, tuetu tudi bena mudimu bebe
Kuinyikaye mutu panshi, wamba ne: Bakalenga banyi, bu nuenu basue, kanupitshi to
Kumuelaye lupemba, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu muena kulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba atumbe
Muntu yonsu udi udia mampa mela buanga, nansha yeye muenyi anyi muena ditunga, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele

Dielulula Unange Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe Telejayi meyi ne mikenji, bidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mungambile bua kunulongesha, bua nubikumbaje mu ditunga dinukadi pa kubuela bua kudikuata mpindiewu
Dina dia mukashi wa Bena Midiyana wakashihibua diakadi Kozebi, muana mukashi wa Sû, yeye wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya mu Midiyana
Yetro kuselesha muanende wa bakaji Sefora kudi Moshe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, umuambile ne, Lekela Bena Isalele bahatuke mu buloba buebe
Isaka wakambila Abalahama, tatu andi ne, Tatu wanyi, yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku, muan anyi Isaka wakamba ne, Tangila kalua ne nkunyi bidiku, kadi muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua weba
Kuipatshilabu bakalenga banayi abu too ne ku Dane
Mulume kuandamuna ne: Pangumvu mikuma yebe mu lupangu, buowa kungenza, meme kubutama, bualu ndi butaka
Padi dituku dia muanda mutekete dikumbana, mutuangaji apingane kabidi bua kukenketa mushindu udi ditoba
Pashishe Yetro, tatuende muenu wa Moshe, kuoshila Maweja Nangila nyama ya milambu
Maweja Nangila kukolesha Abrame ku muoyi, umuambila ne: Bintu biebe kabena babipiana kudi muena mudimu webe to
Nanku muntu wa ku ndelanganyi ya Arone, udibu bajidila bua ikale mutuangaji munene, neikale ulambula mulambu ewu anu mushindu ewu
Muhika wakamukudimuna dî ne, Nyeye mukelenge wanyi Lebeka wakangata tshilulu tshikudika, wakatshiteka ku mishiku yandi

Neafile dianyi dionso ne mukala udi ne dianyi ne dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diatu didi hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma yeye neanumushe, neabioshe ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia eu udi mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji
Kadi katshia nkumanyisha bualu ebu too ne mpindiewu kuena musue kuitaba
; Mfumu wa bena Ngade: ke Eliyasafe, muana wa Deyuwele ne bantu bende
Yetro kusanka bikole bua bilenga bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muenzele bena Izrayele bua kubapatula mu bupika bua bena Ejipitu
Nuenu tantayi, nuvulangane, numuangalake pa buloba bujima
Nanku, muntu wa kudibu nansha umue uvua muntombokele kena mua kufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane, dimvua mulaye bankambua babu to
Muaba awu, ke unudi mua kukumbajila bionsu bindi nnuambila
Moshe kubambila kabidi ne: Munkatshi mua matuku asatu, kanubueledi bakaji mu nzubu to
Enza makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu ne makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu tshikuabo tshidi tshituangana n atshi, makoha ikale makanangane
Muakuidi nealuate bilulu biandi bia lin ne mihanu ya lin, neangate butue bua kahia kakosha mulambu wa ha tshioshelu, neabuteke hehi ne tshioshelu

Nuenu nenufue munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabo, ne buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna nebunumine Bantu benu badi bashala nebanyingalale ne makenga a mibi yabo mu buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna, nebanyingalale ne makenga a mibi ya batatu abo kabidi
Ndelanganyi ya Esawu, idi misombe mu mikuna ya Seyire, ne bena Mowabe, badi basombe mu Are, mbamane kuitaba bua tupitshile muabu

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi mihingishilula bintu mukana anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke: kamelo, ne nsenji, ne kabundi ka ku mputu; bualu bua nyama ei idi mihingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kayena ne mikono mihanduluke, kayena miakane kunudi
Ebele uvua mulami wa mikoku, Kayine uvua tshidime
Kadi ngombe ne tshiseba tshiandi ne munyinyi wandi ne tunvi tuandi yeye wakabioshila ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Yehowa neakokeshe bantu tshiendelele
Bobu batshimone nanku, nebafue
Nudi bamanye bishima bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muenze
Aba mbana balume ba Gêshona bakabalabo ku meku abo, buonso buabo bakenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakamba Yehowa
Netanele, muana mulume wa Sua, mukelenge wa Yisakâ, wakaula bintu biandi dituku dibidi
Wakenzelaku Yehowa tshioshelu, Wakabikila dina dia Yehowa
Bana aba ke bankambua ba meku adi ne dina diabu
Kana wakambila Ebele muakuny andi bualu ebu Hashishe hakadibo mu budimi, Kana wakabika ku mpala kua Ebele muakuny andi, wakamushiha
Yeye mumane kusuna mayi, meme kumulomba ne: Bu wewe musue, mpeshaku mayi a kunua
Bakamuambila mei onso akabambila Yosefe ne hakatangileye makalu akamutumina Yosefe, mutshima wa Yakoba tatu abo wakasangala
Kupimabu biakudia bionsu abi
Muntu kuinyika nyama yonsu ne nyunyi yonsu ya mulu mena
Yeye kena usomba n etu kabidi, anyi
Uvua muele meji kaayi pa kungenzela nunku

Yosefe wakamuambila ne, Eku nkujingulula kua tshilota tshiebe bisaka bisatu bidi bu matuku asatu, hahita matuku asatu, Palô neakukose mutu, neakuowe ku mutshi, ne nyunyu ya mulu neyizokole munyinyi wa mubidi webe
Wewe neushihe tshimpanga, newangate mashi atshi wamiamine ha tshioshelu tshionso
Kana wakamanyangana ne mukashi wandi, yeye wakimita difu, wakalela Hanoka, yeye wakasa musoko, wakidika musoko dina dia muan andi Hanoka
Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bidi bibweela nanku mu Tshisangilu ne bukookeshi bujima
Mose wakitabusha di dia tatu andi muenu, wakenza mei onso akambeye

Bia momumwe, dikanyika dia kuswikangana pankatshi pa bienzeji bishilangana bia Musoko didi dilomba bwa se baasa Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshia diabanyinangana mpetu ne bintu, tshiteeka mu bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene
Mbulamatadi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi mwa kwikala ne bintu biende nkayende anyi ne bintu bia mu tshibûngi bipeta bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu anyi bunkambwa
Mu tshiota tshikuabo nakatangila miehu muanda mutekete minene miakane midiunde ku lubalabala lumue
Nunku hatuakahingana kudi muntu webe, tatu wetu, bakamuambila mei a mukelenge wanyi
Mukoku awu wikale kauyi ne bulema, kabidi mukumbane mushinga wa mulambu wa dinua tshibalu
Bena Lewi bakadilengesha ku bubi buabo, bakuvuwa bilulu biabo, Alona wakabanyukula bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, Alona wakadia mulambu wa kubabuikidila n au bubi, bualu bua kubalengesha
Mukenji ewu ushale kashidi

Ku Aloê udi ku muelelu wa tshibanda tshia Ânona ne ku musoko mukuabo udi mu tshibanda tô ne ku Gilada, katuakasangana musoko umue wakatuhita bukole bua kûnyenga; Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua misoko yonso mu tshianza tshietu; anu buloba bua Bena Amona, katuakalua ha buihi n abu; buloba buonso bua dishiya dia kasulu ka Yaboka, ne misoko ya ku mikuna ne miaba yonso yakatukanda Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Nsongakaji kupongolola lukasa mayi avua mashale mu mulondu mu luuvu
Nakukuenzela bualu bubi kai, bua wewe wakunvuisha ne bantu banyi mu bualu bubi bunene nunku

Kabakanji kutangila bualu buakenzeye masalayi a mu Ejipitu, ne tubalu tuabo ne makalu abo; muakahingisheye mai a Dishiba Dikunze ha mitu yabo, hakadibo banulonda ku nyima, ne muakabashiha Yehowa tô ne ku dituku edi; ne muakanuenzeleye mu tshihela tô ne hanuakalua ku muaba eu
Genese Nzambi Udi Ulaya Abalama Muana Hakashika malu a, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Abalama mu tshilota ne, Abalama kutshinyi, meme ndi ngabu webe ne difutu diebe ditambe bunene
Wakalua ne tshimpanga tshia kuosha ha kahia, Alona ne bana bandi bakatentekasha bianza biabo ha mutu ha tshimpanga
Kanyangishi bana bandi munkatshi mua bana babo nansha, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakamujidila

Muntu yonso udi mudijidile udi mua kudia munyinyi eu, kadi mundi udi kayi mudijidile udi udia munyinyi wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebumushe mundi eu munkatshi mua bana babo
Palô wakambila Mose ne, Umuka kundi, udimuke biebe, kuntangidi kabidi, mu dituku diudi utangila mpala wanyi wewe neufue
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Mona, wewe udi ungambila ne, Uye ne bantu aba, ne wewe kuena muanze kummanyisha muntu udi musue kutuma n anyi
Muena mudimu wa Abrahame kulondela Izake bionsu bivuaye muenze mu luendu
Neikale tshisamba tshinene, bualu udi muanebe
Yehowa wakakolesha mutshima wa Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, yeye wakalonda Bena Isalele, bualu bua Bena Isalele bakahatuka ne tshianza tshikole
Padibu bamane kushinguila nzubu awu, mutuangaji usangana butu kabuyi bumueneka tshiakabidi, neambe ne: nzubu ewu kena mupie mikiya to, bualu butu mbujike buonsu
Kadi Maweja Nangila udi netu
Amu tunkanunuina tuebe tua tshikondu tshinayi netupingane mu ditunga edi kashidi
Ku tshidimu tshionsu, nudie munyinyi wa bimuna ebi ne meku enu, muaba wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, mu nzubu wikalaye musungule
Bikalabo kabayi bakuitabusha, kabayi bunvue di dia tshimanymu tshia kumudilu, bobo nebitabushe dî dia tshimanymu tshia kunshikidilu
Hakaya Labana bua kukoseye mikoko miosa, Lakele wakiba mpingu ya mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Mose wakababikila; Alona ne bakokeshi bonso ba munkatshi muabo ba kahingana kudiye; Mose wakasomba n abo
Yosefe wakafunda mukanda bua lu bua buloba bua Ejipitu, udiku to ne katataka, ne, Tshituha tshitanu tshia bintu bionso ntshia Palo, anu buloba bua babuki nkayabo kabuakalua bua Palô
Mulume neikale mubingishibue ku bubi, ne mukashi eu neadituadile bubi buandi
Bakumuka mu Oboto, bakashikama mu Iye habalima, ku luseke lua Bena Moaba
Kanungu ka Lupetu lwa bukalenga bunene ne mpetu ya polovensa idi mitapuluke
Nuenze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu
Muntu udi udia munyinyi wandi neuvuwe bilulu, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, ne mundi udi utuala mubidi wandi mufue neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nanku ndi musue kubabutula pa buloba
Abimeleke wakakonka Abalahama ne, Meji kai akadi munda muebe a kukuenzesha bualu ebu
Kadi mafuta makuabu adi mashale mu tshianza, mutuangaji neaele muntu awu mu mutu bua kumukobolola, kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Kenaane mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, kulelaye Malaleyele
Uvua munukengeshe bua kunuteta, bua ajadike meji adi munda muenu, ne mushindu unudi basue kukumbaja mikenji yende
Wewe ne bantu bonsu badi bimane aba nenupungile
Nuenu nenuhingane, nenutumikile dî dia Yehowa, nenuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
Kadi Moshe uvua muntu wa muoyi mupuekele, mupite bantu bonsu ba pa buloba ku lutulu

Panuikala kanuyi pabuipi ne muaba wikale Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu musungule bua yeye kusomba, nudi mua kushipa bimuna bidiye munupe: ngombe, mikoku, mbuji, kudia munyinyi miaba yonsu inudi basombe
Nuye ku nzubu wikale Maweja Nangila musungule bua nuenu kumonangana nende
Nunku nuenu nutumikile mei a tshihungidi etshi, nuê nze, bua nuenu nuikale ne dikasa dimpe mu malu onso anudi nuenza
Uvuluke bantu bebe: Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe

Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kanutatshishi Bena Moaba, kanuluanganyi n abo nvita; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba buabo bu buhianyi buenu; bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba bua Ala bu buhianyi buabo
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Unsunguile bakulu ba bena Izrayele makumi muanda mutekete, bantu baudi mujadike ne: mbakulu ba bushuwa, balombodi ba bena Izrayele
Kadi padi mu dibala dia ku dikoshi nansha mu lubombu mumuenekela dikeji dikunzubile, atshi ndisama dia nsudi didi dituadija
Nennyoke bantu bonsu badi bankina too ne ku ndelanganyi yabu ya musangu muisatu nansha muinayi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ha mai, mai ahingane kabidi ha mutu ha Bena Ejipitu ne ha makalu abo ne ha masalayi abo adi enda ha tubalu

Kukuna mutshima webe ku nsubu wa mukuenu, kukumi mutshima webe ku mukashi wa mukuenu anyi ku muntu wandi mulume anyi ku muntu wandi mukashi anyi ku ngombe wandi anyi ku mpunda wandi anyi ku tshintu tshionso tshia mukuenu

Nealabe mashi ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshidi mu ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, yeye neahongolole mashi onso ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena

Balume bonso nebamueneke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu mu muaba udiye Usungula: ku disanka dia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ne ku disanka dia mbingu ai muanda mutekete, ne ku disanka dia bitandatanda; kabamueneki ku mesu kua Yehowa ne bianza bituhu: kadi muntu yonso neafile bintu bidiye n abi bu muakanuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, disanka
Aye ne ngombe awu muaba wa tshijila, mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Mose wakangata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, wakantumina manyi ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne ku bintu bionso biakadimu, wakadidila
Nuyikumbaje yonsu, bungi buayi
Dielulula Malu adi Mvidi Mukulu muenzele bena Izrayele Nunange Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, numuenzele mudimu, nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji yende
Bua bualu buenu nuenu nuakasua kungenzela bibi, kadi Nzambi wakasua kuenza bimpe, wakakudimuna malu bua kusungileye bantu bu muakuenzeleye lelu

Muntu yônso udi pende ne bukookeshi bwa kuleeja ditabuuja diende anyi majadika ende, bu mudi mu ngakwilu, mu mifundu ne bimfwanyi, anu mwikala kabidi uneemeka mêyi ne mikandu, bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowo
Kuyabu pamue ne muena mudimu wa Abrahame
Wewe newenze bualu ebu bua kubajidila bankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Nanku nukumbaje mikenji eyi yonsu

Yehowa wakasomba n enu mpala ha mpala ha mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, Meme nakimana hankatshi henu ne Yehowa tshikondo atshi, bua kunulesha dî dia Yehowa; nuenu nuakatshina bualu bua kahia, kanuakabanda ku mukuna; yeye wakamba ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Ke muudi ne bua kumusha bena Levi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele bakuabu
Nenvuishe muana wa muhika webe tshisabata tshinene bualu bua yeye udi muana webe
Kanutshinyi bena ditunga adi to
Biwasangana luhanza alu kudi muntu kai wa munkatshi muetu udi n alu, afue biandi, ne tuetu kabidi netuikale bahika ba mukelenge webe
Rebeka kuimita difu dia bana ba mapasa
Kuladi ne mukashi wa mukuenu bua kudionena bualu buandi
Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi tshilumbulwilu tshia manyooka tshia Mfumu wa Ditunga ne Minisitila wa Kavulambedi mu bitupa ne mishindu milongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu
Dutelonone Diulu, teleja matshu, nengambe, buloba bunvue mei a mukana muanyi
Kanualakanyi biamu bia mpawungi ne biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole bidibu balamike ku mpingu aku to
Matuku onso a Mahalelela akadi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi tshitema ne bitanu, yeye wakafua biandi
Hakashikisha Isaka kusankisha Yakoba ne Yakoba mumuke anu tshituha ku mesu kua tatu wandi Isaka, Esau mukulu andi wakahingana kuakadiye muye bua kumukebela nyama

Mose wakangata argent ya buhikudi bua bantu bakahita Bena Lewi bungi; yeye wakangata nshekele kudi ban a bute ba Bena Isalele bu tshinunu tshimue ne nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo ne itanu, bu nshekele udibo bafile mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bantumbishe, bantu bonsu batangile
Hakalua tshikondo tshidi bimuna bimita mafu, nakabandisha mesu anyi mu tshiota, nakatangila ne mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba yakaya kudi mashina a mbushi akadi ne mihola mihola ne matoba matoba
Nenusakidile ku nyama mulambu wa bukula busampakaja ne mafuta
Bakenza mukaba wa efoda bu muakadibo benza efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Etshi ntshimanyinu tshia tshiendelele hankatshi hanyi ne Bena Isalele, bualu bua Yehowa wakafuka diulu ne buloba matuku asambombo, wakikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete, wakadikankamika
Kadi kapatula tshidimu tshiônso mulubu udiku kenzela Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga ne Bukalenga bunene
Nanku, muntu yonsu, muena Izrayele nansha muenyi, udi utupakana mu mpukapuka, nebamukobolole anu mushindu umue ewu

Bena Isalele bakatuma miloho kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, ne, Witabushe bua tuetu tuhitshile ku buloba buebe, katuena tusesuka mu madimi anyi mu madimi a tumuma, katuena tunua mai a mena a mai anuakumbula, netulonde anu mu musesu wa mukelenge tô ne hatuahita ku butshika bua buloba buebe
Bena Levi kabena ne tshiabu tshitupa tshia buloba, bu mudi bisamba bikuabu bia bena Izrayele natshi to
Abrahame ne Abimeleke badi batua ndondu Matuku awu, Abimeleke ne Pikole, mulombodi wa bena mvita bende, kufika kudi Abrahame, bamuambila ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi ukuambuluisha mu bionsu biudi wenza
Yuda udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue, wakalekela tshintu tshiandi tshia kudia, wakalamina ne binu biandi bu nyama wa ntambue udi bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, mundi kai wamubisha ku tulu
Biatangila muakuidi ha mputa ne bielanganeye meji ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne nsuki mifike kayenaku, muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete
Moshe kukosa ngombe awu muminu, kutua munu mu mashi, kualaba ku matumba matalame avua ku tshilambuilu bua kumbusha mikiya
Mose wakadila kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Nengenzele bantu aba tshinyi
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubambulwisha bwa kusankabo ne mapa aa
Bakatamba kuikala n andi lukuna bualu bua bilota biandi ne bua mei andi
Kushiminyinyi mukuenu bualu
Moshe ne Arone kuboya butu bua muiku, kuya nabu kumpala kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu

Mu dituku adi mene Yehowa wakahunga ne Abalama tshihungidi ne, Ndi mpa tunkanunuina biebe buloba abu ku musulu wa mu Ejipitu to ne ku musulu munene wa Pelata, buloba bua Bena Kene ne bua Bena Keneze ne bua Bena Kadamona ne bua Bena Hiti ne bua Bena Pelese ne bua Bena Lefa, ne bua Bena Amole ne bua Bena Kanâna ne bua Bena Gîgashi ne bua Bena Yebuse
Buloba ebu buonsu nenkupeshabu kashidi ne ndelanganyi yebe

Tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa dituku adi, ne yeye wakaditshiha ne, Bulelela, nansha umue wa balume aba bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, ba mu bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, neatangile buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bualu bua bobo kabakalonda ne mitshima yabo yonso, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, Muena Kenizi, ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, bualu bua bobo bakalonda Yehowa ne mitshima yabo yonso
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakahunga n etu tshihungidi mu Holeba
Mose kakamanya mua kubuela mu ntenta bualu bua difutu diakimana ha mutu ha nsubu, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakula nsubu tente
Umiamine manyi ha tshiowelu ne ha mesa atshi, utshijidile
Hashika disama dia muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi, nebamubadile matuku muanda mutekete bua kumulengesha, ne yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe mu mai a mueji, neikale muakane
Pashishe, kuangataye manteka, mabela ne munyinyi uvua bu balamba awu, kubapesha
Bualu buloba bujima mbuanyi meme
Dina diebe nedikale ne lumu lunene
dijaadika dia bweena mukanda, bufuki ne bufudi bwa bintu ne mukanda wa njikijilu;
Kadi kupangilabu

Hakadi Noa mu tshidimu tshia nkama isambombo tshia muoyo wandi, mu ngondo muibidi ne dituku dia dikumi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondo, mu dituku adi mene, mishimi yonso ya mu mai manene yakahongoloka ne bibi bionso bia mu diulu biakunzuludibua
Mpala ya batshipwita bakulumpa badi bayifila kudi bisumbu bia tshidiidi anyi kudi nsangilu wa bisumbu bia tshidiidi
Mose wakangata mukashi wandi ne bana bandi balume, wakabateka ha nyima ha mpunda, wakahingana mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Mulambu wa dinua tshibalu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Padi muntu kampande muenze bualu bubi mu mpukapuka, mupue muoyi bua kulambula milambu ya tshijila idibu balambula Maweja Nangila, muntu awu, bua kudikobolola udi ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila mukoku wa tshimpanga kauyi ne bulema
Newenze tukanu tua or mutambe buimpe tudi tuhindakasha bu mionshi
Neafile nyunyu muibidi bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu muakadi mikenji, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi buandi ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Hakatshiabu, bakashikama Mose bua kulumbuluila bantu bilumbu, bantu bakimana ku mpala kua Mose dinda tô ne ku dilolo
Bakumuka mu Bimuna, bakashikama mu Oboto
Pashishe meme nendeje butumbi buanyi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu bualu ebu wewe neumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa tangila, nenkume mai adi mu musulu ne mulangala udi mu tshianza tshianyi, ne mai onso neakudimuke mashi
Ubande ku mukuna kundi eku
Nuenu nenuihate bantu badi n enu lukuna, nenubashihe ne muele wa nvita
Pashishe nuenze tshibilu tshia Dinowa dia biakudia, bua kutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Enoke mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asambombu ne bitanu, kulelaye Metushela
Kubikilaye Arone ne Miriyame muaba awu

Yeye neangate nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo ne mitshi ya cèdre ne bintu bikunze kunzû ne mabeshi a hisopa, nealue bintu ebi ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu mashi a nyunyu wakashihabo ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka, yeye neamiamine mashi ham bidi ha muena nsudi udiye musue kulengesha misangu muanda mutekete, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, nealekele nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu tshisuku
Mose wakangata tshituha tshibidi tshia mashi, wakateka mu malonga, wakamiamina tshituha tshikuabo tshibidi ha tshioshelu
Bena Yuda bakaya ku mpala ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshiabo, Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba, wakadi ku mutu kuabo

Aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Bena Holi, mukelenge Lotana ne mukelenge Shobala ne mukelenge Sibiona ne mukelenge Ana ne mukelenge Dishona ne mukelenge Eze ne mukelenge Dishana, aba mbakelenge ba Bena Holi mu buloba bua Sei
Ekesode Kujidila kua Alona ne Bana Bandi Balume Lew

Pashishe, mutuangaji ele bintu ebi mulu, abinyukule bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila: ke mukila mujima mulamuina ku makunku, mafuta onsu adi malamate ku bia munda, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu adi malamate ku mulemba, ne lutandatanda ludi ku mutshima, ludibu balamuna pamue ne tuonyi
Nsongakashi eu wakadi ne mpala muimpe be, wakatshidi kamama, kayi muanze kumanyibua kudi mulume, yeye wakahueka ku mushimi wa mai, wakasuna mulondo wandi tente, wakabanda kabidi
Nudi mua kudisumbila bia kudia kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kudia; nenudisumbile mai a kunua kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kunua

Mulambu wa mampa a kumpala Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe, bua kumanyishaye bena Izrayele ne: Panuafika mu ditunga munganubueja, nuenu balambe mampa ne bukula bua mu ditunga, nundambule meme tshitupa tshia mampa aa
Tshiena mfika munda lukasa
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Ateke tshianza pa mutu wa mukoku awu, aukosele muminu pa muaba udibu bashipela nyama ya milambu ya kuosha
Nanku bantu bonsu kuikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete
Bena Ejipitu kunyema
Kadi halua tshidimu tshinai, nujidile mamuma onso a mu tshidimu atshi bua kutendelela n au Yehowa
Bualu uvua mungendeshe diakalenga, tshiyi mupete njiwu

Nunku nakasungula balume ba lungenyi lule, banuakamanya, nakabateka ku mutu kuenu, tuhita tua binunu binunu, ne tuhita tua nkama nkama, ne tuhita tua makumi atanu makumi atanu, ne tuhita tua dikumi dikumi, ne miloho bungi bua bisamba bienu

Milambu yonsu ivuabu balambula kudi bamfumu aba dituku divuabu bajidile tshilambuilu idi nunku: malongu masalame dikumi ne abidi a tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, malongu mondoke dikumi ne abidi a tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole a kumyamina mayi, makopu dikumi ne abidi a tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Hahita butumbi buanyi, nenkuteke mu dina didi mu dibue, nenkubuikile ne tshianza tshianyi to ne hanamana kuhita ku mesu kuebe
Balume bonso ba mu musoko wabo nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafueye: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu; ne Bena Isalele nebunvue, nebatshine
Nuenu nuenze bualu ebu bu tshilele tshienu ne tshia bana benu tshiendelele
Bobu kudila miadi bikole
Nanku ndi mua kuya ne nsongakaji ewu kudi muana wa mfumuanyi
Balaka wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Lua hanyi ku muaba mukuabo kûdi mumanye mua kubatangila, wewe mutangile anu tshituha tshiabo, kuena utangila buonso buabo, ubangelele mulau ku muaba au
Wewe kuena mua kuenza nanku, kuena mua kushipa muntu muakane pamue ne muena tshibawu

Biasangakena mulume ne mushikankunde utshidi kamama, kayi mubangila kudi mukuabo, biamukuateye ku bukole bua kulala n andi, ne bantu badi babasangana; hashishe mulume wakalala n andi, neafute tatu wa mushikankunde nshekele ya argent makumi atanu, ne yeye neikale mukashi wandi, bualu bua yeye wakamunyanga, kena mua kumuhidia matuku andi onso
Yakoba wakashala mu buloba bua Ejipitu bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete, nunku bidimu bionso bia muoyo wa Yakoba biakadi lukama ne makumi anai ne muanda mutekete
Yehowa wakanuambila mei munkatshi mua kahia: nuenu nuakulua mei kadi kanuakatangila muntu; nuakunvua anu dî dia muntu
Dana neikale bu nyoka mu nshila, ne bu ntoka mu nshila udi usuma kabalu ku mijilu ya bikono, ne muntu udi ubanda ha nyima udi uhona hanshi bualame
Nufile nkanu eyi kudi Arone ne bana bende, bua kupikula bungi bua bamuanabute ba bena Izrayele budi bupite bungi bua ba bena Levi
Kanuenji bibi hanualumbulula tshilumbu, kanunemekedi muntu muhele, kanutumbishi muntu munene, kadi nulumbulule bilumbu bia muena mutumba n enu ne buakane mu mutshima
Arone kutua munu wende mu mashi awu, kualaba ku matumba matalame avua ku tshilambuilu
Anu Moshe ulekela diakula, buloba kupandikila muaba uvua Datane ne Abirame bimane
Kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu edi, didibo banyisha mu dieebeja dia beena ditunga, didi dipeta bwenzeji padibo badipatula kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga

Manyi a Tshijila ne Manananshi Yehowa wakambila Mose kabidi ne, Angata bintu bia manananshi bidi bitambe buimpe myrrhe bujitu bua nshekele nkama itanu, ne cinnamone bujitu bua nshekele nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne canne aromatique bujitu bua nshekele nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne nkashia bujitu bua nshekele nkama itanu bu idiho bafila mu tshitendelelu ne tshihiminu tshia manyi a olive
Kujingululabu ne: tudi butaka
Kadi bakatangila Palô ne, Bualu buakushika, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, kakabinvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Ateke tshianza pa mutu pa mbuji awu, amukosele muminu muaba udibu bashipela nyama ya milambu ya kuosha
Hanubikilabo kudi Palo, yeye neanukonke ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai
Isalele wakamba ne, Nuakungenzela bibi nunku, hanuakuambila mulume au ne, Tudi ne muakuny etu, munyi
Pavua bena Izrayele mu Ejipitu, Maweja Nangila uvua mushipe bena Ejipitu
Muanjelo ne Mpunda wa Belâma Belâma wakabika ne dinda, wakela tshiseba ha nyima ha mpunda wandi, wakaya ne miloho ya Bena Moaba
Udi Mvidi Mukulu wa tatu wanyi
Kapangu ka Kulu ka disungidila ditunga badi bakaludika kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne padiye kayi kôku anyi yêye mwikala mupumbishibwe, kudi Minisitila kavulambedi
Betele uvua ku luseke ludi diba dibuelela, Ayi ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Disanka edi nedilue ha mutu ha Yosefe, ne ku lubombo lua mutu wa muntu wakadi mutahuluke kudi bana babo
Kadi padi kanyama kamue ka ku tunyama etu kapona, kafuila mu tshintu bu mudi: luvu, tshilamba, tshiseba nansha tshibombi, badi ne bua kusukula tshintu atshi

Nendue ne muele wa nvita munkatshi muenu bu musombuedi wa tshihungidi tshianyi, ne hanuadisangisha mu misoko yenu, meme nentume masama makole munkatshi muenu, nennufile mu bianza bia bantu badi n enu lukuna
Kabidi bavua basanganamu ndelanganyi ya Anake, muntu wa mpolondu
Lua biebe, nenkutume kudibo Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ndiku

Hashishe bantu nebambe ne, Bualu bua bobo bakahidia tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu babo, tshiakahungeye n abo hakaluhukeye n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu; ne bobo bakaya bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, ne bua kuyitendelela; nzambi yakadibo kabayi bamanye, idi Yehowa kayi mubahe: nunku tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakamueneka mu buloba ebu, bua kushikisha milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda eu; ne Yehowa wakabumusha mu buloba abu ne difika dia munda ne tshiji tshikole, wakaya n abo mu buloba bukuabo; bualu ebu budi nunku lelu
Kuelaye Arone mafuta a tshijila mu mutu bua kumujidila
Mishimi ya mu mai manene ne bibi bia mu diulu kabidi biakadi bikandibua, ne nvula ya mu diulu yakalekeshibua
Kumulekedi uya, kayi ne tshintu

Mu dituku dia muanda mukulu nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, kadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku muana mulume wa ngombe ne ku tshimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba: ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Bintu bia tshijila abi, nuenu, bana benu, bena mudimu benu, ne bena Levi, badi mu bimenga bienu, nenubidile amu muaba wa tshijila, wikale Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu musungule
Dutelonone Nuenu nudi bana ba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu: kanuditahi nsalu, kanubeyi makiki enu bualu bua bantu bafue

Yakoba wakamba ne Muan anyi kena uya n enu, mukulu andi udi mufue ne anu yeye umuehele udi mushale, biamukuata bualu bubi mu nshila unuaya, hashishe, nenuvuishe nsuki yanyi mitoke to ne kanyinganyinga mu Muaba wa Bafue

Panyima pa dimungutuka dia Tshibambalu tshia Tshipwita munwamfwanka, Kasumbu kadikadikle komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana kadi kabiikila beedi ba tukanda bwa kusungulabo Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshipiatshipia, mu tshipungu tshia matuku makumi asambombo adi alonda dipatuka dia dipangadika dia dimungutula
Buludi bua muaba wa luhangu nebuikale coudées lukama ne butshiama bualu nebuikale coudées makumi atanu, ne bule bualu bua mulu coudées itanu, ne bilulu bia lin ne nkanu yabi ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Diakamue padibu bamanye bualu bubi buvuabu benza abu, badi ne bua kudikobolola, balambula Maweja Nangila ngombe mulume, bua Maweja Nangila abafuile luse
Mose wakaya ne mulangala wa Nzambi mu tshianza tshiandi
Mmungambile ne: Ndi mumone mudibu banukengesha kudi bena Ejipitu
Bintu bia mu Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Kutekemena kabidi kudi muntu wende Moshe
Muntu kêna mwa kukandika mapa abu adi matangila dikalaku diaabu, midimu yaabu ne dilwangana diaabu bwa kupeta bukalenga mu mungalata

Â mmena a bakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Esau ku meku abo ne mu miaba yabo ne ku mena abo mukelenge Timena ne mukelenge Alawa ne mukelenge Yatete ne mukelenge Oholibama ne mukelenge Ela ne mukelenge Pinona, mukelenge Kenaza ne mukelenge Temana ne mukelenge Mibesâ, mukelenge Magadiele ne mukelenge Ilama aba mbakelenge ba Edome, ku miaba yabo mu buloba bua buhianyi buabo Eu udi Esau, nkambua wa Bena Edome
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Biwamona bantu bakane makumi anai

Bikala muenyi mushikame n enu, udi musue kuenza tshilele tshia kuhita kua Yehowa, nebatengule bana bandi ba balume bonso, nunku yeye udi mua kutshienza, yeye neikale bu muntu muledibue mu buloba buenu, kadi muntu udi kayi mutengula kena mua kutshidia
Nuenu bena Izrayele, telejayi: Maweja Nangila, Maweja Nangila nkayende, ke Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe ne Arone lukasa wamba ne: Ndi muenzele Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu bibi ne nuenu kabidi
Bua kukuatshila Bena Ejipitu mudimu budi butamba bua kufua mu tshihela buimpe
Bualu Yozefe uvua mutshipeshe bana babu, mubalombe ne: Pikala Mvidi Mukulu munupikule, nujule mifuba yanyi muaba ewu, nuye nayi
Yeye wakabalambishila bidia bia disanka, bakadia, bakanua
Hanuafila mulambu wa kuosha anyi wa kudifila, nenufile kabidi tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho dia nvinyo bu mulambu udibo banua, nenufile nunku ku muana wa mukoko ne ku muana wa mukoko
Yakoba wakavudishila Palo disanka, wakumuka ku mesu kua Palo

Milambu yonso ya bintu bia tshijila bidibo banyukula bidi Bena Isalele bafila kudi Yehowa, nakunuhabi ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi, bu tshintu tshienu tshiendelele: etshi ntshihungidi tshia luehu tshia tshiendelele ku mesu kua Yehowa kûdi wewe ne kudi bana bebe badi n ebe
Bilulu bia tshijila bia Alona nebikale kudi bana bandi balume badi banulonda ku nyima bua kubela manyi ne kubajidila
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Muntu yonso wakungenzela bibi, nemmujimishe yeye mu mukanda wanyi
Kayine kuambila Maweja Nangila ne: Dinyoka diudi mumpe ndipite bukole
Yuda ne bana babo bakalua ku nsubu wa Yosefe, yeye wakadiku, bakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua ndi
Kanungu ka Beena Kongu bônso badi ne tshia kwikala ne ditalala ne dikubibwa munda mwa ditunga ne pankatshi pa matunga
Bena Izrayele bakuabu, nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, bamfumu ba meku ne bakulu, basombele babuela mu bisangilu, kuditua ku tshiabu

Mose Udi Ukandika Bantu bua Kufilabo Bintu Bikuabo Mose Wakabikila Besalele ne Oholiaba ne muntu yonso wakadi ne mutshima mûsha tente ne lungenyi kudi Yehowa, ne muntu yonso wakadi ne mutshima bua kulua kuenza mudimu
Nennumuangalashe mu bisamba bikuabo, nempatule muele wa nvita ku nyima kuenu, buloba buenu nebuikale hatuhu ne misoko yenu neyikale mihaula
Hakashika argent yonso ya mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanana, hashishe Bena Ejipitu bonso bakalua kudi Yosefe, bakamuambila ne, Utuhe bia kudia, netufuile ku mesu kuebe bualu kai
Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Tangila, nakukuteka ha mutu ha buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Kadi biasumba muntu muhika wandi ku argent, ne hakamutengulabo, yeye udi mua kutshidia
Kuambulaye kela bua kumukosa mutu
Kahia ka ha tshioshelu kakajimi nansha, muakuidi neatekehu nkunyi dinda ne dinda, nealonge mulambu wa kuosha ha tshioshelu, neoshe dianyi dia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Ke bena Izrayele kudiela panshi bua kukuila Maweja Nangila

Ngikadiku wa bimwangalaji bia ngumu bia Mbulamatadi udi mulejibwa kudi dîyi didi dishindika ngambilu wa bwaalu pa bwaalu, dibenga kutwa ku tshia muntu ne tshibûngi tshia mmwenenu ya maalu mu dilongolola ne dimvwangalaja dia ngumu

Yeye neamukose bituha ne mutu ne dianyi, ne muakuidi neabilonge ha nkunyi idi mu kahia kadi ha mutu ha tshioshelu, kadi neuvuwe bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai, ne muakuidi neoshile bintu bionso ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Enza biamu bidi ne mahoka ne tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai ku mabaya makumi abidi, mahoka abidi ku dibaya ne ku dibaya, bualu bua kuelamu tutshi tua tutuhu
Pashishe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kutuma diyi bua bantu bende bumushe Abrame mu ditunga pamue ne mukajende ne bionsu bivuaye nabi
Pavua divuba adi dishale muaba wa tshijila matuku abidi, ngondu mujima, nansha matuku mapite bungi, bena Izrayele bavua anu basombe, bindile bua divuba dibande
Yeye wakabambila ne, Lelu nakuhita bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi; tshiena mua kuya ne mua kulua kabidi; ne Yehowa wakamana kungambila ne, Wewe kuena usabuka Yadene eu
Bualu mulambu ewu ngwa tshijila menemene
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bitanu ne nkama mai
Lea wakadi ne mesu a bulengu, kadi Lakele wakadi muimpe mubidi ne mpala wandi
Mutuangaji angate nyunyi umue wa ku idi muntu mufile, kamanda nkutshi nansha nkudimba, alambule nyunyi umue bu mulambu wa kudikobolola, mukuabu bu mulambu wa kuosha
Bakashimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa kumudilu mu tshidimu tshibidi
Kadi padiye ulambula mulambu wa diampa dikanga pa dilata, diampa adi dikale dienza ne bukula busopakaja ne mafuta, kabuyi buela buanga bua mampa to
Abalahama wakahuola muoyo wandi, wakafua mununu, bidimu biandi biakakumbana bia bungi, ne yeye wakadisangisha ne bankambua bandi

Mikenji Idi Ikandika Masandi Biabaka mulume mukashi, adi ulala n andi ne udi umukina, udi wambila bakuabo mei a bundu, udi wona lumu luandi, udi wamba ne, Nakabaka mukashi eu ne hanakasangila n andi bulalu, tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu mukashi utshidi kamama; hashishe tatu wa mushikankunde eu ne mamu wandi nebaluhuke ne bimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi bakulu ba mu musoko ne ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko
Nenungoshile kabidi mafuta a nyama ayi bua nganyishe dipembu diawu dimpe
Nennupe Sihone, muena Amore, mukalenga wa mu Eshebone, ne ditunga diende
Kuyabu mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Mmusue kutufila kudi bena Amore bua batushipe
Shela mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu, kulelaye Ebere

Muakuidi udi ku mutu kua bakuabo udi ne manyi mele ha mutu ne udi mujidila bua kuluata bilulu bia tshijila, kalekedi nsuki yandi tshianana, kahandi bilulu biandi nansha, kabuedi kudi muntu mufue nansha, kadinyangi bua tatu andi anyi mamu andi, kahatula ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu, kanyangishi nsubu wa Nzambi wandi nansha, bualu bua manyi a tshijila a Nzambi wandi adi ha mutu handi, meme ndi Yehowa
Kanukengeshi muenyi wa munkatshi muenu, bualu bua nuenu nudi bamanye mutshima wa muenyi, nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Kusakidila pa bukookeshi ebu, polovensa idi yabanyangana makookeshi makwabo ne Bukalenga bwa kumutu, ne yabanyangana kabidi nabu lupetu lwa ditunga mu bitupa bia bialukama ne
Kanuhu Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu muoyo; bualu bua yeye kena ne tshituha tshiandi ne buhianyi buandi kunudi
Yakoba wakamukonka ne, Ungambile dina diebe Muntu wakamuebesha ne, Udi unkonkela dina dianyi tshinyi
Yeshuluna, kakuena mukuabo bu Nzambi, udi ushikama biandi mu diulu bua kukukuatshisha: bulengele buandi budi ku mutu kua matutu
Nomba Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa Bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshionso bakela dî diabo bikole, bakadila butuku abu
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna Moshe ne: Meme ndi ne bukole bua kukumbaja bionsu abi
Eva kumuinyika dina dia Shete, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu wakumpesha muana mukuabu pa muaba wa Ebele uvua Kayine mushipe
Kutekaye miendu ayi bimpe bua kutokeshayi kumpala kua tshitekelu tshia miendu

Nudi mua kufila mulume wa ngombe anyi muana wa mukoko udi ne tshidimba tshiandi tshihita bule anyi buihi bu mulambu udi mitshima yenu misue kufila, kadi kanuena mua kufila nyama ei bu mulambu wa kuditshiha n au
Mikenji eyi idi itangila muntu mulume udi ne disama dia tufina, nansha udi ne biana bipatuka mu butaka, bimupisha mikiya
Kopola bisabata biebe, bualu udi muimane muaba wa tshijila
Mukenji ewu udi bua mukaji yonsu udibu babanda bua tshiendenda, nansha yeye muenze bualu bubi, mudinyange, mudinge bayende, nansha yeye kayi muenze bualu, bamubanda patupu
Nanku mupika apete anu budikadidi, bua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu anusankishe mu bionsu binudi nuenza
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua kumpeshabo bintu bia kuntendelela n abi, nenuangate kudi muntu ne muntu bintu bidi mutshima wandi musue bua kuntendelela n abi
Nebikale ne bowa bunene, babutuke
Kabidi nembutule mvidie idi bena Ejipitu batendelela
Kadi batentekedi babidi, Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, ne Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, kubungama, kudipanda bilamba
Padi disama diende dijika, mutuangaji neatume diyi bua batuale nyunyi ibidi ya muoyi idi kayiyi ne mikiya, mitshi ya sedre, bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama bilaba kakula, ne mabeji a mutshi wa isope
Mutuangaji angate tshintu tshimue tshia ku mulambu ne ku mulambu bua kulambula Maweja Nangila
Yehowa neanuhingashe mu Ejipitu kabidi mu matu mu nshila unakanuambila ne, Kanuena numutangila kabidi
Meme kutuluka kabidi ku mukuna, kuteka mabue awu mu mushete umvua muenze, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mungambile
Masungulangana badi baenza kudi bantu bônso, kaayi kansungansunga, muntu yônso weela kakanda pa nkayenda
Bana benu ba balume ne ba bakaji nebambule bintu abi
Agare kuandamuna ne: Ndi nnyema Sarayi, mfumuanyi wa mudimu
Yeye wakambila bantu ne, Nudilongolole ku dituku disatu, kanuyi ha buihi ne bakashi nansha
Afile kabidi kilo tshitema ya bukula bua mulambu busambakaja ne mafuta, ne tshitupa tshia litre tshia makuabu mafuta
Musangu ewu kabidi, Maweja Nangila kuitaba dilomba dianyi
Bishimikidi bipiabipia bia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata mbiôbi ebi: Mulombodi wa Ditunga; Tshimamwende wa bukalenga; Bukalenge bunene; Tubadi ne tubinadi

Genese Tunkanunuina tua Adama Eu udi mukanda wa ndelanganyi ya Adama Mu dituku diakafuka Nzambi bantu mu tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, wakabafuka mulume ne mukashi, wakabasankisha, wakabidika ne, Adama, mu dituku diakabafukeye
Wakenza mesu a mbote makumi atanu mu tshilulu tshimue, ne mesu a mbote makumi atanu mu tshilulu tshikuabo mesu a mbote akadi atuangana
Kalongu kitânu : Bidi bitangila ndekeelu wa mudimu wa tshipwita wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa

Wakamuluatshisha tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, wakateka Ulima ne Tumima mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, wakasa tshifulu ku mutu kuandi, wakasuika tshitotolo tshia tshiamu tshia or, tshintu tshia tshijila, ku mpala kua tshifulu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kabidi bankambua benu kabavua banji kumona tshipupu tshia mushindu ewu to
Katshia tumanyangana nenu, nudi amu nutombokela Maweja Nangila

Vùluka dilòòlò e Ndi waka benga Ngela cyanza ne kukwata Wewe nyi nyaya kwetu Bwà kupingana musela baabà Mêma kusengelela ee Ooo too ne mundinda, Kuula cibangu cyà bushùwà, Kunduupa kulusa munène Cyanàànà nyà kundiowa Cyena kupwa moyo cibangu cyà mukàwu Cindi ci mushingu cyà menu waka suma ee
Mvula kuloka pa buloba matuku makumi anayi a munya ne a butuku
Matuku muanda mutekete mamane kupita, mayi a tshipupu kuwuja buloba

Mu dituku dia muanda mutekete bana balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete, ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai bu mudi mukenji wamba; ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Kanubandi ku tshioshelu tshianyi ha tshibanda, bantu kabatangidi butaka buebe
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubweja mianda ya mapa a muntu yônso mu ndongamu yônso idi itangila dilongesha dia beena bilwilu , bampulushi ne beena midimu ya bukubi bwa ditunga
Padiye ufika ku ndekelu wa tshipungu tshidibu bamukosela, Mfumu wa Ditunga udi ushaala mu nkwaasa too ne padibo bashikika mfumu mupiamupia udibo basungula mu nkwaasa
Tshianana ndi mua kubashipa
Nuatue mu mashi adi mu dilongu
Batele bilulu bikese ha maha bua kutuangasha bituha bia efoda bibidi
Bikaleye mulume udi uhita bidimu makumi asambombo, wewe neubale nshekele dikumi ne itanu, ne bikaleye mukashi, nshekele dikumi
Neanuipatshile bisamba ebi muanda mutekete: bena Iti, bena Ngirgashi, bena Amore, bena Kenaane, bena Perizi, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa, bidi binupita bungi ne bukole
Maweja Nangila uvua anu mumuele lupemba mu malu onsu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nebashihe muntu au bulelela bantu bonso nebamukume ne mabue ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
dipeta dia bintu bwa majinga a ditunga, kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ;
Nusope tshitapitapi, nuenze mikata, bua kuyindambula bu mudibu bandambula ntete inudi nushipula, panudi bamane kunowa

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ulua n enu mu buloba buimpe, buloba budi bûle tente ne tusulu tua mai, ne mishimi ya mai idi ihatuka mu mikuna ne mu bibanda; buloba bua blê ne orge ne mionshi ya tumuma ne mitshi ya nfigi ne grenade; buloba bua mitshi ya olive ne buitshi; buloba bunudi mua kudia bidia bia bungi, kanuena nukengela tshintu; buloba budi ne biamu bia tubanda, nudi bamanye mua kumbula biamu bikunze bia tubanda ku mikuna yabu
Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ujadika budikadidi bwa kudisangisha ne bakwabo
Bavua bantete misangu ne misangu
Arone kusemena pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, kukosa muana wa ngombe muminu bua kudikobolola
Hanuahuola mu buloba ne hanuakuna mitshi ya mamuma, kunudi mamuma a mitshi tô bidimu bisatu
Ekesode Mose ne Bakulu ku Mukuna wa Sinai Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe kudi Yehowa ne wewe ne Alona ne Nadaba ne Abihu ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele makumi muanda mutekete, nuntendelele ha bule
Bidimu bimpe muanda mutekete biakadi buloba bua Ejipitu bulua ne bintu bia bungi biakashika
Labane kumuandamuna ne: Ambaku, tudi bakupa matshi
udi mumanye mua kubala tshituha tshinai tshia Bena Isalele nganyi
Elisafana muana wa balume wa Uziele neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba Bena Kohata
Nunku wambile Bena Isalele ne, Ndi Yehowa, ne meme nennuhatule muinshi mua majitu a Bena Ejipitu, nennusungile ku buhika buabo, nennuhikule ne diboko diolola ne dilumbulula dikole

Yosefe wakaya kujika tatu wandi, ne bena mudimu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Palô, ne bakulu ba mu nsubu wandi, ne bakulu bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Yosefe ne bana babo bonso, ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi, bakaya n andi, anu bana bakese ne mikoko ne bimuna biakashala mu buloba bua Goshene

Yeye neoshe tshilulu mu kahia, bikala disama mu milongo ya buludi anyi mu milongo ya butshiama ya bintu biakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko anyi bia lin anyi tshintu tshia tshiseba, edi ndisama dia nsudi, neboshe tshintu atshi mu kahia
Kuoshilaye Maweja Nangila mafuta onsu, ne tuonyi tubidi, ne lutandatanda lua ku mutshima, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Nenufile bintu ebi bidi kabiyi ne tshilema ku mutu kua milambu idibo bosha buatshia buatshia, ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Biafua nyama wa munkatshi mua nyama mudi mua kudia, mundi yonso udi ulenga tshianza tshiandi ham bidi handi neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Bena Merari nebenze midimu eyi: kuambula mabaya onsu a nzubu wa tshijila, makunji ne bitaku biawu; kuambula makunji a ku lupangu ne bitaku biawu, milonda ne mionji ne bintu bionsu bidibu nabi mudimu
Badi ne tshia kupeta difutu dia ndekeelu wa mudimu dikumbanangana ne dia ngondo isambombo ya mudimu
Bena Isalele bakadisangisha kudi Bâla peô ne tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bualu bua Bena Isalele
Nanku bena Amone kukuata ditunga adi, kuasamu
Baledi ba Rebeka kuanyisha bua Rebeka ne ndeji wende, uvua mumukoleshe, baye ne muena mudimu wa Abrahame, kabidi ne bonsu bavuaye muende nabu

Lewitiki Alona Udi Ufila Milambu Hakahita matuku muanda mukulu, Mose wakabikila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele, wakambila Alona ne, Angata kana ka ngombe bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga, bidi kabiyi ne tshitema, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ubifile ku mesu kua Yehowa
ne mutshima wanyi newikale ne muoyo
Pashishe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuambila mulume ne: Bua pawitabi diyi dia mukajebe, wewe kudia tshimuma tshimvua mukukandike, ndi ntshipa buloba bua tshilema tshiuvua muenze
Kuyaye ne mukajende Sarayi, ne Lote muana wa muanabu, kabidi ne bapika bavuaye musumbe mu Arane ne bintu bionsu
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi Kumanda mupite bônso wa bilwilu
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Monai, nakunvua lumu ne, Bintu bia kudia biakashala mu Ejipitu, yai bienu kuakua, nutusumbileku bia kudia, bua tuetu tuhanduke, katufu
Biakashala bu makumbu ne: Maweja Nangila akuambuluishe bua wikale tshilembi bu Nimrode
Moshe kumanyisha bena Izrayele bionsu abi
Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni, mukelenge wa bana ba Benyamina, wakafua bintu dituku dia tshitema

Bikala muntu mudioshe ne kahia, ne bikala munyinyi wa mu muaba muandamuke mutoke anyi mukunze, muakuidi neatangile ha muaba au, ne bikala miosa ya mu muaba au miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala disama dimane kubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, edi ndisama dia nsudi diakumueneka mu muaba wakadiosheye muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Mutuangaji akobolole muena tshibawu awu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Misangu mikuabu udi mua kundelela muana wa balume
Kuinyikaye Maweja Nangila uvua umuakuisha dina ne: Wewe udi Ele Royi, mmumue ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi mummone

Yeye neashihe muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neangate mashi makuabo a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, nealabe ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume
Yosefe udi bu ditamba dia mutshi diakakuama mamuma a bungi, udi bu mutshi hehi ne mushimi wa mai, matamba andi adi asambuka ha mutu ha lumbu
Bena Isalele nebadishimikile ntenta yabo, mundi ne muntu ku tshitudilu tshiandi, hehi ne dibendele diandi ku bisumbu biabo
Wewe musangane bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoku awu, udi mua kufuilaku musoku mujima luse, bua kupandisha bantu aba makumi atanu, anyi udi ubutula musoku mujima
Bena Amaleke ne bena Kenaane badi kunuyaya aku
Wakateka bakashi benji ba mudimu ne bana babo ku mpala, ne Lea ne bana bandi ku nyima kuabo, ne Lakele ne Yosefe ku nyima kuabo
Bantu bakavua bumvua lumu lua malu a nunku anyi
Abalahama wakamba ne, Muan anyi, Nzambi nkayandi neatuhe muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua, nunku bubidi buabo bakaya hohamue
Minisitila kavulambedi udi udipeta penda

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufunda olodonase wa dijaadika nende mu nkwaasa banguvelenele ba polovensa, ne bindonda biaabu bidibu basungula mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu, bu mudibio biamba mu kanungu ka
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Alona bakuidi bakadi ne manyi mela ha mitu, bakajidilabo bua kuenza mudimu wa buakuidi

Nenufile milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ha mutu ha milambu idibo bosha babala ngondo, ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua, bu mudi mukenji wamba, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Mukanda wa ditangilula dia Bukalenga bunene badi bawangata ne mushinga amu padiwu mutwa tshiâla kudi tshia binâyi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka

Ku butshika bua musoko nenuidikishe ku luseke lua ku esete coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku Sude coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku wesete coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku nôde coudées binunu bibidi Buloba ebu bua ku matshika a misoko nebuikale buhianyi buabo
Wewe neufue Bena Lewi kudi Alona ne kudi bana bandi balume bobo badi bafidibue kudi Alona, bua kukuatshishabo Bena Isalele
Kanutendeledi mvidie yabu, bualu mbuteyi budi mua kunufikisha ku lulu
Tuyai bietu hanshi, tutompakashe muaku wabo, nunku kabena mua kunvuangana muaku wabo kabidi
Tshiakunupesha kantu ka mu ditunga diabu to, nansha katupa ka buloba kakese
Badi mwa kutentemuna mpwila mambu mu mwaba mukwabo wa ditunga anu pikalabo bebeja dianyisha dia beena ditunga bônso
Nunku bana bakashi ba Lota babidi bakimita mafu kudi tatu wabo

Yeye wakalota tshiota, wakamona tshibandilu tshi shimika hanshi ne mutu watshi wakateka to ne mu diulu ne mona banjelo ba Nzambi bakadi babandahu, bahuekahu: Wakamona ne Yehowa wakadi muimane ku mutu watshi, wamba ne Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Abalahama, kaku webe ne Nzambi wa Isaka buloba budi ulalahu nenkuhebu wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe
Neutshiteke ha muonshi wa bleu muhindakasha, utshisuike ku mpala kua tshilulu
Genese Hashishe Yosefe wakaya, wakambila Palo ne, Tatu wanyi ne bana betu bakulua ku buloba bua Kanâna ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi, mona, badi mu buloba bua Goshene
Mutuangaji neakobolole muntu awu bua bamufuile luse
Kanuena bamanye ne: ngwa tshijila menemene anyi
Genese Yakoba Udi Uvudishila Efelayima ne Manashe Disanka Hakashika malu a bakambila Yosefe ne, Mona tatu webe udi usama; yeye wakaya kudiye ne bana bandi ba balume babidi, Manashe ne Efelayima
Isaka wakalombela mukashi wa ndi Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakadi nkumba, Yehowa wakamunvuila ne Lebeka wakimita difu
Pashishe mukalenga kupesha Abrame bintu bia bungi mu dina dia Sarayi: mikoku, mbuji, ngombe, tumelu, nyama ya mpunde milume ne mikaji, bapika balume ne bakaji
Bana aba ke ndelanganyi yonsu ya Ketura
Kadi, padi kanyama aka kafue, kaponena mu ntete mimane kubombeka mu mayi bua kuyidia, ntete ayi idi ipia mikiya

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Hakikisha mushete, yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, uhingana biebe kudi binunu bia binunu bia Bena Isalele
Yeye wakamba ne, Nue biebe, mukelenge wanyi, yeye wakatula mulondo wandi lubilu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakamunuisha
Neafile muana wa mukoko mukuabo dilolo, neufile mulambu wa bukula bu mûdi wenza dinda ne nvinyo udibo banua, mulambu udibo bosha ha kahia, udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Njila wa kumpala : Bidi bitangila Bukalenga bwenzeji
Nenukuate ditunga, divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu
Mbulamatadi udi usonsola ne wenza mwenda mônso bwa kukuba ditantshisha dia bubanji bwa muntu nkayende, bwa beena ditunga ne bwa beenyi
Nfue bianyi lufu lua muntu muakane, ne kunshikidilu kuanyi kuikale bu kuandi
Bana balume ba Palu: Eliaba
Mikenji ya bena Levi d
Wakamona miehu mikuabo muanda mutekete yakadi mikese, yakafubidila ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, yakadiunda kuinshi kua mikuabo
