Genese Isaka Udi Ku Gelâ Tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba ku nyima kua tshiole tshia diambedi tshiakadiku mu matuku a Abalahama Isaka wakaya kudi Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Bena Peleshete, mu Gelâ
Tshisamba tshia Ashere:

Udi usonsakaja beena Kongu mwa kwendabo mushinga mushadila, kufuka bintu mu lungenyi, kwenza midimu ya bianza ne kabidi udi wenza mwende mônso bwa kukuba ne bwa kuvulula mamanya mapiluke ne makookeshi adi mu ditunga
Ebê wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu ne binai, wakalela Pelege

Yehowa Nzambi wakamuelela mukenji ne, Udi mua kudia mamuma a mitshi yonso ya mu budimi, bu mûdi musue, kadi mamuma a mutshi wa lungenyi lua kujingulula malu mimpe ne malu mabi kuadi nansha, bualu bua mu dituku diudi wadia wewe neufue bulelela

dienza dia ndongamu wa mianda ya madimi, ya meetu ne ya nzembu idi yambulwisha Ditunga dijima ne ditwangaja dia ndongamu idi yambulwisha polovensa; biâpu bia bia pa madimi ne bishimikidi bidi bifwanangana pamwe ne diabanya dia beenji ba mudimu bilondeshila mukanda mulongolodi wa ngikadilu wa beena mudimu ba mbulamatadi bashindame

Mu dituku ba disanka dienu, ne mu bikondo binudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, ne mu tshibangidilu tshia ngondo yenu, nenuele mpungi ku milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, ne ku milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, neyikale bu tshivulukidi ku mesu kua Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Lebeka wakabika ne bena mudimu bandi ba bakashi, bakabanda ha nyima ha tumelo, bakalonda muntu wa Abalahama, yeye wakangata Lebeka, wakaya mu nshila wandi

Muakuidi neangate mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, nealabe mashi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha, ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume
Lua biebe, nenkutume kudi Palo, Ulue biebe ne bantu banyi, bana ba Isalele, badi mu Ejipitu
Ekesode Dibikidibua dia Besalele ne Oholiaba Ek
didimwija ku tshinyangu tshia makanda a bubanji;
Mutuangaji ambule dianza dia bukula budi ne mafuta, ambule kabidi musenga wa kamonya onsu
Munkatshi mua lupangu muvua mutshi wa muoyi ne mutshi wa kujingulula malu mimpe ne mabi
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Nanku angata mupika wanyi ewu, ikale mukajebe
Padiwu ushala, baudie baujikija patshiabu
Balami ba mikoko bakalua, bakabihata, kadi Mose wakabika, wakabasankisha, wakanuisha mikoko yabo mai
Padiye umona ipatuka tufina, neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya
Muntu udi ushiha mukuabo nebamushihe

Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena uteleja Moshe ne Arone Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Pikala mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ujinga bua numuenzele bishima, wewe Moshe wambile Arone ne: ela dikombu diebe panshi

Nenufile diatshimue ne mulambu wa bukula wa bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha busangisha ne manyi, mulambu wa kutua dihembu dimpe muoshile Yehowa, nenufile mulambu wa nvinyo wa kunua wa tshituha tshinai tshia hin
Tshibangidilu ABRAHAME Mvidi Mukulu udi ubikila Abrame Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Umuke mu ditunga dienu, mu diku dienu ne ku nzubu kua batatuebe

Mu dituku dibidi nenufile bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi budi, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Bualu bua ndi mbandisha tshianza tshianyi kulu bua kuditshiha ne, Bu mundi muikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Funda bualu ebu mu mukanda, bua bantu babuvuluke
Dibadika Midimu ya bena Levi a

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi katangila tshilumbu tshia dibenga kumvwangana dia Dîyi dikulu ne dipangadika diônso dia mêyi ne mikandu anyi dia buludiki, difila ku anyi kudi tshilumbulwilu kampanda
Nanku mutuangaji ambule dianza dia bukula bua tshivulukilu, aboshe pa tshilambuilu
Nanku kapia kikale katema anu kutema pa tshilambuilu kashidi, kakayi kajima
Nsongakaji kumuambila kabidi ne: Kumbelu kuetu kudi muaba wa nuenu kulala, kudi kabidi bisosa bivule bia kuladika nyama ne bia kuyidisha
Bua nuenu kuvuluka mikenji eyi kashidi, nuyisuike ku maboku enu ne mu mpala yenu
Kabeena mwa kufunda, kukwata , kweela mu lukanu anyi kupiishisha muntu kampanda bwa bwaalu bwenza kudi munga muntu to
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Gada, Gewele, muana mulume wa Maki
Ubueshemu mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ubuikile mushete ne tshilulu tshia mu nsubu
Bakafunda bifuanyikishi bia tumuma tukese tua grenade ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso
Aba mbantu bakabalabo mu meku a Bena Kohata bakadi benza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakababala kudi Mose ne Alona, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Panudi nudia mampa kaayi mela buanga nanku, nenuvuluke dituku dinuvua bapatuke ne lubilu mu Ejipitu
dikosa dia bitadi,dîkala ne bitadi bia pa binwibwa bikola,pa kumusha bitadi bidibo bateeka ku kanungu ka ;
Kadi Yehowa wakakolesha mutshima wa Palô, yeye kakalekela Bena Isalele
Mu luse luebe wewe wakalombela bantu bawakuhikula, wewe wakabenzesha mu bukole buebe to ne ku muaba webe wa tshijila
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu dikumi ne bitanu
Bakaya ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Dana, bobo bakadi halua ku nyima kua bakuabo, bakaya ku luendu luabo ku bisumbu biabo, ne Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Ke bana muanda mukulu bavua Milka mulelele Nahore, muanabu ne Abrahame
Kabidi nushale anu ku nzubu yenu too ne muatshia butuku
Tuetu katuena ne diyi dia kuamba
Kujadikabu ne: Maweja Nangila mmubasungidile mu bianza bia bena Ejipitu ku bukole buende
Nebiambuluishe benyi, bana ba nshiya ne bakaji bakamba banudi nabu
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Tshitupa tshia milambu ivuabu balambula Maweja Nangila etshi, ntshienu nuenu batuangaji, bu mu vua Maweja Nangila mungambile
Kadi Yehowa wakanusungula bienu, wakanuhatula mu tshikutu tshia kahia, mu Ejipitu mene, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi, bu mu dituku edi
midimu ya mbulamatadi wa ditunga;
Yeye wakayambila ne, Nuambile mukelenge wanyi Esau nunku ne, Muntu webe Yakoba udi wamba ne, Nakashikama ne Labana, nakushalaku to ne katataka
Nanku nembutule anu bena Ejipitu
Uvua muambule mukajende ne bana bende pa nyama wa mpunde
Mu musulu wa Nile nemuikale ndimba mipite bungi
Pikale boya bua muaba awu butokoloke, kabidi muaba awu mondoke, mutuangaji neajadike ne: muntu awu udi ne disama dia nsudi

Dituku dikuabu pikala muntu wa kunudi, bamubikila mu musokoku kudi muanabu wa balume, kudi muanabu wa bakaji, kudi mukajende mene, nansha kudi mulunda wende udiye mupite kunanga, bua kutendelela mvidie mikuabu, inuvua kanuyi bamanye, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu, kanuena mua kumuitaba to
Tangila, Lebeka udi ku mpala kuebe, umuangate, uye n andi, yeye neikale mukashi wa muana mulume wa mukelenge webe bu muakamba Yehowa
Kadi tuetu kupawula bimuna ne bintu bionsu bituvua basangane mu bimenga abi
Bantu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Yuda, nebase mitanda ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu luseke ludi diba dipatukila, muaba udi dibendela diabu
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu
Yeye neambule dianza dia bukula bubotesha tente budi busangisha ne manyi ne musenga wa manananshi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu tshintu tshidi tshima dihembu, bu tshivulukidi kudi Yehowa
Nanku neusangishe makombu dikumi ne abidi
Bavua bambila Moshe ne: Wewe nkayebe utuambile malu onsu, netuteleje
Ndi ne mukajebe ne bana bebe kabidi
Pashishe mutuangaji neele bintu abi mulu, neabinyukule bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila
Bakelenge ba Edome bakukema, balume bakole ba Moaba badi bazakala, bantu bonso ba mu buloba bua Kanana bakujimina
Hakaleha bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu, mu dituku adi mene mene, bisumbu bionso bia bantu ba Yehowa bakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Mose wakolola mula ngala wandi ha buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa wakatuma luhehele luaku esete dituku adi to ne hakatshia butuku, ne dinda luhehele lua ku esete luakatuma mikumbi
Alona wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuikadi ne tshiji tshikole, wewe udi mumanye bantu aba, badi ne mitshima yabo ku malu mabi
Genese Yosefe ne Mukashi wa Potifâ Bakaya ne Yosefe mu Ejipitu, ne Potifa, kamanda ka masalayi a Palo, Muena Ejipitu, wakamusumba ku bianza bia Bena Yishemaele, bakalua n andi
Muladilu wa Dituku dia Dikisha, pikala bena Izrayele balamba biakudia bivuabu baboya bua kudia dituku dimue, nebituntumuke bienze bia matuku abidi
Meme kuikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete, kudijidila, bua dikale dituku dia Dikisha
Mutuangaji abiele mulu, abinyukule, abioshile bionsu Maweja Nangila pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa kuosha, udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Yehowa neanutumine masama mabi tô ne hanuajimishibua ha buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana
Pashishe Arone kukosa nyama wende wa tshimpanga wa mulambu wa kuosha awu muminu
Kupinganaye mu Ejipitu
Tshisamba ne tshisamba tô ne bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele nebitume bantu tshinunu ku nvita

Bualu bua ndi musue Bena Isalele bangate milambu idibo basue kushihela mu tshisuku, balue n ai kudi Yehowa, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena kudi muakuidi, bayifile bu mulambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala kudi Yehowa
Mayi neanunke mupuya mubi
Moshe kusengelela Maweja Nangila
Nudi mua kudia bintu ebi bia mu mai bintu bidi ne mialala ne mabamba bidi mu mai manene ne mu misulu
Moshe udi unyemena ku Madiyane Moshe mumane kukola, kuyaye bua kumonangana ne bana babu
Mweena Kongu yônso udi mwikala ne mapa ende a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwasa tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi anyi bwa kubweela mu tshisumbu tshidiye muswa

Nenuteke bintu ebi hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenutendelele ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nenusanke mu malu mimpe onso akanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne ba mu nsubu yenu, ne Muena Lewi ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu
Butuku bujima Maweja Nangila kutuma tshipepela tshikole, tshifumina luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Wewe neuyiteke mu ntenta wa kusambakena ku mpala kua mushete kundi ndimuenesha, muaba utudi tusangakana n ebe
Mulambu wende kawena ne mushinga, bualu munyinyi kautshiena muimpe kabidi bua kuenza nawu midimu ya tshijila
Bavua bantu ba bukole

Nubambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi ne muoyo, bu munuakuamba mu matshu anyi, nennuenzele nunku: mibidi yenu neyihone hanshi mifue mu tshihela etshi, buonso buenu baka balabo ba bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakadi bantontolola, bulelela, nuenu kanuena nulua mu buloba bunakanulaya bua nuenu nushikamemu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Pashishe nebabuikile tshiseba tshikole tshia nyama wa nkonga pa bintu bionsu ebi, babiteka pa mabaya a kubiambula nawu
MUTU WA MUKANDA VII: Bidi bitangila ndondu ne diumvwangana ne matunga makwabo Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upunga ne ujadika ndondu ne diumvwangana ne matunga makwabo
Kusungulabu munkatshi muabu bakaji bavuabu basue kusela
Mikumbi yakamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, yakatamba bungi, kakuakadi mikumbi bu ei diambedi, ne mikuabo bu ei kayena ilua kabidi
Bualu bidi mulambu wa tshivulukilu, udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Bualu idi ipingaja bintu mukana, ibidia kabidi, kadi kayena ne mikonu mipanduluke to
Lewitiki Mikenji ya Kuikala ba Tshijila ne Kulumbulula Kuakane Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ndi wa tshijila
Mvula awu kubutula bimenga bionsu bibidi, kushipa bantu, kunyanga ditunga ne madimi mene kashidi
Nanku kanubatshinyi to
Budimu bua Labana ne Yakoba Hakalela Lakele Yosefe, Yakoba wakambila Labana ne, Untume ha bule, nye bianyi kuanyi, ku buloba buanyi
Tshidimu tshiavua, ngondu wa momumue, nempingane apa
Bu mudi nyunyu wa mukanku unyungisha disua diandi, udi uhahala ha mutu ha bana bandi; nunku yeye wakolola mahuahua andi, wakabangata, wakabatuala ha mahuahua andi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ufunde bualu ebu mu mukauda bu tshivulukidi, ububadile mu matshu a Yoshua ne, Meme nenjimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu
Nanku Moshe kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile bua kuenzela bena Levi
Bilema bionsu bidibu benzamu, nebibakuate amu bobu
Nenuenze nunku kudi mulume wa ngombe yonso anyi kudi tshimpanga tshionso anyi kudi bana ba balume ba mikoko anyi kudi mbushi

Bakangata bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso biakangatabo mu buloba bua Kanana, bakalua mu Ejipitu, Yakoba ne tunkanunuina tuandi bionso bana bandi ba balume bakaleleye, ne bana ba balume ba bana bandi, ne bana bandi ba bakashi bakaleleye, ne bana ba bakashi ba bana bandi, wakalua ne buonso buabo mu Ejipitu
Amiyele, muana wa Ngemali, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dane
Nuudile nuenu nkayenu anu muaba awu, pamue ne mampa a tshijila
Batuangaji bateke nkunyi pa tshilambuilu, batemeshe kapia
Bobo nebabikile bantu ku mikuna, nebashiheleku milambu ya buakane: bua bobo nebadie bintu bia bungi bia mu mai manene, ne bintu bimpe bidi bisokoma muinshi mua nsenga
Bakalenga batanu aba kudisangisha mu tshibandabanda tshia Sidime mmumue ne muaba udi lelu Mayi manene a luepu
Utuute dikombu pa lubuebue, mayi apatuke bua bena Izrayele banue

Bwa kujadika mungalata mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata, Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi didi dimanya anu bishimikidi bikwatshishi bia mungalata bibidi: Kasumbu kadikadila kimikila mianda ya Masungulangana, kadi ne tshia kulongolola midimu ya masungulangana kamuyi dikosoloja ne Kapangu ka ku mutu kimikila mianda ya ngumu ne ya dishintakaja ngenyi, kadi ne tshia kushindika budikadidi ne dikubiba dia batshikuma mbila ne dia bia kumanyisha nabio bantu bônso mianda, mu dinemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu
Bena Ejipitu bakenzesha bantu bualu bua kubihata mu buloba lubilu, bakamba ne, Tudi bantu bafue bonso
Kuambaye kabidi ne: Bantu batumbishe Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa Sheme
Au mmeku a Yuda, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne bisambombo ne nkama itanu
Mamuende wa Rebeka, ne muanabu ne Rebeka, kuandamunabu ne: Nsongakaji anji ashale kabidi matuku dikumi

Nunku halua matata ne makenga makole kudibo, musambu eu newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu, neudiambe kudibo; bana babo kabahu musambu eu muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi mumanye meji adibo n au mu mitshima yabo lelu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua n abo mu buloba bunakabalaya

MUTU WA MUKANDA MWINÂYI IV: Bidi bitangila polovensa Tshitupa tshia kumpala : Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia polovensa Kanungu ka Bishimikidi bia polovensa mbiôbi ebi: a Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa b Bukalenga bwa mu polovensa
dibangisha dia midimu ya didimukila mvula, ya mwinshi mwa buloba, ya dizola dia misoko ne dizola dia misulu;
Ke munudi nuenu kabidi mua kundambula tshintu ku tshia dikumi tshinudi nupeta kudi bana benu bena Izrayele
Nubivuluke, nubienze; bualu ebu budi lungenyi luenu ne budimu buenu ku mesu kua bantu badi bunvua mikenji ei yonso, badi bamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba banene badi ne lungenyi ne budimu
Pashishe bintu bionsu bidi bishale, mutuangaji umuke nabi mu mitanda, aye kubiosha bu mudibu bosha bintu bidi bishale bia ngombe mulume, padibu bakobolola mutuangaji munene
Muhuya webe wakabandisha mai, akimana bu tshimama, mai akimana dibula
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nuakunyunguluka mukuna eu musangu mule, yai bienu ku nôde
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Yuda bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombo ne nkama mai ku bisumbu biabo Bobo nebaye ku mpala

Dutelonone Mukenji Mutambe Bunene Ei mmikenji ne â mmei ne â mmalu wakangambila Yehowa bua kunumanyisha, bua nuenu nubienze mu buloba bunudi nuhiana: bua nuenu nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi onso ne mikenji yandi, binakanuambila, ne wewe ne muan ebe mulume, ne muana wa muan ebe mulume, matuku onso a muoyo wenu; bua wewe uvudishe matuku ebe
Moshe kukema, wamba ne: Akia
Kubakobololaye bua kumusha mikiya
Mpindiewu tudi tuenda tubutuka, katuyi ne biakudia bionsu ebi
Yosefe wakasangisha matete bu bungi bua nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene, akatamba bungi, yeye wakalekela kua bala, kabakamanya mua kuabala
Dituku ditanu: Shelumiyele, muana wa Surishadayi, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Shimeyone

Nuye anu ne bintu binuakajidila ne milambu yenu ya kuditshiha ku muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; nenufile milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne munyinyi ne mashi, ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nuhongolole mashi a milambu yenu ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nudie munyinyi wau
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia, wakaladika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso bua kutuala n ai mesa
Nanku ambila bena Izrayele mu dina dianyi ne: Ndi Maweja Nangila
Hakatangila bantu difutu dimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta, bantu bonso bakabika, bakatendelela muntu ne mu ntu ku ntenta wandi

Kalongo ka kumpala : Bidi bitangila bampulushi ba ditunga dijima Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi babimikila dikuba dia bantu bônso, dikuba dia bantu ne bintu biabo, dilaminyina ne dipingaja dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso pamwe ne dilama pabwipi dia bamfumu banene
Tuetu kukuata bimuna, ne bintu bionsu bituvua basangane mu bimenga abi

Tshiseba tshia muana wa ngombe ne munyinyi wandi wonso ne mutu wandi ne bioku biandi ne bintu bia munda ne tuma tuandi ne mubidi wandi mujima, neabituale ku butshika bua tshitudilu ku muaba muteke kudibo bela butue, neabioshe ha nkunyi ne kahia, yeye neabioshile kudibo bela butue
Maweja Nangila kupatula bena Izrayele mu Ejipitu, balondangane mu bisamba biabu
Shekeme muana mulume wa Hamo, Muena Hiwi, mukelenge muana wa buloba, wakamutangila wakamukuata, wakalala n andi, wakamufuisha bundu
Uvua mumane kumuka ku tshiina tshia mayi tshia Lahayi Royi

Kanungu ka Padi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadibu bakonkesha kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, kudi Bukalenga bunene, kudi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia batshipwita bakulumpa, kamba ne ndondu anyi diumvwangana ne ditunga dikwabo udi ne kambilu kadi kakayi kumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu, dijadika anyi dianyisha didi mwa kwenzeka amu panyima pa dilongolola dia Dîyi dikulu
Buloba bua Argobe, ne bua Bashane, badi babubikila kabidi ne: ditunga dia Refayime
Kanubatshinyi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila nvita
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu kakudi netu nansha
Hakashikisha Mose kusomba n abo, yeye wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala handi

Kadi bua malu au onso hayabo mu buloba bua bantu badi n abo lukuna, meme tshiena mbahidia, tshiena ngikala n abo tshiji bua kubashiha tshiendelele ne bua kushiha tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga n abo, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, kadi bua bualu buabo nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga ne bankambua babo banakahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kua bisamba bia bantu, bua meme kuikala Nzambi wabo meme ndi Yehowa

Genese Bubi bua Bantu Hakabanga bantu kusangana ba bungi ha buloba ne hakalelabo bana bakashi, bansongalume ba bantu ba Nzambi bakamona bana bakashi ba bantu ba tshianana ne, Mbalengele, bakasungula bonso bakasuabo bu bakashi babo Yehowa wakamba ne, Nyuma wanyi kena utendekena bantu tshiendelele, bualu bua badi anu ba ha buloba, ne matuku abo neikale bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi
Nebenze midimu yonsu idi itangila nzubu wa tshijila bua kuambuluisha bena Izrayele
Labana wakamuambila ne Bingikala ne diakalengele ku mesu kuebe ushale biebe, bualu bua meme nakumana kujingulula ne, Yehowa wakunsankisha bua bualu buebe
Nembutule mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne tshiluilu tshiende tshijima, matempu ne badi babanda pa tubalu
Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi benza mudimu wabo pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga, mu dineemeka dia Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi ne dia mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga

Kanungu ka Mêyi adi Dîyi dikulu dipeesha bukookeshi bwa kwikala dîyi dilongolodi,badi baelela tukanda ne baakaja kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beena mu tshibambalu ne tshibambalu mu mishindu idi ilonda eyi: a tshialwa kwikala dîyi badi batshiteeka ku dijooja ne dieela dia tukanda dia Tshibambalu tshidibo bamanyisha kumpala amu padi tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu tshikumbana panyima pa ditshifila ku Bukalenga bunene; b bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ke budibo balonda
Biakuma ngombe wa muntu ngombe wa muntu mukuabo, biamushiheye, bobo nebahane ngombe udi ne muoyo, nebabanyangane mushinga wandi, nebabanyangane ngombe mufue, kabidi
Uvua ubamanyishayi munkatshi mua kapia ne divuba dia muinshi
Kanungu ka Beena bukalenga bunene badi babweela mu midimu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe pamwe ne ya tusumbu tukese twabi
Muntu yônso udi ne tshia kuneemeka Dîyi dikulu ne kulonda mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga
Bintu bidi bilandala, nansha bidi bienda ne mikolu inayi, nansha ne ya bungi, kanuena mua kubidia to
Yeye wakatshina ne, Yeye neafue bu muakafua bana babo
Noa wakadi ne bidimu nkama isambombo hakaloka nvula ha buloba
Mmunyoke mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bantu bende bonsu, pavuabu banuipata ne biluilu biabu, tubalu ne matempu
Kadi bua bimuma bia mutshi udi munkatshi mua lupangu, Mvidi Mukulu mmutukandike ne: kanudi, kanulengi bua kanuvu kufua
Abrahame, kujuka dinda dionsu, kupesha Agare diampa ne kabulubulu tente ne mayi
Labana Wakabikila dina dia muaba au ne, Yegâsahaduta, kadi Yakoba wakaubikila ne, Galede

Bana ba balume ba Yakoba bakahingana ku tshisuku hakunvuabo lumu elu, mutshima yabo yakanyingalala, bakadi ne tshiji tshikole bualu bua yeye wakafuisha bana ba Isalele bundu hakalaleye ne muana mukashi wa Yakoba bualu ebu kabuena buimpe bua kuenza
Hakadi Alona wambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele nunku, bakatangila ku tshihela, ne monai, butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka mu ditutu
Bualu bua difutu dia Yehowa diakadi ha mutu ha nsubu mu munya, ne mu butuku kahia kakadihu, ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso mu ngendu yabo yonso
Kadi nuenu kubenga, ditambisha kunuenza
Dituku edi nedikale kunudi bu tshmilukidi, nenudilame bu disanka dia Yehowa, nuenu nenuvuluke dituku edi ne tshivulukidi etshi tshiendelele
Dîyi didi mwa kupatuka amu padibo badiamba ne didi diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi kaakula mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu panyima pa dimanya
Nowa uvua munue maluvu mukuatshike
Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe

Kadi ban a bute ba ngombe ne ba mikoko ne ba mbushi, wewe kuena ubihikula, ebi mbintu bia tshijila wewe neumiamine mashi abi ha tshioshelu, newoshe dianyi diabi bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Bidimu ebi makumi anayi, bilamba bienu kabiena bisunsuke, makasa enu kaena muwule to
Biasanganabo bintu bidi ne muoyo mu tshianza tshiandi, nansha ngombe nansha mpunda nansha mukoko, yeye neahingashe bintu misangu ibidi
Eu mmukenji wa bukoya buandi nansha hahatuka tufina mu mubidi wandi nansha hashalatu mu mubidi tudi anu tubi
Bakamufuisha mukau ne nzambi ya bende; bakamufikisha munda ne malu mabi
Ke midimu idi bena Ngershone ne bua kuenza mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Awu ne: Muananyi
Maweja Nangila, bena Izrayele aba mbantu bebe, baudi mudisunguile, bauvua mupikule, mupatule mu Ejipitu ku bukole ne ku makanda ebe mapite
Udi upumuna mashi a muntu, nebapumune ende kudi muntu, bualu mbafuke muntu mufuanangane ne Mvidi Mukulu
Tshitekelu tshia Minda tshia Or Ek
Bobo nebanusombeshe bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nubasombesha bintu; bobo nebikale bu mitu, nuenu nenuikale bu mikila
Dana nealumbuluile bantu bilumbu biabo, bu tshimue tshia mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Nenuvulangane, bu muvuaye mulaye bankambua benu
Kuimanaye pankatshi pa bantu bavua bamane kufua, ne batshivua ne muoyi
Lukita luende bavua baluenze mu dibue
Kabiela nu bwîlà Mulopo mu mpangà bantu
Bimenga bisatu bia kunyemena Diba adi, Moshe kusungula bimenga bisatu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene
Pakuatshikaye, tuangatangane nende bua tumulelele bana

Bikaleye mubaka kudi mulume hatshidiye ne kuditshiha kuandi anyi mei makuabo akaditshiheye n au ne biunvua mulume wandi ne biahuweye mu dituku diakunveye kuditshiha kuandi, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Ya biebe kudi Palô ne dinda, hayeye ku mai, wimane kukala kua musulu bua kusangakena n andi, uye ne mulangala wakakudimuka nyoka au mu tshianza tshiebe
Abrahame kuandamuna ne: Mvua muele meji ne: bantu ba kuneku kabena batshina Mvidi Mukulu
Wakenza tshintu tshia or bunene bua butshiama bua tshianza ku matengu onso

Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa dikumi ne umue, bena Izrayele bamane kukumbaja bidimu makumi anayi katshia bapatuke mu Ejipitu, Moshe kubamanyisha bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mutume diyi bua kuenzabu
Pashishe mutuangaji abioshe pamue ne munyinyi onsu udi pa tshilambuilu, bua dipembu dimpe dia mulambu wa kuosha disankishe Maweja Nangila
Ke muudi mua kumfuila luse, tshiyi mmona kabidi dikenga dindi nadi edi to
Nenujadike ne: meme Maweja Nangila ndi Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bintu bimpe bia manyi ne bia tumuma tukese ne bia manvua ne bia mamuma adibo bahuola diambedi, bintu bionso bidibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nakukuha bintu ebi

Tshisangilu tshia banguvenêla ba polovensa tshidi tshikumbajibwa, pa kumbusha banguvenêla ba polovensa, kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga, kudi minisitila Kavulambedi ne kudi minisitila mwimikila mianda ya munda mwa ditunga
Nanku nyunyi kupingana
Yeye neikale muakuidi webe kudi bantu, yeye neikale bu mukana muebe ne wewe newikale bu Nzambi kudiye
Bidi bimueka ne: kakuena tshidi mua kubakolela kabidi
Maweja Nangila, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne bukole, tshidi tshibutula baluishi bebe
Bantu bamona nanku, kuitababu
Binuahidia kutunvuila bua kutengu dibua, hashishe, netuangate muan etu wa bakashi, netuye
Nenutshimune bena Anake, bantu bale ba bukole, badi bantu bakuabu batshina, bamba ne: Kakuena udi mua kukandamana kudi ndelanganyi ya Anake
Mutuangaji akobolole muena tshibawu anu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse bua tshibawu tshivuaye muenze atshi
Kakamanya Palô bualu ebu, wakakeba kushiha Mose
Anu mu Madiyane amu, Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Eyowa, pingana mu Ejipitu, bualu bantu bonsu bavua bakuelela meji mabi mbamane kufua
Mu tshibandabanda tshia Sidime, bavua bumbulemu bina bia bungi bia kabudimbu

Bena Levi badi bapingana pa muaba wa bamuanabute Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubadike bamuanabute bonsu ba balume ba bena Izrayele, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, ufunde mena abu
Kanushiminyinyi mukuenu bualu
Buloba kabuakadi busunguluka, buakadi butuhu, midima yakadihu, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakadi unyunguluka ha mutu ha mai
Lakele wakambila tatu andi ne, Mukelenge kanfuidi tshiji, bualu bua meme tshiena mbika ku mpala kuebe, bualu bua ndi mujingakana tshilele tshia bakashi tshidi n anyi
Moshe kuolola dikombu mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Meme ndi ne bukole bua kukukengesha n abu, kadi Nzambi wa tatu ebe wakungambila butuku bua lelu ne, Udimuke, kuambidi Yakoba nansha dî dimpe nansha di dibi

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshitwilangana mudibio bikengedibwa mu midimu ya pabwayi mu dituku dia dikumi ne ditânu panyima pa dipatula dia bipeta bia masungula a batshipwita kudi Kasumbu kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana mu ditunga dijima bwa kumona mwa: a kuteeka bilo bia tshitupa tshîpi bidibo balombola kudi mukulu ku bidimu mwambulwisha kudi bantu babidi ba bidimu bishaadila; b kwitabuuja makookeshi; c kusungula ne kuteeka bilo bia kashidi; d kwenza ne kwanyisha mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda
Muakuidi wa munkatshi mua bana balume ba Alona, udibo bela manyi ha mutu bua kuhianeye mudimu wandi, neaufile kudi Yehowa bu muakelabo mukenji tshiendelele, neboshe mulambu eu mujima
Mu dinda, nupingane ku nzubu yenu
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi muhika, udi mubangila kudi mulume, udi kayi muanze kuhikudibua, nebabakengeshe bubidi buabo, kabena babashiha bualu bua yeye kakadi muhikudibue
Bena Gada bakasa Dibona ne Atalota ne Aloe ne Atalota shofana ne Yazê ne Yogebeha, ne Betenimela ne Betehalana, misoko yakadi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne mpangu ya mikoko
Padi muntu mushale ne tshibangu tshia tshiuja pambidi, padi tshibangu tshiuwula tshiakabidi, nansha dikeji ditokoloke dimueneka mu tshibangu atshi, muntu awu aye kudileja kudi mutuangaji
Kubipatabu too ne ku Oba, luseke lua ku mutu kua Damase

Ke bena Izrayele kuya kuasa ku ditunga dijima adi, kutuadijila ku tshimenga tshia Aroyere, tshidi ku muelelu wa musulu wa Amone, too ne ku mukuna wa Ermone, udibu babikila kabidi ne: Siyone, ditunga dijima dia luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, too ne ku Mayi manene a luepu, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisga
Matuku a kunowa akumbana, Kayine kulambula Maweja Nangila biakudia bia mu madimi ende
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tangila, dituku dia lufu luebe dikadi ha buihi: bikila Yoshua, ne bubidi buenu nudisangishe mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua meme mmudimushe
Kanuhanduludi mikalu ya bantu bakuabo yakahandabo kudi bakaku benu diambedi, mu buhianyi buenu mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Badi babuleeja mu mishindu idi mêyi ne mikandu a ditunga mafunda
Nulame mukenji ewu kashidi
Nunku bakashikisha mudimu wonso wa tshitendelelu, ntenta wa kusangakena, Bena Isalele bakenza malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Dutelonone Matuku a Masanka Majalame Ek
Hanuakuna matamba a mitshi yenu ya olive bua mamuma ahone, kanuakumi tshiakabidi; neashale a benyi ne a bana ba nshiya ne a bakashi ba mu lufuila
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi wosha, ubutula bu kapia
Nuenu nuakalua kundi, buonso buenu muakamba ne, Tutume bantu ku mpala kuetu, bua hobo batentekele buloba, bahingane, batumanyishe bua nshila utudi tuyamu, ne misoko itudi tubuelamu
Wewe neuboteshe tshituha, utshiteke ku mpala kua mushete wa Nzambi mu ntenta wa kusangakena kundi nsangakena n ebe, netshikale tshilamba tshia tshima kunudi
buludiki bwa bungenda mushinga ne matunga meenyi;
Mose wakamanyisha Yehowa mei a bantu

Bana ba Yuda ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Yuda binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne binai ne nkama isambombo

Kanungu ka Makumbaja ku tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia lupetu kabeena baangata ne mushinga to padi dianyisha dilela dikeepesha dia lupetu ludi lubwela anyi divudija dituula dia lupetu, pa kumbusha pikalawu malêja mushindu wa kulongolola
Biasanganabo muntu udi wiba muan abo umue wa Bena Isalele, udi umuenza bu muhika, anyi udi umuhana, hashishe nebashihe muibi: nunku nenûmusbe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Nyuma kudibo, bakamba dî dia Nzambi, kadi kabakenza kabidi musangu mukuabo
Pikalaye mua kusakidila milambu mikuabu udi mua kuenza
Lupangu lua Edene Dituku divua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu mufuke diulu ne buloba, mitshi ne bisosa kabivua bianji kutoloka to
Tshitupa tshia kumpala: Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia ditunga
Nembutule bintu bionsu bidi ne muoyi, bindi mufuke pa buloba
Mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene budimi nebuhingane kudi wakabuhana, kudi muena budimi mene
Katataka ya biebe, uye ne bantu ku muaba unakukuambila, tangila, muanjelo wanyi neaye ku mpala kuebe, kadi dituku dinalua kudibo, nembenzele kabidi bu mudi bubi buabo
Ke muvuabu benza mudimu wa kubueja batuangaji mu mudimu nanku
Kadi kena mubumvue, nansha munuteleje to
Lubena wakahingana ku mukela, ne Yosefe kakadimu, yeye wakahanda tshivualu tshiandi
Kanungu ka Tulasa tudi tudikadile
Tshiakubiumvua kabidi to
Pawajikija, nennuishe tumelu tuebe kabidi
disomba dia munda mwa ditunga bwa majinga a Ditunga;
Nebabuikile tshilamba tshifikuluke ku tshitekelu tshia miendu, ku miendu yatshi, ku lukuatu, ku mbabula ne ku tulangi tua mafuta
Tshiena mbihata mu tshidimu tshimue bua buloba kabulu tshianana, ne nyama ya mu mpata kayikumbanyi ku mesu kuebe
Kanungu ka Badi bimikila Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu mudimu wa kutangilula lungenyi lwa dîyi dikulu ludi mu mêyi ne mikandu ne mu ngenzelu idi mikala ne bukola bwa mêyi ne mikandu
Mulambu udi mfumu ulambula Padi mfumu wa bena Izrayele muenze bualu bubi mu mpukapuka budi bubengangana ne mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu, udi muena tshibawu
Wa kumudilu wakahatuka wakadi mukunze kunzû, wakadi ne miosa ya bungi ham bidi handi, bakamuidika dina ne, Esau
Numumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bualu kavua musue kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu pa diba diayi
Asakidile kabidi maluvu a mvinyo litre isatu
Kadi balami ba mikoku kufika, kuipata bana ba bakaji abu

Mose wakabambila ne, Binuenza bualu ebu, binuangata bintu bia nvita bua kuya n abi ku nvita ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bena nvita bonso badi basabuka Yadene ku mpala kua Yehowa to ne hashikisheye kuihata bantu bonso badi n andi lukuna ku mpala kuandi, ne hateketa bena buloba bonso ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashishe nenuhingane, kanuena ne bualu bubi kudi Yehowa ne kudi Bena Isalele, ne buloba ebu nebuikale buhianyi buenu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Maweja Nangila umvua bijanu bienu, kufikaye munda
Bakabika hatshiatshia, bakahanda ku mutu kua mukuna mule bakamba ne, Tudiku, netuye ku muaba wakatulaya Yehowa, bualu bua tuakenza bualu bubi
Bakasemena ha buihi Yeye wakamba ne, Ndi bianyi Yosefe, muakuny enu unuakahana mu Ejipitu

Kanungu ka Dieela dia tukanda bwa kusungula Mulombodi wa Ditunga badi badilongolola kudi Kasumbu ka ditunga kadikadile komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana, matuku makumi tshiteema kumpala kwa dijika dia matuku a mudimu a Mfumu udi mu nkwaasa

Mulambu wa kuosha Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila Arone ne bana bende ba balume ne: Nungoshile milambu mushindu ewu: Mulambu wa kuosha awu ushale pa tshilambuilu butuku bujima, kapia katema amu kutema kakayi kajima
Mudimu wa batuangaji ne wa bena Levi Bena Izrayele kuambila Moshe ne: Mona, tudi tujimina, tudi tubutuka bonsu
Nenuikale ne milau mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Nebende pankatshi pa biluilu binayi, bibidi kumpala, bibidi kunyima kuabu
Bavua bamuenzela mudimu anu bilondeshile mikenji ivuaye muambile Moshe
Kadi, lekelayi kutombokela Maweja Nangila
Kadi muanabute wa balume wa nyama wa mpunde, numupikule ku muana wa mukoku

Halua bualu ebu buimpe kûdi, wewe unvuluke, ndi nkusengelela ne, Unfuile luse, wambileku Palô bualu buanyi, angumushe mu nsubu eu Bulelela, bakungiba mu buloba bua Bena Ebelu, ne kunoko kabidi tshiakuenza bualu bubi bua kungelelabo mu nsubu wa mîdima
Bikaleye mumukume ne tshintu tshia tshiamu tshifike, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu bulelela
Bana balume ba Yakoba bakadi dikumi ne babidi
Mulau wa Mashi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mutshima wa Palô udi ne tshitshu, yeye udi uhidia kulekela bantu
Mvidi Mukulu kumuambila ne: Angata muanebe umuepele Izake uudi mupite kunanga awu, uye nende mu ditunga dia Moriya pa mukuna umbakuleja, umungoshile pa tshilambuilu
Mu dituku adi nendame buloba bua Goshene budi bantu banyi bashikame, bisumbu bia tuishi kabiena bifikaku, bualu bua kukumanyisha ne, Meme ndi Yehowa hanshi ha buloba
Pikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu numusankishe ne bintu, bu nuwuaye mulaye, kanuakusomba makuta kudi muntu to

Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Efelayima ku luseke lua ku wesete ku bisumbu biabo Elishama muana mulume wa Amihuda neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Efelayima Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu

Mu tshihungu tshia bantu tshidi tshitua, bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima ne benyi badi bafuma ku buloba bukuabo, hatangilabo makenga akalua ku buloba abu ne masama onso adi Yehowa mubatumine ne buloba buonso budi bu butue ne luehu ne bintu bioshibue, kabena bakunamu tshintu, kabena bahuolamu tshintu; ne mashinde kaena amenamu: buloba budi buikala bu kubutuka kua misoko ya Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima yakashiha Yehowa mu tshiji tshiandi tshikole; bantu aba bonso nebambe ne, Bualu kai Yehowa wakuenzela buloba ebu nunku
Idi itangila kabidi mukaji udi umona tshijila tshia bakaji, nansha mulume udi ubuelela mukaji mu nzubu patshidiye mu matuku ende a tshijila tshia bakaji
Dituku disambombu: Eliyasafe, muana wa Deyuwele, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Ngade

Biwashiha bantu aba bu mundi umue, hashishe bisamba bionso biakunvua lumu luebe nebiambe ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua ne bantu aba mu buloba buakahaneye, nunku yeye wakabashiha mu tshihela
Bena Isalele bakaya ku mpala ku luendu luabo mu tshihela tshia Sinai, ditutu bakimana mu tshihela tshia Palana
Tunkanunuina tuebe netuikale bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba netumuangalale ku wesete ne ku esete ne ku nôde ne ku sude bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bualu buebe ne bua tunkanunuina tuebe

Bobo bakamba ne, Bulelela, tuakutangila ne Yehowa udi n ebe, nunku tuakuambilangana ne, Tutshihangane n ebe, tuhunge n ebe tshihungidi, bua wewe kutuenzedi bualu bubi, bu mutuakadi katuyi tukulenga tshianza, tuakukuenzela anu malu mimpe; tua kukumusha talalâ, ne katataka wewe udi musankishibue kudi Yehowa
Isaka wakambila Yakoba ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Lua ha buihi, nenkulengele tshianza tshianyi, muan anyi, nemmanye ne, Wewe udi muan anyi Esau bulelela
Kuandamukaye lupingu lua luepu
Difutu edi badi badilongolola mu dîyi dia mianda ya lupetu
Biasueye kumuhikula, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu ha mushinga wandi
Bantu bavua Moshe mutume bua kutentekela ditunga dia Kenaane, kadi bavua bendeshila ditunga edi lumu lubi mu dipingana diabu, bua bena Izrayele bonsu batombokele Moshe, kufuabu bonsu
